What a magical place! The beauty, quiet and solitude were exactly what I was hoping for. How amazing to wake up to that view every day, which was even more stunning than the pictures show. And very convenient to have Honoka'a nearby for supplies. I would love to return again someday. Thank you Kristan!

A very special place of quiet serenity, awe inspiring views,and cozy comforts. We loved the jacuzzi room and the extra ports for cell phones.  A convenient location for visiting the Waipio Valley. Will dream of it the rest of my life,and try to come back!
We had an amazing stay, and thoroughly enjoyed the magnificent view!  Very romantic.  Kristan was a fabulous host.
Very quiet and secluded home. The view is amazing and totally worth it! Also the breeze and sounds of the forest around you are amazing!
Beautiful! We had a great time during our three-night stay. Best of the Air BnB's we did on our honeymoon.
This place is pure magic.  Incredible view, beautiful house. I highly recommend it to anyone coming to this part of the island. I would definitely stay here again.
Amazing! View! Cute place ! Private ! I can’t say enough to praise this place
This place is paradise! The pictures don't do the actual space justice it's amazing. We will be back!
This place is amazing! The view is incredible and the house is absolutely beautiful. I would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone!

The best part of Kristan's place is definitely the view, followed very closely by the privacy, then that bathtub, then the butterflies.  The house is "walled off" from all the surrounding houses and properties by the lush jungle vegetation, and in particular a massive wall of bamboo.  After checking in, we didn't see Kristan (or anyone) for the entire time we were there.  

Kristan also has some very nice landscaping, which must act like a buffet for butterflies because I've never seen so many (and different species) outside of a real butterfly sanctuary.  Beautiful and amazing.

Honestly, the only downside of the property (if you could call it that) is the jungle sounds at night.  There are a a bunch of birds and other animals that start making noise around sunset and they don't let up until sunrise.  In my experience, it was much quieter around noon than around midnight.  If you are a person that is very sensitive to sound, you may not want to book here.  (Although neither I nor my wife had any trouble sleeping, at all.)

Oh, and that bathtub?  It's much, much, much better than the pictures show.  It has the same beautiful view as the rest of the house, with screens for walls to let in the wonderful tropical breezes.  If I could, I would live in that bathtub.

This house did not disappoint - great food nearby and of course the view. The Jeep got nice and muddy in the Valley - don't miss that and do not walk down. Best to go early and have the beach all by yourself. Nice way to spend half the day. 
Wi-fi without a password is great too. We saw a gecko as we were leaving the kitchen - our good luck paid off at a fine lunch at Merriman's. In Honokaa be sure to eat the acai bowl at Hina Rae's Cafe and Aulani Cafe was also great. But right around the corner from the house is the best - Waipi'o Cookhouse. Yum!

My wife and I stayed here for two nights on our honeymoon and our only regret is that we didn't choose to stay longer.  This place exceeded our expectations in every way.  The view is so beautiful it doesn't seem real, you keep staring out at the cliffs thinking it has to be a photograph; no, it's real life.  But it doesn't stop there.  The house itself is beautifully decorated, right down to the small details.  The cottage is small, but everything about it (lighting, windows, fan, kitchen, etc) makes sense.  The lofted room is super cool as well and has a sliding door for privacy.  We didn't use it, but if you're traveling with friends, it's certainly a bonus.  The house feels secluded and private, yet there are still nice dining and activity options very close by (5-15min).  Highly recommend!
This is a unique place at a beautiful location. Amazing view, lovely house with a personal touch.

The Cliff House is an oasis in Waipi'o Valley. Both the location and decor make it feel as if you've been transported to a different time and world, especially the loft area. It arguably has a better view than the main overlook down the road, although the rain and mist obscured the view for most of our stay. Thankfully, it was clear when we arrived and right before we left so we could soak it in! The beautiful garden frames the view too. Most of all, we loved the opportunities for nighttime baths with the sounds of rainfall all around.

The overhead fan made sleeping easier, although the lack of covers on some of the windows caused the whole place to become damp during the intense rainstorms, including the bed. The frogs and bugs were extremely loud at night, even with the windows closed, but we managed to sleep through the symphony of noise. Overall, it was a positive as it added to the tropical ambiance. Luckily we didn't have any problems with bugs indoors.

There is a wide selection of older movies in the bathroom closet (we watched The Importance of Being Earnest). We also relaxed while watching the World Series on the flatscreen. The Wi-Fi signal was a bit weak and spotty, but it worked most of the time. In the evenings, we were visited by a couple of feral cats who curled up on our car to sleep during the storm. We're guessing they have been fed by previous guests and expected the same.

The Cliff House is minutes away from Waipi'o Valley and not far from the town of Honokaa. We ate dinner at a gorgeous Italian restaurant called Cafe il Mundo in town, and there's a shop further down the road that sells locally grown coffee and macadamia nuts from Ahualoa Farms. 

This is a romantic and truly secluded location that we would recommend to all honeymooners. Thanks for the unique memories!

As mentioned in most reviews, it would be hard to find a place to stay that would offer a better view.  We found everything in order and had a great stay.  Glad we stayed for 5 days. We will miss waking up to the cliff view and the tropical sounds surrounding the house when we get home!
This is the most beautiful and unique location I’ve ever stayed. Kristan thought of everything and is super responsive and accommodating. We cannot wait to stay at the cliff house again!!
I’d give this place six stars if I could. It’s everything I hoped for and more. It really is as lovely as it looks in the pictures.

This is a one of a kind place that we really enjoyed. The tropical garden and view are out of this world. We were hypnotized by the view as the light glided across the ocean view and the Waipio Valley cliffs. The  clouds were like a moving painting and the dark night sky was alive with stars.  The cottage is filled with charm. Best bath ever as the deep soaking tub is in a screened room that looks out at magnificent view. Sit, stay, savor the setting!
This was my favorite airbnb rental I've ever experienced! What a dream!
A very convenient spot for local hikes and of course a breathtaking view of the cliffs. The house has a lot of small touches that made it very practical for longer stays (such as cooking supplies).

Perched a little over 700 feet above sea level, this secluded, thoroughly delightful listing has an outstanding view of The Big Island's NE coastline. The main windows in the house look NW directly up the coast, with Maui's Haleakala volcano looming in the distance.

The house is rustic, very clean, thoughtfully decorated, and homey. The grounds are well manicured. The king-size bed is super comfortable. There is also a full-size bed in the loft (with a better view, if that's possible), but neither of us tried it out. Although the house will sleep more than two, the listing specifies no more than two, and three might make it feel a bit crowded.

We will definitely be back.
The view from this place is unreal! It is secluded, peaceful, and the perfect homebase for exploring the north coast.

This place has unbeatable views of waipi'o valley and Maui. We loved the jacuzzi that looks out to the stunning vista and the gorgeous landscaping around the house. Kristan was responsive and easy to communicate with. We definitely recommend this special place to anyone visiting the big island.

We loved the view, making a fire one night and the seclusion. Wonderful Jacuzzi! You are near the top of a cliff. Wild and wonderful energy. If you want to experience Waipio Valley this is a special place to stay.

Kristan's place was a wonderful treat. A charming and private oasis with a gorgeous view. We would not have recovered from our long hike on Mauna loa without this place. I could not have imagined being anywhere else after that. It's just sad we didn't stay here the whole trip.

What an incredible hidden gem. Your jaw will drop at the spectacular views from nearly every corner of the house.
The bed is amazing and comfortable and you wake up to look out over the ocean. The spa was an indulgence and incredibly romantic.
We will hopefully stay again.

We had an amazing time at Kristan's house, the setting is pretty much indescribable and it was a real privilege to stay there. The house was very clean and had everything we needed for a relaxing stay. We highly recommend Waipi'o Kitchen for a great meal nearby, and we also loved horseback riding in the valley (didn't hurt that the meet-up point was at the art gallery at the end of Kristan's driveway!).
Amazing property. Have never stayed anywhere this spectacular and comfortable. Highly recommended.
This house is really great.  The view is amazing, and it's very private.  We were speechless upon arrival walking to the backyard, not only from the ocean view, but the flowers and garden as well.

The view from Kristan's place is so incredible- you will regret when evening fills in and snatches it away!  The jet bath in a screened room makes for a lovely soak.  One guest in our party stayed in the loft for an extra fee and found it to be a very peaceful space and didn't have any difficulty with the ladder.  There are a couple neighborhood dogs who like to come and visit and who seem to have been spoiled by previous guests- we gave them love, but refrained from giving them any snacks, which is what their sweet eyes seemed to really be asking for.  We didn't get the chance to meet Kristan, but she clearly puts lots of thought in making this a comfortable space.
Location is incredible. Gardens are spectacular. For an out of the way spot to spend a few days this is definitely worth considering. No down sides for my wife and I.

We have stayed in 40+ AirBNBs and are always happy with the uniqueness of each but some place are simply *SPECIAL* - Kristan's Cliffside Hidaway is just such a place. Exactly as described, perfect for a quite relaxing few days. Be prepared for amazing views, sounds of the waterfall and millions (sounded like!) of frogs at night.  Buy groceries in advance and just stay and relax!
HIGLHY RECOMEND STAYING HERE IF YOU ARE ON THE ISLAND! It was stunning! My wife girlfriend and I will be back for sure

The Hamakua Hideaway Cliffhouse was a dream. It really is a magical location. We were able to walk into the Waipi’o Valley and our ATV tour left from the gallery right at the bottom of the driveway. It stormed during most of our visit, and it was quite dramatic to sit on the sofa and watch the thunder and lightning. The kitchen and bathroom are well equipped with all the things we needed for the trip. The gardens surrounding the Cliffhouse are so beautiful. I’m so glad we spent our whole week here in Kukuihaele. The locals were so kind and it was off the beaten path and unspoiled by tourism. We would love to come again!

This place is absolutely amazing. Our minds were blown as soon as we got out of the car and took in the view. I had seen the pictures, but we were really speechless when we arrived and saw it in person. The home has so many unique and charming decorations. The screened in bath tub room is incredible to relax in and take in the views. I could go on but I’d just be reiterating every other review on here. Definitely check out the Waipio Cookhouse while you are staying here. The food is so fresh and delicious. I think we ended up eating there at least 5 times during our stay since it was so delicious and so convenient to walk to. Don’t hesitate to stay here!! We feel so lucky to have experienced it, and I can not recommend it enough.
Simply appointed, clean cottage in an unbelievable natural setting. Really enjoyed our stay!
Just wow. The view is wonderful to wake up to.

WOW! Book the cliff house without ANY hesitation. We stayed at three AirBnb's  during our stay on The Big Island and this was by far our favorite. You can't beat the privacy or the views. It rained (poured) every day that we were in Waimea, but we were up early for sunrise to catch the incredible view of the Waipio Valley and enjoy the garden. The view left us speechless. Kristan gave us SPOT on directions to her place, the check in was EASY, she had darling vases of fresh flowers on the windowsill, and a sweet pup (that we named Charlie) that ran to greet us upon arrival. We enjoyed fresh coffee (beans, grinder, and coffee pot provided - stop on your way in for creamer) every morning and the soak tub on the screen porch by evening. We lit every candle in the house and enjoyed the rain falling outside. We used the ladder in the place as a drying rack for all of our clothes and ran the box fan to try and dry them out. Temps did drop in the evening and the rain made it feel colder than it was - pack a sweatshirt/sweatpants! While you're in town (Honokaa), stop at Gramma's Kitchen - one of our favorite meals of the trip + Cafe IL Mondo for the Hawaiian Pizza! Everything about our stay was memorable, right down to the frogs who put us to sleep each night! We will never forget it. Thank you, over and over!

Kristan place is so lovely! The location and view can not be beat! There were two adorable kitties who came to visit us a couple of times a day. They were SO friendly and we loved “adopting” them for our stay ;) It is such a serene and relaxing place, perfect to recharge. Can’t wait to come back!

The view from the cliff house really is breathtaking-pictures don’t do it justice!  The house has been smartly designed to put all attention on the incredible view.  Location is perfect for exploring the Waipi’o Valley as many tours leave from walking distance to the house and the overlook/road down to the valley is also walking distance from the house.

What a magical place! Pictures don’t do justice to the view. Wow. We were a little confused trying to find it (look for the little sign and just keeping going down the drive) but we loved the house, the beautiful grounds and the unbelievable view. The house is less than a half mile from the Waipi’o Valley lookout. We enjoyed dinners at the Waipi’o Cookhouse, breakfasts at Gramma’s in Honokaa, and checking out the art gallery / gift shop next door. We took our Jeep into Waipi’o Valley. It was a little sketchy but we made it. This whole area is very special and so relaxing!
A lovely space with a view beyond compare. Very relaxing :)

This is an enchanted location.  The house is nestled in a very private area of Waipi'o with an incredible die for view of the Waipi'o coast (this will be the photo you frame).  The home is quite adequate for 4, although 1 BR will require climbing a ladder. The shower and jacuzzi are beautifully equipped.  Being in the middle of 'almost nowhere' in a generally wet area, the evenings are filled with symphonic sounds of a nearby creek and all kinds of critters.  It rained both nights we were there.  While totally protected sometimes it felt like we were in a platform tent (the outdoors-feeling part).  The home is quite beautiful and nicely appointed. Plenty of towels, dishes, pots, frig, and stove. Internet was fine.

This place is even more amazing than the photos can show. The location is unbelievable, right on the edge of the cliff beside a creek. Amazing sunsets and the sound of little frogs singing all night.  I would love to come back! Kristan was very responsive as well.  Make sure to pickup bug spray on the way since there's lots of mosquitos in this damp climate.

Great place. I’ve living on the Big Island my entire life and I would still go back and rent this place again - it was that awesome. If you’re planning to do any sightseeing on this side you owe it to yourself to rent this place, you won’t regret it. Weather was great but even the couple of times it rained the view was still amazing. Waking up to that view in the morning was incredible. Can’t recommend it enough.

Wonderfully tranqal  beyond words. It was exactly the get away I needed.  Beautiful view, while I couldn't see it there was always a light background sound of a waterfall along the edge of the property. Such an amazingly well put together and cozy house.  Kristan has thought of everything.  What a perfect little gem in the surrounding areas of such a magical valley.  I hope to be back!
Pictures don’t do it justice.  Amazing views, incredibly secluded.  Highly recommend!

If you are considering a place to truly be able to relax, get away, and clear your mind and soul - this is the place.  You will not find a more spectacular view from the sun room and couch, or upon waking up and looking outside. The jacuzzi room is inspiring. Kristan was a pleasure to communicate with and made the process easy. Definitely go down the valley with a 4WD vehicle and spend some time driving down to Hilo (and up Mauna Kea!). What a great place to finish our stay.  For those used to needing cell phone, wifi, TV - great its there. For those enjoying the outdoors, its like your in the middle of a tropical forest. With most new places and new sounds, I would recommend some ear plugs at night as the frog choirs and birds can get pretty loud (but Kristan had some there too!)  Very thoughtful on amenities (well stocked kitchen for making home meals - no microwave fyi).  We would go back. I'm printing the photo from the patio we took on a large canvas for our house.  Amazing scenery! Thank you!
Breathtaking .
Amazing place, pictures won’t do it justice, definitely book!

This was an absolutely incredible place to stay. The location is perfect for being close to Waipiʻo Valley, and the views are stunning. The house had everything we needed, even including some cooking basics like spices, etc., to make our stay extra easy! Not a single complaint. Wish we could have stayed longer!

This is a magical gem! The views are unparalleled. Kristan is very responsive. We loved the privacy of the home. The amazing curated touches of the home and beautiful design make this place truly exceptional. It was a wonderful place for respite and reflection. The property is expansive and beautifully landscaped. The only downfall is you may never want to leave. Truly one of a kind!

The Hamakua Hideaway House was by far the most unique and memorable stay we have ever experienced on vacation.  The views were beyond breathtaking.  No need for the Waipio Lookout- this has a better view!  The rustic Polynesian-inspired charm of the house shifts you into pure relaxation and peace.  We were always greeted by adorable kitties. Beautiful geckos around every corner (many photos were taken of them-and the kitties too).  Incredible sunrises and sunsets every day.  We can’t wait to return!

This place is a dream retreat. The coquís are hip to it too. There is so much to see on the Big Island though this place is so beautiful and comfortable that you may not want to leave. We will be back. Mahalo.
Unbelievable views from the entire cliffhouse! We enjoyed our stay tremendously and loved watching the sunset from the house. We also loved hiking down into the valley. One of a kind special place!

This is the place ! First the garden is just awesome. Then the view... OMG ... there is no better view than this view. 
Then the cottage... cosy and charming... the bath facing the cliffs... the comfy bed... the frogs and all the animals of the rain forest. 
We loved it and would definitely come back. Mahalo for sharing your cliff house with us.
Peace and Quiet. An amazing space. We didn't want to leave.
This place is a magical get away. The views are breathtaking and the neighboring town perfect.

This is my second time staying at Kristan’s place. This place is beyond beautiful, which is why I keep coming back. If you are looking for a place to rest and be in peace— you MUST stay here. The home is very beautiful— I really enjoyed the jacuzzi, falling asleep to my coqui frog friends, and the views in the garden and of Waipio are breathtakingly spectacular!! There’s also lots to do in the area: Waipio is just around the corner so you can take a trip down into the valley, or you can visit the town of Honoka’a and grab some ice cream while doing a little shopping. You can go horseback riding, and Waimea is not too far so you can journey over there and have a nice afternoon on their ranches or enjoy a lovely meal at Merriman’s. This is overall one of my favorite homes on Big Island so much that I chose it to celebrate my birthday. It is very special to me and I’m sure it will be to you too, if you choose to visit. I definitely recommend this home to all. Thank you Kristan once again for opening your home to me/us. I look forward to visiting again in the future. Have a beautiful day, everyone <3

Away from everything. Breath taking view. My four day there was something over my expectation. This side of the island is pretty rainy but it was such an amazing time!
Thank you for letting me stay stay in your house!

Kristan’s place is the place you’ll want to stay anytime you are on the Big Island! High recommended for a getaway and drop dead views from every room of Waipi’o Valley/Beach. As soon as we made it to the house, I was blown away with the flowers and orchids in/around the house. This is the perfect getaway for a couple. There’s also a waterfall right at the base of the house you can hear through the night, along with coqui frogs. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks for having us!
completely immersed in nature with breathtaking views. 100% recommend this to any one who wants to disconnect and be left speechless.

Man kann diesen Blick und das Feeling gar nicht beschreiben, man muss es erlebt haben. Der Blick auf das Meer, die grüne Küste mit dem Wasserfall ist denke ich die schönste Aussicht auf der Insel. Das Erlebnis der zwitschernden Vögel in der Nacht ist bemerkenswert.  Außerdem hatten wir ständigen Besuch von zwei Geckos in der Küche und zwei Katzen vor der Tür. Das ist der richtige Ort für Naturliebhaber und Leute die keine Angst vor der Einsamkeit haben.

Beautiful and remote. The view of Waipio Valley is breathtaking. If your staying for a while be sure to bring groceries and food because there is only one restaurant in walking distance (its very delicious) otherwise your driving 10+ min to food. You can walk to the trailhead and its a great spot if you are looking to make the hike.

This is the most amazing location I have ever stayed at. If you’re considering staying here, do it. Do not hesitate. Animal noises at night (frogs, crickets, birds) was so cool. Bathtub is incredible. I am so grateful to Kristan for opening part of her home to us. We will never forget it.

I always try to look for really cool places or experiences when planning our trips and this one exceeded our expectations. My husband was like a little kid checking out the house and the view! We loved the eclectic Hawaiian decor, from the pottery to the vintage photos. Kristan’s description of the property is spot on. The view of the Waipi’o valley, the ocean and, on a clear day, Maui is breathtaking. We had a couple of gecko sightings around the house(they are harmless and adorable and keep the critters away!) and there were the 2 sweetest kitties that came to visit in the evenings. We walked to the Waipi’o Valley lookout (about a 10 minute walk), drove into the Valley in our rented jeep(that was so much fun!) and went horseback riding down there as well. The little store/art gallery nearby is great for finding Hawaiian made gifts. Just keep in mind that this is a rural area. We had to drive to Honoka’a to get gas, we drove to Waimea the first night for dinner because we waited too late to go to someplace local(7:30!). 
This is a great place and I’d recommend it to anyone looking for a private, relaxing getaway with a most incredible view.

This home took our breath away!! Thr view is the best i have woken up to in my life and i will miss it alot. The two friendly cats greeted us every morning for a pat and some treats. we found ourselves spending half our time exploring the local attractions and the other half just sitting and enjoying that view with a wine and some cheese. I could never tire of this place and highly recommend it. grab some groceries at the nearby honokaa shops about 10 minutes drive away and enjoy!

This was an outstanding experience. The location, the view, the cottage with its little touches and character- everything was wonderful. This was without a doubt our favorite Airbnb stay! What a perfect place to enjoy our honeymoon; myself and my new wife are already dreaming about coming back for future trips.
Probably the most beautiful place we have ever stayed,  simply stunning. A private paradise.
The house is located at an incredibly scenic cliff top with a waterfall just below the property and views of coastal cliffs & waterfalls from the lanai and bathroom.

The views from the front porch and garden are absolutely incredible!! And the vegetation surrounding the property feels like a Botanical Garden. Kristan was a very responsive host and we can't recommend this property enough for people looking for an escape into a remote area of Hawaii. Visitors should consider that the property does not have air- conditioning though. We did not need it with the nice cool breeze through the house at night, but the delightful sounds of the jungle may bother light sleepers. We loved the sounds but just something to consider (the house does provide ear plugs too). We also really enjoyed our hike into Waipio Valley and our meals at Gramma's Cookhouse!

We had a surreal experience at Kristan’s place. The garden and view are incredible. Really truly incredible. Although this place is pretty secluded, it’s exactly what we were looking for and we found ourselves staring at the view for hours. Hiking down to the canyon nearby was one of the best days we have ever had. We feel so lucky to have been able to stay here!
We had such an unbelievable stay at the Cliff house, sincerely cannot wait to be back to this beautiful oasis in Waipio!

This cliffside cabin is better than you can imagine. I went in with high hopes, and I was still blown away. We drank coffee (Kona!) every morning outside, listening to the waterfall and watching the ocean and rainbows. It was perfection. Come to relax and reset. You will not regret it.
Spectacular view in a unique home. Perfect for the 2 of us to take in the area. Everything was as advertised.

The cliffhouse was amazing! We wish we could have stayed longer! They view was obviously the most incredible part, but the beautiful garden, the decor, the comfortable bed, those just put it all over the top! I'll be dreaming about that cliffhouse for a very long time. Thank you again for hosting us!

Truly a piece of paradise! Kristan has ensured you have all you need during your stay at this incredible location. We particularly loved the screened room soaker tub and having our sunrise coffee overlooking the cliff view. The surroundings are transformative and you sense the island mana. Rain or shine this stay is an extraordinary experience not to be missed.

Overall a phenomenal experience. Especially loved the gorgeous views and private location. Instructions were very clear how to find the house. Our stay at the cliff house was one of the highlights of our trip to Hawaii.

A stunning little hideaway full of charm with fantastic views. A great place to escape from the world.

Be aware that the nearby restaurant, Waipi’o Cookhouse, is 'closed until further notice'. The nearest places we found to eat/buy groceries are about a 30min round trip, so it's worth stopping on your way in. The kitchen is well stocked with pans, utensils etc but doesn't have a microwave, and there is no BBQ outside.

We loved our time at the hideaway and would definitely recommend it to those who want some alone time away from the hustle and bustle. It was very comfortable and had everything we needed, but the best feature has to be the stunning views!

This was our second one-week stay in Kristan's place. Needless to say, we like it very  much. It is near the end of the road leading to Waipio Valley and has an off-the-grid vibe. However, utilities, including fast WiFi, were reliable. The hot water was hot enough, but just. I think the on-demand heater is undersized of not set correctly. Filling the spa/tub with hot water, and no cold water, gives a plenty warm soaking with breathless views. (See my earlier review, and those of others, for a description of the first class views.) This place is best suited for a couple, although the loft could sleep another couple or a few kids. I would not recommend this, because the loft's ladder might be a bit of a challenge in the middle of the night. The grounds are a well manicured colorful garden that makes you feel like you're staying in a bouquet. We saw surprisingly few mosquitoes and didn't need to use bug repellent at all during our stay.
The view was spectacular! We loved spending the days down in the valley, and the evenings cooking diner and unwinding.

This house was AMAZING. Normally we like to investigate the area and just use a place to crash, but we loved this house, the view, the yard so much we spent an entire day hanging around!
On the day we did leave, we were able to walk to the Waipio Valley trailhead, which meant we didn’t have to worry about parking. (Definitely visit!)
There is so much life and beauty in this area of Hawaii. Did not want to leave. 
Kristan made check in and check out easy. I appreciate that she composts and recycles and happily sorted our trash accordingly. 
We would 100% come back.
This place is a true standout.
Very tropical, but fully outfitted, bungalow with what is possibly the best view on the whole island - thousand foot cliffs and waterfalls.  Who could ask for more.

A little private Garden of Eden perched atop a spectacular cliff beside a waterfall! Can one ask for anything more? Just book it. You won’t have any regrets.

Between, the location, the jaw dropping view, the warmth, and the charm oozing from every corner of this place, it’s something not to be missed. From soaking in the jacuzzi tub overlooking the view, to cozying up by the fireplace on a cool, breezy night, it’s pretty much perfect. There are also two adorable (outdoor/stray?) cats that wander the grounds that you might fall in love with.

Our two nights here definitely topped the list of all the places we stayed during our week on the Big Island. We only wish we could have stayed longer. We’ll definitely be back.
This was our second time staying here, and the location, place and view is nothing short of amazing

Super beautiful views and comfortable accommodations.  We loved the sounds of the waterfall, frogs at night and waking up to the site of the ocean.  We loved the two cats that came to visit us everyday too:) Everything was really wonderful!  Thanks for sharing your piece of heaven with us!!
Lovely view, but be prepared for lots of mosquitoes, spiders, and cockroaches!
An absolutely amazing experience. I sat in stillness most of my stay enamored by nature’s beauty. Thank you Kristan, I felt so lucky being here.
The view pays for everything. Very unique location. The bathtub with a view is a highlight. The home is quite nice though.

Our stay at Kristan’s house was absolutely perfect. The pictures make the view look great and it is even better in person. Waking up with the windows open, listening to the ocean is a great way to start your day. The house had everything we needed and more and was easy to get to. It is also close to some great hikes on the Waipio valley (make sure to go to the black sand beach!)... Kristan was very quick to respond and provided anything we needed. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would love to come back! Thanks Kristan!!

I was pleasantly surprised with this property. It has humble surroundings but the privacy and ambiance are amazing. We arrived amidst a once in a decade storm and power poles were knocked down in the area. We had no power but plenty of hot water and candles. In some ways it added to the experience. No media or electronics, just read a lot and talked. I would definitely recommend this property for quiet solitude with easy access to some great natural sites.

Pictures do not do it justice. It was wonderful! Can’t wait to stay again. 

Renting a Jeep will make the trip to the place super fun! (Be careful of those soft tops as they are difficult to take off.)

An adventurous stay with the perfect view on the big island! Kristan’s home really immerses you into nature. From the charm of the open air layout, to the lush garden surrounding it. From the beautiful tub with a stunning view, to the engrossing sounds of the forest at night. It’s an amazing experience and we highly recommend it if you’re going to be on the north side of the island. It’s about as close as you can get to sleeping in a rainforest without actually sleeping in the forest!

name: Sefa Apartments Harbiye
summary: • Taksim, Şişli and Nişantaşı are all within walking distance from the public, cinema, theater shopping centers and health centers.  • Ideal for 3 people with 1 double bed and 1 sofa bed.  • Minimum rental period is 4 days.  • Wi-Fi is available
space: 2 minutes walking distance to all public transport, nisantasi taxim to cevahir shopping center 5 min. Harbiye military museum is opposite the hilton hotel and istanbul congress center

reviews.comments: Sefa’s place is comfortable for a small family with a child. A baby crib will be provided when requested. The location is also convenient, just walking distance to Taksim and to the airport bus station (Havabus) and to the metro station. You have to be ready to walk uphill though when leaving the house since it is located in a small neighborhood. There is a small bakery right infront of the house, very convenient to grab fresh bread and a bit of grocery. Sefa responsed to every query we have even just to borrow an adapter from him. I also like the fact that we are provided with a small vacuum cleaner, so it’s a breeze cleaning up since it’s a small space. Thank you Sefa, we appreciate your hospitality☺️
wonderful location near taksim square and istiklal street.
Thank you for everything , i recommend him highly
an excellent apartment I recommend it

name: Bright room, super close to station and center

host.host_about:
Hi there,
Im a Taiwanese professional in the end of my 20s. As be whatever a host or a guest, always respectful to the house and considerate to people. 
Nice to meet you here :)

reviews.comments:
房東人很好,熱情,訊息都有即時回覆
感謝Jill這幾天的照顧
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
good cheap and clean place to live ! with really good host.  Really friendly, will visit them if i have the occasion for sure !

name: Chambre dans appartement proche Centre ville
summary: Chambre dans appartement typique de Montréal avec mur en brique. Très calme, entrée privée et cachée par des arbres. Terrasse et jardin extérieur, grande cuisine équipée. Salle de bain rénovée récemment.  A proximité à pied : Jardin Gamelin 7 min, Centre ville 15 min, Vieux Port/Vieux Montreal 15 min,  Parc Lafontaine 5 min, métro Berri Uqam 10 min, Parc du Mont-Royal 20min. Rue principale avec bar et restaurant à 10 min maximum !!
space: Sa localisation vous permettra de profiter de Montréal en toute simplicité, à pied ou à vélo ! Endroit très calme et cosy vous offrant toutes les joies de la vie Montréalaise.

l'appartement quoiqu' un peu sombre est très propre et agréable.  
Nous n'avons pratiquement pas vu nos hôtes.  Cela ne
 nous a pas particulièrement 
dérangé mais peut ne pas convenir à tout le monde.
Lieu agréable et bon emplacement , à recommander.
très bon rapport qualité prix.

name: Elegant Boavista
summary: - Centrally located in Boavista; - Can sleep up to 4 people comfortably;  - 3 minutes walking distance to “Casa da Música” Metro Station (connect directly with Airport in 22 min); - 4m walking from Rotunda da Boavista, Casa da Música and Mercado Bom Sucesso” and 15 min from “Palácio de Cristal”; -Equipped with all the facilities and a big garden for you to relax;
space: Practical and conveniently located 1 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 3 minutes walking distance to “Casa da Música” Metro Station (this Metro Station connect directly with Airport in 22 min). The House is centrally located one of the most traditional areas (Boavista). 4m walking from Rotunda da Boavista, Casa da Música and Mercado Bom Sucesso” and 15 min from “Palácio de Cristal”. Equipped with all the facilities and a big garden for you to relax after a day discovering the city and to spend a few pleasant days. A great place for holidays or work where comfort and tranquility are the highlights. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Appartement rénové avec jardin partagé dans quartier résidentiel calme. À 300m du métro et 3km du centre historique. Situé tout près de bohavista. Beaucoup de commerces à proximité. Paulo est très sympathique, avenant, à  l'écoute et disponible. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Porto.

The place is great! All the things in the apartment were quite new, some of them were even brand-new. The location is also perfect, it is located in a quiet residential area well communicated to the centre by public transport and it isn't far to walk there either. Paulo was very nice and helped us with everything.

Apartamento situado a unos 15/20 minutos del centro caminando. A unos 5 minutos andando a la parada de metro Casa da Musica. Bien situado si no quieres estar en pleno centro y con varias posibilidades de transporte público. Apartamento pequeño pero acogedor. Bien para una família de 4 personas. Recién reformado y mobiliario, electrodomésticos y menaje todo nuevo. Zona tranquila y segura. Facilidad de aparcamiento en las inmediaciones gratis en la calle. El anfitrión está en todo lo que sea necesario y a disposición del viajero. Respuesta a los mensajes rápida. Abierto a mejoras y soluciones rápidas. Sin duda volvería a repetir. Muy buena relación calidad/precio. Muy recomendable.
Appartement au top !! très agréable et très bien situé. proche du métro (3 minutes à pied) pour se rendre en 15 min dans le centre de porto et 25 à la plage.
Obrigada , é óptimo para uma ou duas noites

Sangre, humedad y hormigas.
El patio era maravilloso, el piso-trastero (recién reformado) dejaba mucho que desear: humedad, sofá cama insufrible, hormigas y ningún tipo de comodidad ni en la cocina, ni en el baño (aunque la ducha estaba muy bien), ni en la habitación (había un edredón muy manchado con algo que parecía sangre). Por otra parte la ubicación era excelente, al lado del metro y autobús, en uma zona muy tranquila y cerca del centro a pie.
Espaço muito confortável, um bom terraço e tudo novo.
Estupenda nuestra estancia.

Es un lugar que tiene cerca el metro para poder desplazarse, es bueno para sólo poder descansar ya que no hay ningún tipo de ruido, le falta confort pero está bien para dormir. Pasamos sólo una noche y fue un agradable lugar.

El apartamento es tal cual como figura en las fotos. Es un sitio perfecto para pasar unos días
 en Porto. No está excesivamente lejos del centro (se puede ir andando) y la parada de metro está a 2 minutos. 
Es una zona tranquila y silenciosa y se puede aparcar fácilmente en la calle y gratis.
Con Paulo la comunicación fue estupenda, contestó muy rápido a los mensajes y nos dio varios consejos. Además, nosotros llegamos por la mañana y no hubo ningún problema por hacer el check-in antes.
Si hubiera que poner un pero diría que el sofá-cama no es lo más cómodo del mundo pero para un par de noches sirve perfectamente. 
Relación calidad-precio buena.
Recomendable, repetiría sin duda.

Paulo is really kind and helpfull. Easy to contact!
It's a nice place with everything you need. Good location also, not far from the metro. Quiet street.
Optimas condições.
paulo는 친절하고 빠른응답이 좋았어요

We stayed at Paulo's appartment for a weekend trip in Porto. It was perfect for 4 people. The apartment looks very nice and the garden is a highlight. It is not far to the metro or even to walk/uber into the historic city center. Porto was beautiful and our stay was perfect.
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Studio
summary: Small but very clean studio a the center of it all. Extremely well situated and you have basically all you need to enjoy the Plateau Mont-Royal. Well decorated with the basics to feel at home. Almost like an Hotel room but better ;)
space: Small (150 sqft - 14 m2) 2 min walk from sherbrooke Metro 1 min walk from ATM 1 min walk from breakfast place 4 min walk from grocery store 10 min walk from Hospital You are in the center of it all
description: Small but very clean studio a the center of it all. Extremely well situated and you have basically all you need to enjoy the Plateau Mont-Royal. Well decorated with the basics to feel at home. Almost like an Hotel room but better ;) Small (150 sqft - 14 m2) 2 min walk from sherbrooke Metro 1 min walk from ATM 1 min walk from breakfast place 4 min walk from grocery store 10 min walk from Hospital You are in the center of it all The Pod is made for self check-in and Check-out (no Keys are required). I will try to be there for Checking during 13:00 to 17:00. If not i usually answer very quickly. Your are my guests and i will try to make you enjoy your stay the best i can. You are close to everything; we made a booklet to help you get around the Plateau and what is close to the POD. Parking can be complicated but usually you can find a spot. There is a Electric Vehicle charging station on the Street (supplied by the city) The Metro Sherbrooke is 2 min walk and the Berri Metro station 10min
neighborhood_overview: You are close to everything; we made a booklet to help you get around the Plateau and what is close to the POD.
notes: We have an office if you have questions,  there usually is somebody there from 10:00 to 17:00 Mon to Friday. If we are there the door is open for any questions don’t hesitate we are friendly :)
transit: Parking can be complicated but usually you can find a spot. There is a Electric Vehicle charging station on the Street (supplied by the city) The Metro Sherbrooke is 2 min walk and the Berri Metro station 10min walk
interaction: The Pod is made for self check-in and Check-out (no Keys are required). I will try to be there for Checking during 13:00 to 17:00. If not i usually answer very quickly. Your are my guests and i will try to make you enjoy your stay the best i can.
house_rules: -  The hours of 8am to 11pm are 'quiet hours'. Please limit noise (phone calls, tv, etc.)

host.host_about: Hello I’m Christopher been hosting for a long time and now travelling myself:)

reviews.comments: Christopher has a beautiful apartment in a great area of Montreal. I rented the apartment for my parents who were visiting and they loved it! Christopher was very easy to communicate with and the keyless electronic lock was easy to use (even for older people). The apartment was very clean and all of the basic amenities were provided, even the added touch of drinks in the fridge and maps of Montreal. The apartment is close to a lot of great restaurants, bars and parks, and not far from the downtown festivals. Would highly recommend this apartment and will definitely book for out-of-town visitors again!

Christopher was a truly amazing host he saved us street parking and stayed there to give us a tour of the room. He was friendly and really easy to talk to, He had thought of everything down to a pod for laundry and chocolates on the bed side. He allowed us to check out late and was very fast to respond via messaging. It was an amazing experience and when I come back I will be staying here again for sure.
Super emplacement! Très propre et super service!

I unfortunately never got to meet Chritsopher in person, but he was so helpful and easy to get ahold of anytime I needed help. if you dont mind a small washroom and kitchen, then I'd totally reccomend this place :)
Great little spot and a wonderful location.   It’s not a big space for sure, but had everything I needed and Christopher is a great host.  Would definitely stay here again!
Le plus beau AirBnB que j'ai pu visiter jusque-là. Il est très fonctionnel malgré sa petite taille. Parfait pour une fin de semaine en couple.

We had a wonderful two night stay at Christopher's place.  The room was perfect, very clean, and had everything we needed.  Christopher was very responsive and helpful with any questions we had.  Self check-in process was very easy.  I would definitely stay again, and recommend it to others as well!

O local é excelente, exatamente como nas fotos. Tudo bem arrumado, muito limpo. O Cristopher foi um ótimo host, nos recebeu no check-in e fez todo o possível para nos ajudar. Deixou que guardássemos a bagagem antes do check-in e deu várias dicas do bairro. A localização é ótima, em um bairro muito legal e bem próxima da estação de metrô. Recomendo!
Absolutely loved this space! Tons of amenities and walking distance to St. Denis and other major streets. Great helpful hosts and a breezy check in.
This apartment was great! Christopher went out of his way with special touches and the location was perfect. Great local knowledge too with places to eat out etc!

Stop looking for other airbnb’s. You’ve found the BEST airbnb in montreal.
And here’s why:
-we asked if they could find us a microwave for our unit and THEY DID IT WITH 24 HOURS NOTICE.
-perfect location, walking distance to old port
-parking was pretty easy to find actually
-quiet street and building, safe neighbourhood
-smartest use of a small space.
-immaculately clean
We could go on. Sometimes airbnbs fall short of already short expectations, but this one restored our faith in humanity itself.
Thanks to christopher and the HAWK team.
Nice place, very convenience, I think I will come to this place again.

Emplacement PARFAIT
Appartement IMPECCABLE
Communication RAPIDE
Organisation IRRÉPROCHABLE 

BRAVO !!

Great room right in the heart of the city, was a bit nervous as to how we were going to get in with the codes and everything but it went great and some people were even there to help us out with everything. Parking was a bit complicated but it is free and once you are parked you can walk almost anywhere in the city

Le studio de Christopher est bien placé, proche du métro Sherbrooke et fonctionnel. 
Nous avons apprécié les petites attentions (boissons dans le frigo, gel douche et shampoing à dispo) et surtout la climatisation! 
Christopher a été très réactif lors de nos discussions. Il nous a indiqué comment venir depuis l’aéroport et nous a donné des conseils de restaurant ouvert à notre arrivée. 
Je recommande.

Best airbnb ever! Don't look further and just book this. It came with a kitchenette, mini fridge with free drinks and snacks (!), tv with netflix subscription, local tips, a warm bath and a comfortable bed. Better than a hotel room! It was extremely efficiently designed so I didn't think it was too small even though they call it a 'pod'. Thanks Christopher!
The apartment is small but very cozy. It is well located near the subway station. It is equipped with a stove and a freezer, and for women there is a hair dryer and the shower is very good !!!

Thank you so much Christopher, your place made our trip perfect. Clean, accessible, comfortable and cozy. We were looking for a place to sleep, we didnt need much space since we had a lot of things to do. The pod was a great place to stay for us. We will come back :)

Du début jusqu’à la fin tout a été nickel, Christopher est très réactif nous n’avons manqué de rien tout était à disposition dans le pod. Et je remercie encore Christopher pour toutes ces délicates attentions dont il a fait preuve. Meilleur airbnb nous reviendrons très certainement !
Cosy and compact, very bright and clean. Perfect for singles or couples. Great location!

The POD is a cute little home away from home! The location is amazing — it’s close to a subway station, grocery, and bistro. The place was well-decorated and has great amenities. You really can’t beat the value for the price. Christopher and Charles are great and super helpful hosts! I’d love to come back again soon.
Recommended great stay

My friend and I stayed for 2 nights in Christopher's pod and felt very welcome by Christopher, who was very kind, understanding, accommodating, and patient. We were amazed by how many thoughtful touches there were in the place, such as chocolates on the nightstand, feminine hygiene products, good quality shower products, and drinks in the mini fridge. We were also impressed by how much can fit in such an adorably small space. Everything was modern, stylish, comfortable, and peaceful. The location of the house was also beautiful at all times of the day and we never felt unsafe. We wouldn't hesitate to return!

Really nice, clean and well-located flat. Super comfy bed, decent bathroom and basic kitchen. Complementary snacks and washing/drying tokens were a great touch, and friendly and timely communication made it a great stay!
Excellent value and location in a beautiful neighborhood!
A wonderful place to stay in Montreal! Great location, very clean and safe and Christopher was a wonderful host.
Central spot that’s small and quaint. Could’ve gone without the bug crawling out of the bed sheets on our first night though.

Great location, near subway station, restaurants and grocery store. Everything very clean and convenient. Small but very comfortable for two. Christopher is a great host, always available and ready to solve any problem you may have.

this place is small but comforting. it's the perfect place for a couple or solo traveller. the space was spotless and had nice touches such as tokens for the washer and dryer, and snacks in the fridge.

Clean. Simple. Convenient. Those are the words I would use to describe this place. The place was very clean, the check in process was very simple, and the place was convenient as there are many great places to dine in and pick up groceries /food around the area. The subway was also a 5-10 min walk away. Great stay!

Very comfortable, clean and convenient. The space is small (as photos show) but had everything I needed with kitchenette, bathroom and some storage space (limited hangers though). Nice neighbourhood and host provided very clear instructions and very prompt replies. I think they did a really great job with this space.
Very nice location, clean, detailed amenities, and Netflix service. It was a bit small for two people, but still everything was great!

We really enjoyed our stay at Christopher's. The studio was clean and cozy. It had everything we needed and was close to the metro station.
We would recommend this studio to everyone who wants to stay in Montreal.
The place was way better than we had expected it to be. Because of a very smart and room-saving design, the studio is very comfortable. Given the chance, I would stay there on my next visit!

Great location and space if you are just planning on sleeping and relaxing as it is a small space as advertised. Perfect for a couple and the location was amazing! Easy to get in and out of apartment and very quick responses from Christopher if needed
Easy check in and out. Pod was very clean and the local recommendations were great! Would absolutely stay here again in a heartbeat!

Stay at here for 3 nights. Great place! Great location, close to the  metro station, really convenient. Check in and check out is pretty easy. The pod provide almost everything we need and it's clean and tidy. Definitely come back when I visit Montreal again!

The POD was perfect for my short stay in Montreal with my boyfriend. It was cozy and clean with an easy check-in and check-out process. Simple, yet thoughtful amenities that were provided were a plus (chargers, umbrella, etc.) Christopher was an excellent host, who responded quickly about our question with street parking and messaged to check in and ensure we were good with everything. Location was also great as the POD is in walking distance to several main streets, the park, and a metro station.

Christopher was an amazing host! We were able to communicate without delay or problem. Check-in Instructions were clear and the location was easy to find. The location is close enough to everything but also far enough to get a peaceful nights rest. Everything was within a short walking distance, including downtown, which was about a 30 minute walk. The closest restaurant and bar were within 5 minutes. The studio was clean and the bed was quite comfortable. We will definitely be coming back and booking in the future!
Great place. Comfy, clean, I had all I needed to prep simple meals, close to the metro. Thanks!

Appartement très propre et très bien situé et proche d'un métro.
Appartement petit mais bien équipé et très fonctionnel. 
Pleins d'informations données sur Montréal.
Petits présents à mon arrivée. 
Très réactif aux demandes.
 Je n'hésiterai pas à y retourner.

Très bon séjour appartement parfaitement propre, moderne et au calme, je reviendrai ! Mérite son titre de superhost ! Dommage qu'il n'y ai pas de micro ondes dans la petite cuisine.
Merci beaucoup !
Christopher's place was so cozy! It was perfect for a long weekend away - great location and easy walking distance to various attractions.

First time airbnb-ing and glad it was at Christopher's place. Self check in was real convenient and there was a little booklet of information provided about the neighbourhood and surrounding area and snacks.  The space was super clean and cozy. Nice location and super close to subway which made getting around the city a breeze!

Really great Airbnb experience! Tended to forget how small the unit was because it was set up so efficiently that it seemed larger than it was. Really friendly and quick service, and the thoughtful touches like laundry tokens, toiletries and recommendations for places to go were really appreciated. Had a little trouble finding parking but was warned about that and the place was within walking distance to tons of bars and restaurants so only had to worry about finding parking once. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to enjoy Montréal!
This apartment is in a great location, we could walk just about everywhere. It has everything you need and is very comfortable. I would certainly recommend staying here if you are visiting Montreal!

summary: New apartment at DOWNTOWN Porto with 2 bedrooms and equipped (Website hidden by Airbnb) was renovated this year ! Only 5 minutes by walk from metro Marques station-yellow line, 15 minutes from Santa Catarina Street and Majestic Cafe,  Bolhão Market,Torre Clérigos, Livraria Lello. The most important places like: - GAIA(wine caves) - Church SÉ  - Avenida dos Aliados  - Ribeira ( Douro River,Shops) - Rua das Flores - São Bento train station ARE IN THE SAME LINE OF OUR METRO. You are very WELCOME! I wait for you!
space: It is in a calm area in Porto downtown, very near of Santa Catarina Street. The apartament win a lot of sun during all day in the summer.  The best is here why you can go all atractions in Porto by walking to. If you need to take metro, is very near just 5 minutes. It is the best option for you khow Porto ,or discover more of this WONDERFUL city. I am waiting for you very happy.

neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood in Bonfim is a tipical area of Porto, where there is lot of options to food and visiting the city. You can visit the atractions of Porto City, go down the beside street of Santa Catarina, in the end will see Praça da batalha, São Bento Station,Avenida dos Aliados and Rua das Flores that will finish in the Ribeira ( Douro River).  It will be great stay in Porto Marques !  I will wait for you !
notes: Estou disponível em que for preciso para proporcionar aos meus hóspedes uma memorável experiência no Porto Marquês apartamento.
transit: Do Aeroporto, basta sair na Estação Trindade e pegar outro metro sentido Hospital São João. Muito próximo a nossa rua , a estação de metro Marquês, linha amarela. Caminhar 5 minutos chegará no Porto Marquês apartamento !  O metro linha amarela liga o hospital São joão ( zona próxima das universidades ) até a Vila Nova de Gaia ( Estação Santo Ovídio ). Se pretendes ir para a Estação da Trindade , é muito rápido em 5 minutos de metro chegará la, e consegue viajar para todas as linhas. Se preferir auto-carros na rua ao lado tem grande variedade. Se preferir combois para as principais cidades de Portugal ou da Europa pode ir de metro até a Estação de Campanhã ou Estação São Bento( tambem linha amarela ). Para estacionar na rua do Porto Marqûes é gratuito, e normalmente se encontra estacionamento.
access: Neste magnífico apartamento constam dois quartos, sendo uma cama de casal com uma fantástica varandinha, e no outro quarto com uma cama de puxar, que poderá ser utilizada como cama de casal ou servirá como duas camas de solteiro, a definir. A cozinha está toda equipada com forno, microondas, frigorífico e todos os utencílios necessários. Possui uma área particular externa, com acesso exclusivo somente pelos hóspedes,  uma área de serviço ,onde consta uma maquina de lavar roupas. (There is a out exclusive area, that has a clothes machine)
interaction: Meu watsapp + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) . Ou por ligação telefônica.  E-mail:  (Email hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou do Brasil, cidade Rio de janeiro. Mas atualmente moro na cidade do Porto,
desde a primeira vez que conheci, me apaixonei por tudo !
Vistas fantásticas, lindas praias, comida excelente e as pessoas que vivem aqui são muitíssimo agradáveis.
Tenho uma filha e sou casado há 10 anos.
Adoramos viajar e conhecer novas pessoas e lugares, sempre escolhendo o Airbnb para as minhas hospedagens.
Adoro música e fazer caminhadas, sendo o Porto ideal para tal.
Terei enorme prazer em receber pessoas de todas as nacionalidades em meu apartamento, colaborando em proporcionar uma agradável experiência na visita dos meus  hóspedes. 
Sejam bem vindos ao Porto !

reviews.comments:
Ótima experiência! 
Excelente apartamento, bastante conforto e bem localizado.
Muy buena la estancia

L'appartement est dans un immeuble très calme, dans une rue très calme, dans un quartier sympathique. Il est très propre, fonctionnel  et frais. Il est possible de fumer une cigarette dans la loggia. On peut boire un verre jusquà 2 heures du matin sur la place Marquès qui est ombragée et se trouve à 5 minutes à peine de l'appartement . La place est animée, les vieux jouent aux cartes, la marchande de légumes parle très bien français. Le métro Marquès est très proche du centre historique et il y a des métros très tard, probablement même toute la nuit. 
Bref, un bon endroit que nous avons tous appréciés. 
Merci à Eduardo qui nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse et qui n'a jamais tardé à répondre aux messages qu'on lui envoyait. Un hôte parfait :-)
Accueil et contact exceptionnel,  je recommande vivement, on peux se garer sous le logement places non payantes.

We have stayed in Eduardo apartment for several days . Eduardo told us about the location , restaurants , shops etc . His apartment is very close to two metro stations ( 5 min walk ), that we found very convienient when traveled with kids . The apartment was crystal clear, bed linen and towels completely new. Everything in the apartment was completely new. We were greeted with wine, complete kitchen equipment and in the bathroom soap and shampoo to use. We could easily left our luggages before and after check in (out). Next time we will definitely stay in Eduardos apartment .

Es un piso muy cómodo, bien ubicado, muy luminoso y en perfecto estado. La cocina con tope de granito y equipada. El Piso está ubicado en un edificio tranquilo , cerca de la línea del metro y andando llegas al centro para ver el río y los puentes o si te quieres ir de compras a  la calle principal Rua Catalina. La atención de Eduardo espectacular. El piso lo recomendamos sin problema.
Excelente estadia. Ótima localização, comunicação rápida, cômodos limpos e arejados, água quente, mimo na chegada.  Tudo agradável e conforme o publicado.

Un très bon séjour passé à Porto.
Eduardo a été très accueillant et l'appartement conforme à nos attentes.
Seul bémol, l'appartement un peu loin du centre.

Estadia sensacional! O apartamento fica muito bem localizado, perto da estação do metro Marques e com muitos autocarros. Apartamento com bom espaço, nos foi entregue bastante limpo e contando com todos os utensílios de cozinha, quartos e banho. O Eduardo foi um ótimo anfitrião, sempre solícito e gentil, sempre entrando em contato para ver se precisávamos de algo. Nos deixou vários mimos na nossa chegada, além de também deixar mimos para nossa cadelinha, que aliás, foi muito bem recebida. Excelente!! Recomendo com certeza!!

Very nice flat well equiped. 2 bedrooms with 2 big beds. Nice bathroom. All new.

Close to metro line - 5 min walk - and even to Porto center - 15/20 min walk .

Edouardo is very helpfull and easy communication. 

I recommend !

très bon accueil d'Edouardo, très présent par téléphone si besoin, tout au long de notre séjour, pour répondre à nos interrogations . Dans l'appt bien équipé, de quoi petit-déjeuner et boire plusieurs jours avant de faire des courses . très calme.

L’appartement d’Eduardo est bien situé, à moins de 5 min du métro.
Le logement est très propre et bien décoré.
Eduardo est très sympathique et flexible sur les horaires d’arrivée/départ.
Appartement correct bien équipé, propre près centre-ville. Seule nuisance bruyant.

O espaço do Eduardo é excelente, impecável, tinha tudo que poderíamos precisar, cheio de detalhes para dar mais conforto , encontramos a casa com vinho, cerveja, chás, petiscos... cozinha completa, banheiro muito bom, enfim é um apartamento com ótima localização também.
Apartamento bem localizado, limpo e com todas as comodidades. O Eduardo foi pontual no check in, nos deu dicas de transporte e locais a visitar. Adoramos a estadia e indicamos!

O Eduardo é um excelente anfitrião. Nos recebeu pessoalmente e ainda deixou vários mimos, incluindo vinho. Merece destaque especial neste ponto. O apartamento é muito confortável, aconchegante e funcional. Passeamos por Portotl todos os dias a pé. O apartamento situa-se próximo (20 minutos andando a um centro comercial e possui um restaurante a 2 minutos. Ótima experiência e recomendo à todos do AirBnB.

Excelente espaço e anfitrião perfeito. 
Fomos recebidos com vinho, café, sucos, frutas etc.
Recomendo!

A nossa estada em Porto foi perfeita.O Eduardo  foi super atencioso desde o início ...O apartamento é  aconchegante e bem localizado, pois fica num local de fácil acesso às  principais ruas e estação de metrô. É  um lugar que deixa saudades antes mesmo de partir... Foi tudo maravilhoso  e, com certeza, nos  hospedariamos novamente nesse lugar.Super recomendo!!

name: À Francos Metro Station 2
summary: Apartamento a 100 metros da estação Metro de Francos, para três pessoas. Apartamento novo  (julho 2018) ,cozinha  equipada, área de refeições, casa de banho e quarto/sala de estar com duas camas de solteiro e um sofá bastante confortável.  Tem um pátio  privativo muito agradável para a suas refeições A viagem de Metro até ao centro (Trindade) demora  7 minutos. Supermercado e farmácia nas proximidades. Espaço ideal para crianças, sem escadas:Óptimo pátio para brincar!  Cadeira para bébés:
space: Apenas a 3 minutos do apartamento tem também uma lavandaria para estadias mais longas e para se dirigir à praia basta apanhar o Metro para Matosinhos, demora cerca de 15 minutos. Acesso rápido ao centro da cidade de Metro viagem de   apenas 7 minutos. Pátio agradável para um final de tarde ,saboreando uma bebida ou um pequeno almoço matinal ao ar livre!
description: Apartamento a 100 metros da estação Metro de Francos, para três pessoas. name: Faisama Historical 1 • Design · NEW  · AC
summary: WHAT YOU MUST KNOW: • The elevator will be available ONLY from 30th of September • Located in the HEART of Porto (NEXT to Ribeira!) • Great accessibility (Close to S. Bento station) • Air conditioning • The apartment was luxuriously decorated • Hosts ALWAYS available for support ( (Hidden by Airbnb) ) • Large sofa bed • Free WiFi + CableTV + Netflix • Equipped with Self Check-in • Included: linens, coffee, hairdryer and more... __ WARNING: Works in progress in front of the apartment, there may be some noise
space: This apartment is the result of an architect renovation of a historical building. It seeks an harmonious blend of the Porto tradition (such as the wooden floor and window frames) with contemporary architecture. - Luxuriously finished and decorated, this apartment is the right choice for those who value a distinctive experience; - Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with all the essential amenities; - Amenities include bathroom essentials (shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper, towels, hair dryer, etc.); kitchen essentials (spices, extra virgin olive oil, coffee, tea, complimentary bottle of water, etc.); and others (iron & table, cleaning material, baby crib and high chair upon request, etc.); - Comfortable Pull-out couch that can accommodate 2 extra people; - Amazing design and readily available support.

It seeks an harmonious blend of the Porto tradition (such as the wooden floor and window frames) with contemporary architecture. - Luxuriously finished and decorated, this apartment is the right choice for those who value a distinctive experience; - Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with all the essential amenities; - Amenities include bathroom essentials (shampoo, shower gel, toilet paper, towels, h
neighborhood_overview: You are in the HEART of Porto city! What's near the apartment: - Restaurants - You're 5 minutes walk away from the very best restaurants in Porto city! And if you're feeling lazy, there are restaurants just in front of the building door with amazing local food! - Stores - There are some amazing stores right next to the apartment! - Groceries and bakery - just 3 minutes from the apartment - Bank & ATM - only 1 minute away - Pharmacy - 1 minute away - River - 2 minutes away from the apartment :)
notes: - The best way to get around is by public transportation. Leave the stress of traffic home and enjoy the city by foot! - Beware that there is an elevator in the building but you have to go up 2 flights of stairs before reaching it. - The apartment has a water boiler, if you are taking a shower for longer than 20 minutes, the hot water might start cooling down.
transit: • Bus - There is a bus stop 1-minute away from the apartment, you can get pretty much anywhere in the city on a low budget • Metro - The nearest metro station is "São Bento" 500 meters up the street • Tram - 10 minutes away there is a tram station to take you to FOZ (the beach) along the river. This is a panoramic trip - TOP! • Parking - The parking spots near the apartment are paid from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. There are parking garages available near the apartment • Boats - By the river you will find a lot of boats that travel up and down all day. Let us know if you want to take a trip!
access: - Guests have private access to the entire apartment. - The kitchen is fully equipped: necessary cooking ware; initial cooking kit including salt, pepper, extra-virgin olive oil, sugar; tableware including wine glasses, etc. - Other essential amenities: hair dryer, Iron & table, hangers, cleaning material, writing material, etc. - If there is anything important missing let us know and we'll provide it ASAP.
interaction: - We let our guests decide on the level of interaction they wish. - We are always available to help with local suggestions and are happy to meet up with our guests - We are readily available in the most used messaging systems: (Hidden by Airbnb) and iMessage, but also through call, Airbnb chat, email, etc.
house_rules: - Please refrain from making noise from 22h pm to 9h am

Es un apartamento bien situado, céntrico, y por la noche es bastante tranquilo. Todo nuevo y confortable.
A clean and beautifull flat, ideally located near the Douro river, in the old part of Porto.
Inmejorable situación, todo nuevo, espacioso y decorado con muy buen gusto. Hemos pasado cuatro días estupendos. Alojamiento recomendable!
La estancia es ideal, perfecta localizacion para pasar unos días en una ciudad tan bonita como Porto!
Todo perfecto. La ubicación inmejorable. Céntrico, limpio, cómodo, ideal para ir en familia. Un 10!

Super zentrale Lage, ausserordentlich schöne, sehr grosszügige Wohnung, ruhig.

High ceilings, clean, very comfortable stay. Great easy autonomous check-in, and great location.

L'appartement vient d'être refait à neuf, bien équipé et bien décoré. Surtout l'emplacement est parfait pour accéder aux sites touristiques. J'ai voyagé toute seule, je me sentais en sécurité. Sinon tout était parfait,  je trouve qu'il est idéal pour les jeunes couples, je recommande vivement.

The unit is very clean and cozy. The location is ideal and very close to many great restaurants, the bridge and many other interest points in Porto. As for the unit, it has everything needed to have a great stay. However, be warned of the construction that is happening next door, but since this is known upon booking, it should not be a concern. 

Overall great experience! We’d go again.
Great location and a beautiful home to stay in. Everything in the city center is accessible from the apartment. Would recommend it to anyone needing a place to stay in Porto.
Perfect location

This beautiful appartment is in the middle of the historical centre. Easy accessible from the airport via the Metro.  We were visiting Porto with our 7-month old baby and it was do-able :) the location was a big plus! I found Porto a beautiful city but also very clean, you can hear it from the appartment if they were picking up the glass-garbage. Our holiday was perfect with this appartment. Our batteries were recharged and we made new memories! Thanks Carolina! Grtz, Paul, Eveline and Mia!

Nos quedamos abosolutamente enamoradas de este apartamento. Es precioso (tiene una decoración llena de detalles con mucho gusto), ubicación inmejorable, una gran comunicación con Carolina, el checkin muy fácil, muy limpio, la cama muy cómoda y con los servicios básicos para hacerte el viaje más fácil. Sin duda, deseando volver a Oporto y a este apartamento: MARAVILLOSO!
Tout était parfait. L’emplacement également!

El apartamento de Carolina es tal como se indica en las fotos y mejor. Tiene mucha luz natural y mucho estilo. La ubicación es en pleno centro por lo que estás cerca de muchos monumentos y edificios emblemáticos. Cuando fuimos, como se indicaba en el anuncio, hay una obra justo al lado, que puede que hagan ruido entre semana, pero no molestan mucho.
Very clean place right in the middle of things. Hosts were very communicative and accommodating.
위치 짱짱이고 깨끗하고 호스트도 친절합니다. 가격대도 적당하고 괜찮았어요. 추천! 근데 주소는 좀 수정해야될듯요 구글 맵에 안찍혀서 찾는데 시간 꾀나 걸렸어요.

Perfect location in the heart of the city - your choice of restaurants, bars and landmarks are all within a short walking distance. Carolina is a very responsive and proactive host - thank you for making the stay so enjoyable!

We loved staying at Carolina's house. We enjoyed its centrality, ideal for a stroll, as well as staying at home, especially due to the interior architecture and good taste on the objects and decoration.

The position is good

Carolina's place is extremely well located - just a short walk away from all the attractions and with lots of bars and restaurants close by.

host.host_about:
Musicien et étudiant au doctorat, passionné de politique et des voyages!  L'appartement est propre,  accueillant et sécuritaire. Situé dans l'un des plus beaux quartiers de Montréal (parc Jeanne-Mance, Mont-Royal) il est aussi  à proximité d'à peu près tout (épiceries, cinémas, quartier des spectacles, théâtres, bars...). Les matelas sont neufs, la literies et les oreillers sont aussi neufs. Chaque chambre est munie d'un ventilateur et d'une télévision avec le câble. LBGT & 420 bienvenu, bienvenu à tous. 

Phd student and musicien here renting rooms in a clean and safe environment. The appartement is in the best spot in town, close to pretty much everything.   All beds are new, sheets and pillows are also brand new. Each room as a cable TV and a tower fan. LGBT & 420 friendly, welcome to my place!

reviews.comments: Philippe is an amazing host, the best we could ever wish for. He made our stay in Montréal unforgettable. He is very friendly and helpful person, anytime we asked him something he did his best to help us and he gave us great advices about the city as well. His place is very clean and full of special atmosphere and I am sure you will feel at him just like at home. We had there everything we needed and even more. Big advantage is also the location, close to downtown, great restaurants, bars and with the bus connection directly in the front. We definitely recommend Philippe’s place to everyone and we hope to return one day as well.

The place looks even better than in the photos - spacious and spotless, in a great, quirky location close to supermarkets and boutiques. It can feel a little further out from downtown, but It's not too long a walk, and there is a bus that stops right outside the apartment. It's very close to Mont Royal and many parks, so it's set in a beautiful location.

Philippe is an excellent host, quick to answer questions and very hospitable. Would recommend to anyone who does not want to stay in a loud, downtown area, but wants to get a feeling of the gorgeous Montreal!
Superbe appartement extrêmement bien placé! Propreté impeccable. Philippe a été adorable! Rien à redire

Literally feels like home!

Philippe is an incredible host who ensures you are always comfortable and you have everything you need - from hangers to detergent, to providing great tips on what to do in Montreal for free!

I have felt at home here. Photos will not do any justice, the decor, cleanliness and amenities available are fantastic!

Would highly recommend!!

Philippe was a friendly and responsive host from start to finish. The apt and bedroom were clean, stylish and comfortable.  The kitchen is modern and coffee is always available.  The washing machine/dryer  and parking spot were great additions!  A great location in Montreal and quick trip to everything.  A great stay!
Philippe’s home was clean and centrally located. We checked in late at night and he was very accommodating and even had a parking spot available for us. Thank you Philippe for a great stay!
An incredible host with an incredible place! I honestly don't know what I would have done without Philippe. He truly went above and beyond - he made me feel right at home. 11/10 would recommend.

Philippe is a great host and the place is very accessible to the downtown main attractions.
Would love to go to his place again.

name: Cosy, Comfy & Central in Potts Point
summary: Discover the vibrancy of Sydney by staying in your own Art Deco apartment in the heart of trendy Potts Point. Immerse yourself in the culture of Sydney and explore everything this beautiful city has to offer. Super Comfy and Super central,  you'll find everything you need to enjoy a quiet night in or to seek out the perfect night out!
space: With high ceilings and original Art Deco features, this is a super comfy apartment is equipped with all the necessities for your Sydney Stay.  The location is unbeatable, with an easy walk to the CBD and great public transport close by.  In the heart of cultural Potts Point, the apartment is quiet enough to hide away from the hustle and bustle yet still have all the city conveniences at your doorstep. Enjoy beautiful Rushcutters Bay, cafe's and vibrant cocktail bars! This my home so whilst it is clean, comfy and with all the conveniences you'd expect and need, it is not a hotel room!
