Please feel free to enjoy my home as your own! My apartment is managed b
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly positioned between the vibrant urban villages of Darlinghurst and Potts Point.  Surrounded by dozens of excellent cafes, restaurants, bars and boutique shopping. Oxford Street is just moments away and the green space of Hyde Park and the beautiful Botanic Gardens are within walking distance. This is a great place to base yourself on a visit to Sydney.
notes: While the apartment is suitable for infants, you will need to provide a travel cot or similar for them. There is a sofa bed in the lounge room which older children can use. Please let me know so that linen can be provided. It is probably not ideal for a longer stay but completely fine for a few nights.
transit: The apartment is less than a 5 minutes walk from Kings Cross train station and bus stops, making heading into the CBD, Bondi and the Eastern suburbs a breeze. Getting around is easy by foot. On street parking is permit controlled and can be tricky given the inner city location. The hotel does offer discounted car vouchers to a nearby parking station.
access: Please feel free to enjoy my home as your own!
interaction: My apartment is managed by the friendly team at a local boutique hotel who will be very happy to assist you during your stay.
house_rules: As this is my home, my neighbours are friends, please be respectful of noise.

host.host_location: Potts Point, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
I am a young professional working and living in the Potts Point area. I am passionate about food and I love discovering all the sneaky secrets that Sydney has to offer! 
My vibrant team and I work out of the Regents Court building from 8 am - 8 pm Monday - Friday and 9 am - 4 pm on weekends. We are always available to share our favourite places with you and  are here to ensure you enjoy your stay in Sydney.

reviews.comments: Great cozy apartment. Just as described.  Quiet neighborhood, or at least where this place is was quiet.  A short walk to the Kings Cross subway station so it is well situated.  The staff at the Regent Court where you pick up the keys was super friendly and helpful and very responsive via email.  I would absolutely recommend to others or stay there again myself the next time I'm in Sydney.

We loved staying in this cosy flat, it’s so charming and it felt like home right away. The location is great – close to all the action but on a quiet street and everything just felt fun and easy. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us!
Very stylish and great flashback to the past with the Art Deco! Highly accessible to downtown Sydney!

My husband and I loved our stay at John’s apartment. We booked for 2 weeks and ended up extending another week! The location is the biggest drawcard, being so central and close to kingscross station along with lots of great cafes (Jeremy & Sons, Room 10, Primary Coffee) and restaurants (buffalo dining club and Apollo). The apartment itself is super cute and welcoming. John was always on hand to help with everything we needed. Thank you for having us!
John has a really comfortable apartment. Potts Point is a pretty neighborhood. Checking in was easy. We are all in all very ppleased with our stay.
A really interesting period apartment.

host.host_about:
Life is not just about working for me, it's mostly about enjoying the moments by doing the things I like to do. I like running, travelling, reading, dancing and to watch movies I really enjoy travelling all around the world (as long as I have a visa and money:)). I love to read detective stories, classic novels. I really really enjoy to spend every possible moment of life with the company of the music(the kind depends on my mood). 

I don't consider myself just as a host. If I am avaliable at that time, I would help you through where to drink, eat, go in Istanbul. 

My life motto : 'Work if it's necessary, travel if it's possible.'

reviews.comments:
The apartment is spacious and clean. There is everything you need. The location is great, in the center of Beşiktaş ( a very vibrant and hippy neighborhood but the apart is a bit of an uphill) . It is close to public transport (buses and mini buses can easily take you anywhere). Lots of restaurants and supermarkets within a walking distance from the apt. We stayed with Selen's house mate, Tuģçe. She is a wonderful host. She gave us tips and advice. She was very friendly and helpful and she has a cute dog as well!
 Communication with both, Selen and Tuğçe was very easy. Highly recommended. We loved our stay, thanks alot.

name: Cute Eixample Apartment.  HUTB-005692
summary: This cute and stylish apartment is located in the left part of the Eixample neighbourhood. Spacious and recently fully refurbished. This 100m2 flat is fully furnished, it has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with all its amenities, fully equipped kitchen, spacious and stylish lounge with flat TV, and a bright dining room. It has aircon and centralized heating. Free Wifi is also provided.
space: 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and the other 2 with 2 single beds each, 2 bathrooms, one with shower and one with tube & both with all amenities (hair dresser, soap, shampoo, towels, toilet paper, etc), an stylish and spacious lounge with flat TV and a bright and cozy dining room. There is also a fully equipped kitchen with all amenities (washing machine, dishwashwer, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffee machine, kettle & toaster and all kitchen utensils). Iron also provided. With both central heating and aircon. We will provide you with towels and sheets. Free wifi is also provided.

It has aircon and centralized heating. Free Wifi is also provided. 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 with a double bed and the other 2 with 2 single beds each, 2 bathrooms, one with shower and one with tube & both with all amenities (hair dresser, soap, shampoo, towels, toilet paper, etc), an stylish and spacious lounge with flat TV and a bright and cozy dining room. There is also a fully equipped kitchen with all amenities (washing machine, dishwashwer, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffee machine, kettle & toaster and all kitchen utensils). Iron also provided. With both central heating and aircon. We will provide you with towels and sheets. Free wifi is also provided. You can make use of
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Eixample. The Eixample is a chic and central Barcelona neighbourhood, full of good restaurants ranging in style and price. Strategic location, with plenty of life during the day but quiet at night. By a 3 minuts walk from the apartment you have Sants Metro & train station (which takes you straightly to Sagrada Familia in 5 minuts (metro) and to Plaza Catalunya (train)). Nearby you have a lot of shops, supermarkets and nice restaurants raging in style and price.
notes: Touristic Rental License - HUTB-005692 Touristic Tax is not included on price and is 2,5€ per person and night (upto 7 nights). Check ins after 22h will incur a fee of 30€.
transit: Ideal location, well connected to bus, train and metro lines. At only 3 minuts walk from the apartment you have Sants Metro and train station,  which connects all the city and the city itself with nearby cities and touristic or coastal spots outside the city.
interaction: You can make use of the full apartment with no restrictions. We will also provide you with all the information you need to know from nearby the apartment so you can feel as a local!
house_rules: 1. Do not cause nuisance to neighbours, observe the hours of silence to respect are: from 9 pm, until 9am.  This is a legal obligation in the city of Barcelona . For the same reason, do not walk in heels indoors during that period of time. Note that the apartment is in a residential building where families live and need peace and quiet . The problems caused by this reason will result in eviction of the apartment and the loss of all amounts paid. 2. There is totally forbidden to have parties, play music at high volume, shout or make any noise that might disturb the neighbors. The problems caused by this reason Will result on eviction of the apartment inmediately and the loss of all amounts paid. 3. Stay in the apartment more people registered and unreported to the entrance of the  apartment, will result on eviction of the  apartment and the loss of all amounts paid. 4. The landlord has an apartment insurance does not cover the personal property of tenants. 5. It requires the tenant to c

host.host_about:
Hola!  I am passionate about travelling, meeting new people and getting to know about other cultures. 
Proud of my city, there is no better feeling that helping those who come visit to have an amazing time discovering it and making their stay as enjoyable and hassle-free as possible!

name: Quelhas Apartment
house_rules: - Please, be silent between 22:00h (10:00 p.m.) till 09:00h (9:00 a.m.) - Please, be polite to all the neighbors. - Please, respect the building; do not throw or leave trash in the common hall and corridors.

host.host_about:
My name is Ana Quelhas, and I decided to start renting my long time family apartment in the city of Porto. 

Our staff have many partners and contacts in house renting in the city, so we always find a solution when the reservations are full. 

Please, don't hesitate to aks tips when you are traveling around Portugal!

reviews.comments:
We stayed for five days in Porto with a friend of mine. 

The flat was absolutely consistent with the description. 

Completely clean. 

Shops, and restaurants in a couple of minutes from the apartment. 

Highly recommended place !

name: Copacabana Beach - One block
summary: One block from the beach. GREAT LOCATION. Security, bars and restaurants, pharmacies, banks. Quiet apartment.
space: One single room with double bed, air, fan, sofa bed for 2, cable TV, microwave, refrigerator, stove, coffee maker, iron, wireless. SUPER PRIME LOCATION CLOSE TO EVERYTHING BLOCK FROM THE BEACH COPACABANA
description: One block from the beach. GREAT LOCATION. Security, bars and restaurants, pharmacies, banks. Quiet apartment. One single room with double bed, air, fan, sofa bed for 2, cable TV, microwave, refrigerator, stove, coffee maker, iron, wireless. SUPER PRIME LOCATION CLOSE TO EVERYTHING BLOCK FROM THE BEACH COPACABANA doorman until 8 p.m, concierge confidence. 24 hours by whattsapp, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), email, phone. Easy to reach from the airports GIG and SDU By buses, taxis and metro. The apartment is between two metro stations. The apartment is in the best location in the neighborhood, easy to get taxis. There is a bus stop in front of the building. Extremely easy to get around the city I am always available to help and answer all questions !!!

house_rules: The most important rule is to be happy and enjoy the stay in my apartment. The rest are the basic rules for the organization, cleaning and care of the local items!

host.host_about: Sou carioca e amo minha cidade. Adoro curtir o dia, ir a praia, e praticar esportes ao ar livre. Meu maior lazer é ouvir um bom samba junto dos amigos. Gosto de futebol e sou Fluminense !!!

reviews.comments: Muy lindo departamento, tal cual lo descrito, La ubicación excelente a una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana, en un lugar comercial y muy seguro. Paula fue muy amable con nosotros ya que nos contestos todas nuestras dudas antes de concretar. Gracias Paula pasamos un hermoso Mundial Brasil 2014.

Ótima anfitriã! Nos deu várias dicas de deslocamento lá... 
Apartamento super organizado e a localização é excelente, recomendo!

Obrigada pela estadia Paula, espero voltar outras vezes e indicar para outras pessoas! 

Abraço
Todo Excelente! Paula y el padre nos atendieron bárbaro. El depto muy bueno y en inmejorable ubicación!

Apartamento da Paula está impecável, em uma localização excelente. Ponto de ônibus na frente com acesso a qualquer lugar, duas quadras do metro, próximo ao copacabana Palace,  e a praia tem facílimo acesso, na rua atrás ao AP.  O apartamento é amplo e espaçoso, tem todos os utensílios, com certeza vale a pena a visita. Recomendo a todos. Supera todas as expectativas, com certeza.
Gostei muito do ap e estava tudo muito organizado e limpo para nossa chegada. A internet funciona bem, ótima localização. Recomendo!

Paula is a very nice and kind person. She has small, but welcome apartment in the very nice neighborhood. Her place is very clean and well organized; if you decided to rent this apartment you will fill at home. The grocery store and ATMs are located in the same building, which was very convenient for us, since we liked to have breakfast and dinner at home. It is very close to two subway stations. We had very nice time in Rio and not a small part of it was the place we stayed, thanks to Paula and her family.

Excelente apartamento. Muito boa localização. Valor bem acessível. 
Recomendo...
O apartamento é muito bom. A Paula foi uma ótima anfitriã, ajudou em tudo que precisamos. Recomendo.

Quero publicamente parabenizar a anfitriã Paula, pelo apartamento aconchegante, organizado e limpo, localização perfeita para quem gosta de dormir com o barulhinho do mar, prédio super seguro e muito familiar... Vou recomendar a tod@s amigo@s que curtem viajar, mas todos os anos 7 dias serão para minha família, este é nosso projeto mais importante... José Fernandes da Luz.
O apartamento está em ótima localização a uma quadra da praia ,limpo e muito bem conservado. Além disso , Paula foi uma excelente anfitriã que nos ajudou em todas as nossas solicitações.

El apartamento se encuentra en óptimas condiciones, limpio, organizado y seguro, la localización esta excelente cerca de la parada de bus, de la playa y a unas pocas cuadras del metro, espero poder volver pronto a visitar Rio y alojarme de nuevo en tu apartamento, un grande abrazo, y mil gracias!

O apartamento é ótimo, muito limpo, organizado, sem falar na localização (uma quadra da praia). Estava tudo conforme combinado e a Paula se mostrou muito atenciosa e prestativa. Recomendo o aluguel do apartamento. Voltaremos com certeza. Obrigada. Um grande abraço.

El departamento es pequeño pero confortable, tiene todo lo que dice tener, es ideal para una pareja sola y con hasta dos hijos tambien. El lugar de ubicacion super seguro, y a sus alrededores tiene todo lo que necesitas como bancos, supermercados etc. Salimos todas las noches a caminar por el muelle. Todos los conserges muy amables, en especial Gilvan, nos entendiamos como podiamos pero siempre dispuesto a ayudar. A Paula no la conoci pero desde que use este sitio y la contacte siempre me evacuo mis consultas y dudas, estando alla por Watsapp tmb. Lo recomiendo y volveria a Rio q es super lindo.

Excelente ubicación, a una cuadra de la playa. Con variedad lugares para comer, supermercados y cajeros a la puerta del apartamento. El apartamento es tal cual se ve en la fotos, cómodo y limpio. Si bien no nos vimos a paula en persona, ella siempre estuvo atenta y rápida para responder todas nuestras consultas. De todas formas volvería a quedarme en este lugar.

A Paula é uma excelente anfitriã, sempre atendendo as ligações e facilitando algum procedimento solicitado. O apartamento é exatamente o que promete ser, destacando-se pela localização e existência dos itens de cama e mesa necessários para uma estada tranquila. O wi-fi também funcionou perfeitamente.

A estadia foi ótima! O apartamento é exatamente o que se vê nas fotos. Limpo, organizado e com ótima localização (perto da praia, farmácia, restaurantes, mercados, etc). Tudo funcionou muito bem.
Quando precisei, Paula foi muito atenciosa resolvendo qualquer (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei em uma próxima oportunidade!

Recomendo o site e em especial o apartamento da anfitriã Paula. O apt é aconchegante,  limpinho, numa ótima localização. Localizada na Av que se acha de tudo e pertinho da praia. Agradeço ao site e a anfitriã pela segurança e comodidade em nos proporcionar belos momentos em família.

Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr gut, der Strand ist nah, nebenan ist direkt ein Supermarkt, das Haus ist gut gesichert (Pförtner, Video - Überwachung). Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. 
Als wir ankamen, bekamen wir sofort den Schlüssel, im Kühlschrank waren kalte Getränke, alles Erforderliche war in der Wohnung.
Am letzten Tag konnten wir bis abends in der Wohnung bleiben. Alle Nachfragen wurden von Paula prompt beantwortet.

O apartamento tem uma localização muito conveniente. Perto de tudo e distante apenas uma quadra da praia de Copacabana! Para fazer caminhadas na praia a noite é bastante seguro. Tem um supermercado do lado, o que facilita bastante. 
Ficamos em 4 adultos e nos atendeu confortavelmente. 
A Paula foi muito gentil ao flexibilizar horários de entrada e saída.
Recomendo!!! 
Obrigado!
Apartamento muito bem localizado em Copacabana. A anfitriã nos deixou totalmente a vontade, disponibilizando tudo que necessitávamos para nossa viagem. Recomendo a hospedagem no ap da Paula!

We felt very welcome in this very nice flat! We had everything we need! The area is very nice with a lot of restaurants and supermercado and we enjoyed really everything! We recommand Paula's flat! It has everything it promised. It's very quiet and the neighbors were very nice with us and communicativ. Thank you so much!

A Paula foi uma excelente anfitriã, atendendo às solicitações e dúvidas, de forma atenciosa e rápida, além de dar dicas bem legais sobre pontos turísticos do RJ. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, seguro, limpo, organizado e silencioso. Pequeno, mas muito funcional- tudo exatamente como é descrito no site.  Acomoda bem 4 pessoas, está localizado ao lado de um supermercado e farmácia, muito próximo à praia e a 5 minutos a pé do metrô. Internet, roupa de cama e banho, produtos de limpeza, papel higiênico, utensílios básicos de cozinha... tudo o que é necessário para uma estadia tranquila e com "poucas malas", ou com crianças está disponível. Recomendo e voltarei a me hospedar sempre que for ao RJ!
The location was excellent and in general we were happy with the apartment. Paula was easy to reach and very flexible.

Apartamento ótimo, exatamente como mostra nas fotos. Localização boa, perto do supermercado Pão de Açúcar, farmácias, restaurantes e praia. A Paula muito atenciosa, se preocupou com os detalhes do começo ao fim! recomendo!

GOSTEI DO APARTAMENTO DA PAULA.  FICA PERTO DA PRAIA, DE TRANSPORTES PÚBLICOS. É SILENCIOSO, APESAR DE ESTAR LOCALIZADO NA AV N. SRA DE COPACABANA.   O PORTEIRO É MUITO GENTIL. SE VOLTAR AO RIO (O QUE PRETENDO) FICAREI  NELE. RECOMENDO.    

ANA

Nossa estadia no apto da Paula foi excelente! Paula foi super atenciosa conosco desde nosso pedido, até o momento de nosso check out. 
Paula também foi super flexível, nos autorizando tanto fazer Check in mais cedo e check our mais tarde. 
O apto é aconchegante e perto de tudo. Super perto da praia, bares, lanchonetes, super-mercados, (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendamos e voltaremos a nos hospedar com a Paula!

Fiquei no apto da Paula com minha família, tudo conforme as fotos e descrição, bairro maravilhoso perto de tudo!!! Facilidade de mobilidade, muito bom, recomendo e se voltar ao Rio me hospedo com certeza outra vez! A Paula sempre muito atenciosamente quando solicitamos... obrigada por tudo!!! Minha primeira experiência no airbnb tb, tudo maravilhoso.

Experiência excelente!
A Paula foi muito atenciosa desde o momento da reserva.
Não precisamos solicitá-la para nada durante a estadia, porque o apartamento realmente tinha tudo o que precisávamos e estava tudo conforme combinado.
Como descrito no anúncio, o apartamento é pequeno e acomoda bem 4 pessoas. Eu acredito que até 5 ficariam sem nenhum problema, se o intuito for passar mais tempo passeando.
É muito próximo da Praia de Copacabana, um quarteirão, o que facilita tudo, transporte, alimentação e etc.
O apartamento está muito novo, com tudo funcionando perfeitamente, ar condicionado, ventiladores, chuveiro, TV, microondas, luzes, secador de cabelo.
A Paula disponibiliza roupas de cama e banho, travesseiros, talheres, copos, tudo em excelente qualidade.
A única coisa que não gostei muito foi do sofá-cama. Mas estava dentro do padrão, é um pouco duro, levaria um colchonete pra colocar por cima. Colocamos o edredom e deu pra dormir tranquilamente.
Super silencioso, dormimos bem.
Quanto a segurança, nos sentimos muito seguros, apesar de estarmos no fim de semana do Rock in Rio e terem ocorridos vários arrastões. Nós tivemos sorte e não vimos nada.
Enfim, super recomendado! Voltaria para esse apartamento com certeza!

A casa estava arrumada e limpa quando chegamos. Aconchegante o ambiente e super confortável .A localização é muito boa ,perto dos principais pontos turísticos do Rio . Recomendo para todos ficar no apartamento da Paula que também é muito atenciosa .

O apartamento da Paula está muito bem localizado. Próximo da praia e de várias opções de restaurante. Perfeito!!! É pequeno, mas atende bem quatro pessoas. Encontramos o local limpo e organizado. A Paula muito solícita para nos atender sempre que precisamos, dando dicas sobre a cidade e sobre como economizar nos passeios.  Esteve acessível em todo o período da nossa hospedagem. A cama do quarto é bastante confortável, chuveiro ótimo e toalhas limpas nos esperando. Adoramos a delicadeza da água e da coca-cola na geladeira.  Local seguro para sair tanto durante o dia quanto à noite. Vale a pena!

O apartamento da Paula é exatamente como nas fotos e atende muito bem até 4 pessoas. Tudo muito limpo e organizado. A localização não poderia ser melhor, estamos somente 1 rua atrás da orla e é de fácil acesso à ônibus, táxis, restaurantes e etc... precisamos adiar a chegada muitas horas e isso não foi problema. É silencioso e aconchegante.

Paula's flat was perfect for our time in Rio de Janeiro, perfectly clean and tight,  we really felt confortable ( 4 people ) the room with the air conditioning is really confortable and quiet, and the canape in the livingroom as well, really confortable too. you got all you need to cook in the flat, the area around it's really nice, you got all the commerce, restaurants, shops, super markets etc. everything you need and it's just 2 block away from the beach, that's were we parked our car by the way, dealing with the guys who guards the cars we paid 10 reales for all the night. 
we really recomend this place.

A Paula sempre foi muito rápida nas respostas e passou muita confiança em relação ao apartamento.  Todas as dúvidas foram sanadas e o apartamento é igualzinho ao que está nas fotos, muito bem cuidado com tudo funcionando perfeitamente (inclusive o ar condicionado).
Paula was very good host very nice apartment very convenient I would stay there again very very nice very convenient

Paula, anfitriã de primeiríssima, sempre muito atenciosa e, já é da segunda vez que nos hospedamos em seu apartamento. A localização é das melhores em Copacabana, sentimo-nos como se estivéssemos em nossa casa... Recomendamos!!!
A viagem foi ótima e a Paula deixou tudo como combinado, o apartamento é perfeito!
O apartamento corresponde exatamente ao anúncio, é muito bom, excelente localização, tem tudo que se precisa para uma temporada, os porteiros são atenciosos, o apartamento limpo, gostamos muito!

Estimada Paula te agradezco tu hospitalidad, el detalle de dejarnos refrescos y agua cuando llegamos el primer día se agradece, tu departamento es muy acogedor, mi grupo eramos 4 personas, mis dos hijos mas una sobrina y yo.  La cama del dormitorio principal es cómoda y pueden dormir 2 personas perfectamente  y    el aire acondicionado del dormitorio es fantástico, también en el sofá cama de la sala pueden dormir  2 personas, definitivamente la ubicación es privilegiada,  esta a menos de dos cuadras de la playa,  y al lado del edificio hay un supermercado y cajeros para sacar dinero, ademas en esta calla encuentras muchas casas de cambio. El baño es de lujo, buena ducha todo perfecto.  La cocina a pesar de ser pequeña tiene refrigerador, microondas, cocina, licuadora, es ideal para poder tomar alguna comidas en el departamento. Realmente fue una muy buena experiencia quedarnos en tu departamento. Espero volver pronto a tu ciudad maravillosa. Gracias!!!! Paula

Reservei para os meus pais, eles amaram o apartamento, tudo organizado, adoraram os mimos, pois chegaram morrendo de sede e tinha água na geladeira! E estava tudo extremamente organizado. Super recomendo!
Foi uma ótima experiência, o apartamento perfeito e os cuidados da Paula com os hóspedes foram ótimos. Quando voltarei ao Rio procurarei alugar o mesmo apartamento. Realmente muito bom.

Paula excelente anfitriona, siempre dispuesta a orientarnos, el apartamento esta en muy buenas condiciones tal como lo describe en sus fotos, esperamos poder pasar unas vacaciones mas largas en Rio y volver a hospedarnos nuevamente aqui!

El departamento es super comodo y acojedor, la zona es muy buena y centrica. Cuando llegamos, Paula nos habìa dejado gaseosas y agua en la heladera.
Lo unico malo es que si el aire acondicionado està prendido, no se puede usar el agua caliente del baño, porque sino se corta la luz.
Pero es super recomendable y muy lindo para pasar las vacaciones!

We had a wonderful time at Paula's place. The neighborhood is great, having a supermarket in the same block and a parking at one block. Really well located to go to Maracana, Pao de Azucar and Christ. The place is exactly how it's described and last but not least, Paula had a nice gesture by receiving us with water and cokes on the fridge.
Con mi grupo de amigos la pasamos supero que bien el departamento lindo Paula gran anfitriona gracias por todo esperamos volver :)

Foi uma experiência maravilhosa. O apartamento é bem localizado, limpo e completo. quando chegamos ja tinha água e refrigerante na geladeira. É praticamente na esquina da praia e perto de padarias, banco, supermercado e restaurante. Todos super atenciosos e um lugar bem tranquilo para ficar. Atendeu totalmente as nossas necessidades durante a nossa passagem pelo Rio. Super recomendo! Muito obrigada Paula por toda a atenção.

Adorei a estádia no apartamento da Paula. O apartamento Eh super bem localizado, próximo à tudo :) 
A Paula foi super atenciosa. Recomendo muito o apartamento :)

Adoramos o apartamento da Paula. Muito bem equipado, confortável e suuuuuuper bem localizado! 
Fomos recebidos com o mimo de água e refeigerante geladinhos, toalhas de banho e roupa de cama todas separadinhas e amarradas com laços. Enfim, muito cuidado com os detahes! Além disso, a Paula foi super comunicativa :) 
Indicamos!!
La ubicación del departamento es excelente, está  a una cuadra de las playas de Copabana. Lo recomiendo.

Fomos em 4 pessoas passar o FDS! Adoramos tudo...o apto é super aconchegante. .limpinho...exatamente igual às fotos! A localização é excelente, um quarteirão da praia, com farmácia, mercado, lanchonete e metro próximo! A Paula foi super atenciosa e nos respondeu sempre que tivemos dúvida! Super recomendo!

O apartamento estava limpo, o interior como nas fotos, não conhecemos a Paula pessoalmente, mas ela se preocupou em nos receber bem, a geladeira tinha agua e refrigerantes. A cama é confortável, a internet é rapida, a localização é excelente, perto de tudo. O chuveiro esquenta, mas não muito, talvez seja por que estava fazendo muito frio nos dias da nossa estadia.

Se vc está procurando um excelente lugar para se hospedar, acabou de achar!! O apartamento é lindo, muito bem equipado e super limpo. Tinha lido os comentários dos outros hóspedes e criei muita expectativa. Todas foram superadas! O lugar é incrível. A localização é perfeita!! O apartamento é praticamente na praia e cercado de restaurantes, além do q tem um supermercado do lado. Paula é uma excelente anfitriã, atenciosa, carinhosa e simpática demais. Recomendo fortemente este lugar. Me senti em casa e fez com q minha experiência no Rio fosse incrível.

Anfitriã muito atenciosa e gentil, sempre respondeu rapidamente as nossas dúvidas. Localização excelente, sem necessidade de utilizarmos o carro. O apartamento idêntico as fotos e tem tudo, não faltou (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos. Super recomendo.
A acomodação foi ótima, valor acessível, a passos de praticamente tudo... ( praia, bancos, supermecado, metrô, farmácia, restaurante.... Etc...

Boa experiencia.
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos.
A Localizacao É SUPER-HIPER 10.
Perto do Metro e tem um monte de lojas por perto. Restaurante, supermercado, lanchonetes tem de tudo.
Perto do Metro Siqueira Campos.
Eu utilizei o apartamento da Paula para ir ver os Jogos do RIO 2016.

Deu tudo certo.

A Paula foi prestativa e deu tudo certo.

Custo X Beneficio de acrdo.

Boa TV e INTERNET.

A nossa estadia durante os jogos olímpicos foi ótima. Chegamos e estava tudo limpinho e arrumado. A Paula sempre pronta para responder qualquer dúvida. A localização não podia ser melhor!! Pertinho do metro, com muitos ônibus circulando, supermercado, padaria, farmácia e até unimed!  O preço também foi bem justo mesmo durante os (Website hidden by Airbnb) ctz procurarei o apartamento da Paula quando voltar para o Rio!
Great area - close to the beach, restaurants, grocery, shopping areas, etc...

Ótima estadia. O apartamento tem excelente localização e comodidade.
Recomendo para quem quiser passar dias no RJ.
Ótimo custo x benefício. Super recomendo.

I had very good time at Paula's place, it's in nice area very close to the beach, has everything you need for comfortable stay in Rio. Even iron which was so important for my girlfriend. You know you need iron before going to take photos at Corcovado and Sugar Loaf ;) We took the keys from the doorman and then returned to him. Didn't meet Laura personally but she was kind to answer to all our questions. We were happy to find Churrascaria restaurant nearby, place and food i recommend with two hands. Laura's apartment too :)
Muy buen ubicado el apto, nos gustó mucho. Perfecto y limpio. Perfecto para vacaciones.

O apartamento é ótimo, ideal para até 4 pessoas. A localização é ótima perto de tudo como praias, restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia, bancos e etc. O apartamento também é limpo possui internet e televisão a cabo.
Recomendo e voltarei com certeza.
Apartamento bem localizado.  Perto da praia, metrô,  supermercados e até lojas de souvenir. Tem porteiro 24 hoje o que dá muita segurança e tranquilidade no acesso.

Estive hospedada com mais três amigas no apartamento da Paula.
Ficamos bem acomodadas. 
As roupas de cama e de banho bem limpas e cheirosas. 
A Paula é uma anfitriã atenciosa que nos atendeu prontamente, quando precisamos. 
Voltarei a me hospedar, com certeza, em outras ocasiões

El departamento tiene todas las comodidades descriptas. Me encontré con lo que estaba publicado. Paula estuvo siempre a nuestra disposición para lo que necesitemos. Nos espero con agua y gaseosas en la heladera.
Great apartment. Centrally located to everything. One block away from Copacabana Beach, which is awesome. The apartment is super cool, and cozy. I would definitely love to stay here again.

The place is very well located, clean, cosy and near by public transport, Copacabana beach, restaurants, supermarket and other shops. Ana Paula is a very responsive host and made it very easy for me and my parents. Highly recommend to everyone! Thank you Ana Paula!

Estivemos hospedados no Apto da Paula no último final de semana! Apesar de a locação ter sido de última hora, a comunicação entre nós as avaliações anteriores foram fatores decisivos para nossa escolha! Recomendamos (e muito!) este imóvel para sua hospedagem em Copacabana! Muito obrigado, Paula! Abraços!
A Paula é muito gentil e as informações descritas no anúncio do imóvel estão de acordo com o encontrado no local. Assim nada a reclamar, somente agradecer pela hospitalidade.

Just good location.

O apartamento tem uma excelente localização. Fica ao lado de um Pão de Açúcar e de uma drogaria, bem como fica há alguns passos da praia! Ponto de ônibus em frente. Internamente, é bem equipado, contém utensílios domésticos e equipamentos de cozinha, além de ar condicionado (quase não utilizamos por termos ido no período de inverno), televisão grande, chuveiro elétrico, cama espaçosa, sofá espaçoso...enfim, tudo o que é necessário para curtir a cidade do RJ e ter uma excelente estadia. Como uma dica para os visitante da cidade: Pessoas que se dizem Uber e que esperam passageiros  dentro do aeroporto  e lhe abordam falando baixo, não são confiáveis: O que nos atendeu, cobrou R$ 100,00 do Galeão para Copacabana. Após, utilizando o aplicativo, descobrimos que o percurso não chega a R$70,00, portanto, cuidado, MELHOR utilizar o aplicativo, tirar o print do valor apresentado e após, caso o valor ultrapasse, basta apresentar o print ao motorista. No mais, todos os demais pontos visitados com saída do apartamento, não pagamos valores acima de R$15,00. Ou seja, excelente custo benefício. Pretendo retornar em breve.

host.host_about:
Dear guest, Daniel here! I'm an Engineer who is investing in Real Estate, particularly on Airbnbs. In my free time (which is little, unfortunately) I play the guitar and go out with friends!

I just love the concept of having a home everywhere you go and that's why I'm attracted to the Airbnb life. I want to let you know that all is well planned for your stay and that I keep perfecting my systems everyday, exploring new technology and ways to communicate, in order to improve my guests' experience!

I am an avid traveler myself, so I know that we all want a nice place that feels like home while we are away. Count me in to make this experience as close to that as it can be.

All I ask from you in return of my hard work in preparring a home for you is: 
1. Please read my listing carefully.
2. Book only if my listing suits you. Better to be slective first, than disapointed later!

Thank you!
Daniel

description: habitación en el turistico barrio de barceloneta a pasos de la playa, dispone de una habitacion con cama doble, con la posibilidad de utilizar la cocina y todos los servicios,wifi, importante que les gusten las mascotas(perro,gato). Soy una chica Chilena, estudiante de doctorado, tranquila que disfruta de la grata compañia,tener una buena interaccion con mis huespedes y guiarlos para que tengan una buena estadia en la ciudad La Barceloneta es un barrio marinero del distrito de Ciutat Vella de Barcelona.Actualmente, el barrio sigue teniendo ese aire de pueblo ajeno a la ciudad que siempre le ha caracterizado. Pero el ambiente ha cambiado mucho, sobre todo, en ver
neighborhood_overview: La Barceloneta es un barrio marinero del distrito de Ciutat Vella de Barcelona.Actualmente, el barrio sigue teniendo ese aire de pueblo ajeno a la ciudad que siempre le ha caracterizado. Pero el ambiente ha cambiado mucho, sobre todo, en verano. Su playa es una de las más animadas de la ciudad tanto de día como de noche, cuando abren los chiringuitos y bares musicales instalados en la misma arena donde se puede ir a cenar o a tomar una copa hasta altas horas de la madrugada.Junto a esta cara moderna, la Barceloneta sigue oliendo a sal y a ambiente marinero. Para muchos es todo un lujo que todavía se conserve un barrio de este tipo en una ciudad como Barcelona. Y es que resulta algo extraño que junto a calles estrechas, húmedas y ennegrecidas por el salitre, convivan alguno de los mejores restaurantes de la ciudad y atraquen lujosos barcos.
notes: Se recomienda comprar agua envasada (evitar beber agua del grifo), se dispone de jarra con filtro para el agua
transit: Estacion de metro Barceloneta linea amarilla a 5 minutos caminando, autobus parada playa Barceloneta Nº 59,45,D20, caminando se puede llegar a los barrios de alrededor como el Born,Gotico,Rabal, Plaza Cataluñia. Existe parking a los alrededores del edificio. Desde el aeropuerto se puede acceder en renfe (tren) hacia estacion Sants con transbordo a estacion francia (6 estaciones en total , aprox 30 minutos,) y luego caminar 10 minutos o tomar autobus D20,59,45 parada Barceloneta y luego caminar 1 cuadra hacia el piso, tambien en taxi o en aerobus que los deja en plaza catalunya y luego autobus 59 (tomar en la rambla de catalunya) o metro linea amarilla (tomar en plaza urquinaona) bajarse en parada barceloneta y caminar 8 minutos al piso
access: luz,agua (caliente y fria),telefono,wifi,cocina ,nevera, microondas,plancha,secador de pelo.Pueden cocinar, utilizar todos los espacios del piso, no se da desayuno. El edificio no cuenta con ascensor (4º piso).
interaction: Soy una chica Chilena, estudiante de doctorado, tranquila que disfruta de la grata compañia,tener una buena interaccion con mis huespedes y guiarlos para que tengan una buena estadia en la ciudad
house_rules: Es un ambiene tranquilo, evitar ruidos en horarios de descanso (11pm a 9 am), Limpieza y orden del lugar, se permite fumar en la terraza, se cancela a la llegada al lugar, perdidas de llaves 25 euros, se deben responsabilizar si causan  algun daño en la propiedad o utensilios de ella ( ejemplo utensilios de cocina).

host.host_about:
Veterinaria,gusto de las mascotas, vivo en un ambiente muy tranquilo, especial para desconectar de la rutina y disfrutar de la playa, practico yoga y meditacion
"En el silencio encontrarás lo que tu alma ya sabe"
I am Veterinary, i like the animals, I live in a very quiet environment special to disconnect from the routine and enjoy the beach, I practice yoga and meditation.
"In silence you will find what your soul already knows"

reviews.comments:
Location is 99 out of 5! Dozens of great (including cheap) coffee shops, restaurants and bars, 3 minute walk to the beach, 10 minute walk to the metro and Barri Gotic.
Bed is 4,9 out of 5. It's huge (at least queen size) and it has a real good mattress (and I'm very sensitive to those). The room is not big, but you aren't going to spend a lot of time there.
Bathroom is 3 out of 5. But hey - all you need is a quick shower, right? It does the job.
Karla herself is a wonderful person, but she barely speaks English. a) she will learn and b) it's your chance to practice Spanish.

Karla was very helpful, even though I only speak English fluently and she spoke very little. She keeps the house clean and the common area was decorated nicely, the balcony too. Karla was very responsive over text and email, and I think she even shifted her plans around a bit so that she could meet me when I arrived in town rather than having me wait with my bags. She's a kind host. There are also a couple of pets--a Chihuahua and a shy, skittish cat--but they stayed mostly in her room.

The room is small and most of the space is occupied by the bed, which was comfortable and clean. There's a small area to hang up clothes as well. Other than that there wasn't much room in the room, but as I mentioned before there's a common area and a little balcony, so the small room isn't a problem. The kitchen and bathrooms were clean throughout my stay.

The apartment is located right by the beach, maybe a minute or two to walk there, and a short walk from the subway station (5 minutes). There are no shortage of bars and restaurants around the apartment, and Karla was able to suggest where to go. It's a busy part of town during the day and evening, but I didn't find it too loud at night. I recommend staying here if it's available.

Karla is a great person and great host. She is a doctoral student and was gone most of the day during the workweek. Her pets are great too. Both of them stayed to themselves while she was gone and came alive when she returned.

The room offered on Airbnb is large and has a large bed with plenty of plugs. The apartment itself is a two bedroom with a kitchen and living room area. The toilet is separate from the shower. The views and cross breeze are great. You can see the beach, and Karla keeps the whole place very clean.

The neighborhood is safe and offers everything you need from a large grocery store, to a mercado, to corner stores, to restaurants and bars. I liked being able to easily access the beach around the clock. The apartment is also very close to major attractions. It only took me 15 minutes to walk to La Rambla, and 30 minutes to walk to La Sagrada Familia. I like to walk, but if you don’t the metro is only a short walk away and the bus is close by too.

All in all a great way to experience the beach and Barcelona from a local’s perspective. I had a great stay and highly recommend the apartment room and Karla as a host.

It was a warm welcome at Karla's. The room is small and simple, you have got all what you need for a short stay, even a balcony from where you can see the beach. It would have been good to mention that there's a dog and a cat in the house all day, but it was no problem for me. I would stay there again anytime when I'm in Barcelona.

Karla has a small but nice place, in an excellent location: very close to the beach. Karla is hospitable and easy to be around. She had an excellent description of how to get to her house and gave us some suggestions of what to do in Barcelona and tips on how to get around. It's pretty quiet at night (and I was there during the World Cup!), so easy sleeping. The kitchen is small, but you get your own place in the fridge and there's an oven and pots&pans.
It is not a very suitable place for staying with children. There are lot's of breakable things close to the ground, the power outlets are easy to reach and the space is just too small for a child ánd a dog & cat. However, I would certainly recommend this place to people traveling without kids :)

Place was very clean, very close to the beach 2 min walking. There were lots of bars, restaurants and coffee shops nearby. I totally recommend and I really enjoyed my stay, Karla was helpful and friendly.

Karla was extremely warm and welcoming, and I enjoyed meeting her.  Her English is not great, but still much better than my Spanish and you can always find ways to communicate.  She was very willing to answer questions (always with a smile), but you do get your own space too. The flat is in a good location, but be warned you need to go up 5 flights of stairs to get there.  The kitchen is well equipped, but be warned it is a small place... if you do a lot of self catering the kitchen is adequate but there is nowhere to sit to eat, other than in your room. I still enjoyed my stay, however, and would recommend it.

Nice and clean apartment, the location is great! The beach is five minutes from the house. Easy access to all attractions. Karla friendly and hospitable. We all liked it! This place meets all our requirements. We encourage you to stay with Karla!

We were very well welcomed, Karla was adorable and easy to live. I really recommend her apartment because of the location near the beach, there is a kitchen all you need to cook, and because she is a very good host !!!
Thank you Karla, 
See you
Lieve en zorgzame vrouw. Simpel verblijf in hartje Barcelona. Lieve hond.

Karla made us feel very welcome, she even haloed carry our bags! The stairs were steep and up 4 levels, but she had warned us about that. The room was tiny but adequate to our needs; we were seldom there! The location is just about the best in Barcelona, to get any closer you had to pay $1,300 a night, we looked it up. Only a bit more than half a block and you were at the best beach with chairs and umbrellas available cheap. Plenty of cafes on the beach or very close with great food. 2 "supermarkets" within 1 block of flat. Shared bathroom and kitchen but never a problem, she is gone most of the day anyway. Low taxi fare from Sants, higher to airport due to airport tax.
Karla is great. It is a small room but i didnt mind. U can get anywhere really fast. Really good for young people

Un très bon séjour a Barceloneta, Karla nous à très bien accueillie avec son amie. L'appartement est a 5 min de la plage, et 10 min du métro la situation est idéal pour les personnes qui veulent profiter de la mer et de la ville. L'appartement est petit, il convient parfaitement au jeunes !

Die Wohnung von Karla liegt nahe am Strand und alles hat perfekt
funktioniert. Tenía unos días bien relajantes en el apartamento
de Karla. Gracias por todo.
Staying with Karla was great! Amazing location + great host!
Nice hosts and placed in a great location

I had a great time at Carla´s place.
Good communication, friendly hosts
and very close to the sea.
Recommended! :)

I was living in the appartment the whole march:
It was such a lovely atmosphere in the flat and the location is unbeatable. 2 min. to the beach and 10 min to La Rambla.
I can 100% recommend this room to others :)
Karla is a great host! I would highly recommend staying with Her!!
Karla was great! Very friendly and helpful whenever I needed assistance. Awesome location.  I highly recommend this accommodation.
Very nice helpful host. Best location. Good spacious room with window and fan for the summer.

Carla et son amie ont été des hôtes accueillantes qui m'ont donné de bons conseils pour mon séjour et ont été très généreuses dans le partage de l'espace, de la cuisine, de toutes les choses qui pouvaient m'être utiles ou me manquer.

Karla was a good host, friendly, responsive, doing her best for the guests to feel like home and have a pleasant stay. 
The apartment is excellently located, very close to Barceloneta beach.

Karla hat ein kleines Willkommensgeschenk hergerichtet, mit Wasser, Keksen, Obst und kleinen Kuchen. Das Zimmer war etwas klein, aber das Bett war stabil und bequem. In der Wohnung lebt ein kleiner Hund (der sehr frech ist und einem manchmal in die Waden versucht zu beissen, was allerdings mehr kitzelt, als weh tut) und eine Katze. 
Karla selbst ist sehr nett und steht immer mit Ihrem Wissen über Barcelona zur Verfügung.

It was ver nice staying for the weekend at Karla's place. She was very welcoming and staying in her flat gives a good flavor a what it is like to live in Barceloneta, a fantastic neighborhood of Barcelona.
Quartier très agréable, situation idéale (5 mn de la plage), chambre adaptée à une personne voyageant seule !
Amazing location and amazing host

It was really comfortable and amazing to be in Alejandra house. She even shared with me a welcoming food. She gave me a lot of tips for places to Visit and shared a discount key for self laundry as i needed it. The room was clean and quiet and the location was great, it is 5 buildings from the sea and near to metro and bus stop. I totally recommend Karla and Alejandra room for anyone wants to Visit Barcelona.
Great location to stay. 1 minute away from the beach with great transport connections and a really warm and welcoming flat and Karla is lovely host. I had a very enjoyable trip
Karlas place is right next to the beach. It was amazing. Only downfall is not having air conditioning. The fan helps and it cools off in the loft at night.
Great location , would stay again..

Should you need a local experience, a place near the beach and walkable to city center, with plenty choice of restaurants and bar nearby, you cannot miss this place. Strongly recommend for all travelers.

My stay at Karla's was amazing. She was out of town so her roommate Alejandra welcomed me in. The apartment is clean, bright, and comfortable. The location in Barceloneta is great. It's about one minute walking to the beach and one minute to the plaza where there are amazing restaurants and bars. 

The neighborhood is quiet and it isn't as touristy as other parts of Barcelona. It comes alive as the day progresses. That being said, you get a more local vibe here than other places which is good or bad depending on your preference. All in all, I had an amazing time there and will definitely stay at Alejandra's again if I can.

Amazing location!
And the pets are super cute
I'm very grateful for the hospitality and kindness I've received here. Thank you very much for everything.
The host canceled this reservation 254 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I enjoyed my time staying at Karla's place. The communication with the host was great throughout my whole stay. The neighbourhood is one of the main reasons for staying with Karla since it's next to the beach and very central in general. It got pretty warm at night but luckily there was a fan provided to sort that out. The house pets are all real charmers :)

Pendant notre séjour nous avons seulement fait la connaissance d'Alejandra, qui est une jeune femme très gentille et accueillante. L'appartement est très bien situé, à 2mn à pied de la plage et 10mn de la station de métro Barceloneta mais vous pouvez aussi vous rendre au centre ville à pied en 15-20mn, ce qu'on a quasiment toujours fait car le coin est très agréable. Attention toutefois, l'appartement se situe au 4ème étage et l'ascenseur ne fonctionnait pas durant notre séjour (je ne sais pas si c'est de manière permanente), ce qui n'est peut être pas adapté à tous. Sinon la chambre dispose d'un assez grand lit double confortable et un ventilateur nous a été mis à disposition. Nous avons très bien dormi à chaque fois (la rue est plutôt calme la nuit).
Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour chez Alejandra, en compagnie de son chat et de son petit chien qui sont adorables!
A thoughtful host, with tiny, charming furry guys to welcome you!!!

Karla's place is on the best location in Barcelona if you ask me.
2 minutes to the beach, 15 minutes by bus to the center, 3 bus lines goes to the center, so it is very well connected, and that is best solution if you ask me, you can go to the beach in the morning, and afternoon easily you are in the center.
Karla is very welcoming host, she will give you all tips you need.
There are 2 small dogs and one cat in the apartment.
Room is small but private. Good airbnb and my recommendation for Karla's place. :)

reviews.comments: Owner did not show up on checking day and was unreachable. We had to find  other sleeping arrangements for the first night. The owner responded to us the second day, only to tell us that he “thought” he sent us the code for the lockbox. When we finally got in, the place was dirty. We had to request that he comes and clean immediately. Later on we realized the bathtub was clogged and that the oven wasn’t working properly. The owner finally fixed everything but it took some time. We made a verbal arrangement for a refund, but it’s been 15 days and no sight of the money and the owner does not pick up when we phone him. We are currently involving Airbnb to resolve this situation.

Philippe is super helpful, the apartment is very close from the subway and the place is quite and comfortable.
We had a great experience.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, seja bem-vindo! 

O Airbnb tem sido uma excelente experiência de vida para todos nós. Iniciamos em Junho de 2016 alugando um quartinho na nossa casa, e hoje administramos outras propriedades de amigos e vizinhos.

Amamos praia, viajar, cinema, leitura, conhecer diferentes culturas , fazer novos amigos e compartilhar experiências. Adoramos uma boa culinária, um bom vinho, boa música e filmes... Nós gostamos de ter a nossa casa cheia de alegria e amigos, acolhendo pessoas agradáveis, com boas vibrações, interessantes e honestas!

Teremos muito prazer em tê-lo como nosso convidado!

-----------------------

Hello and Welcome! 

Airbnb has been a great experience in our lives. We started in June/2016, renting a small bedroom at our house, and now we take care of friends and neighbours properties.

We love to go to the beach, travel, reading, experience different cultures, make new friends, share experiences and values. We love good food, good wine, good music and movies...

We like to have our house filled with joy and friends, welcoming nice people with good vibes, interesting and honest!

We look forward to have you as our guest! 

Be my guest and live like a  carioca!

reviews.comments: Apto ótimo! Localização excelente... top! Até breve Rioooo! :-)
Excelente comunicacion, trato, ubicacion! Volveria sin dudarlo
Ótima localização e excelente hospitalidade!

Very nice and gentle Hosts. apartment is at a very good location and i felt very safe with the 24 hours safty men at the reception. Carlos and Vitor take realy care after there guests. thanks and i will come again to your place.
Great location!
Excelente anfitrion.

El departamento tal cual las fotos.
la cama muy buena. demasiada luz y calor por la mañana. buen aire acondicionado.
Heladera pequeña pero muy potente.
De los 2 ascensores sólo funcionaba 1 y estuvimos atrapados 20 minutos porque la alarma no funcionaba.
la ubicacion esta a 1 cuadra de la playa de copacabana y cerca de ipanema, fuimos caminando a (Website hidden by Airbnb) zona es un poco insegura de noche, mucha gente durmiendo en la calle y grupos de jóvenes que robaban.
check in y out en horario no tuvimos el placer de conocer a los host.
Esta muy bien ubicado, comercios cercanos y seguridad toda la noche

reviews.comments:
Saim was friendly, helpful and communicative from our very first interaction.  The apartment is nice and to our surprise someone came in to clean and replace the towels everyday. It's very centrally located, all the main sites are 10 minutes casually walking, which is ideal and it was easy to get there from Ataturk on the tram (one person in our party just had knee surgery so being walking distance was our no 1 priority).  The neighborhood is very cute, and full of small tourist shops, corner stores and fruit/veg stands.  There are two excellent affordable restaurants close by: Ortaklar and a small place just around the corner that Saim recommended (just ask). 
We were 4 adults staying in the apartment and it was crowded.  The apartment is comprised of 2 rooms, one has the bathroom, the other has the kitchenette. It's a small space but we weren't in the apartment much, so it wasn't a big deal.  I would recommend staying here!

Saim was the greatest, he waited for us in spite of our very late flight, and he was very arranging.
The apartment is nice and perfectly located, close to the main tourist spots. 
I recommend staying here if you need a clean, simple, complete and perfect home for a few days in Istanbul. Enjoy!
Muy bueno. El barrio está muy cerca de Sofía y de la mezquita Azul. Hubo servicio de cuarto todos los dias. La habitación ha estado placentera. Agradecidos!

The host made us feel really welcome throughout our stay. He can easily be contacted in case for any help getting around Istanbul. The apartment is clean, nice and quite spacious for a group of four. the location is also good as it is within walking distance to most attraction sites. However, the location of the apartment is a bit isolated and may be quite unsafe at night.

The apartment is located close to the old city. It is just 5 min walk to all interesting tourist attractions i.e. Blue mosque, Tokapi palace. Also, there are few groceries around there. The room is large and comfortable. My friends and I stayed for 4 nights. The housekeeper cleans room everyday. The toilet is clean, however, a little bit drain from shower but not matter. 

Host is kind and very helpful. He provided us all significant info when we arrived and provided us map and tourist guide for more information. He is also available for supporting us anytime.

Location was close to Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia...perfect for walking to restaurants and close to the sea.  Saim was extremely helpful and kind..he provided us with a map and recommendations, he carried our gigantic bag up the three flights of stairs!  And he is always quick to reply to messages.  He arranged for transportation to and from the airport...easy to find after a red eye flight!  We had such a wonderful stay...we would return with pleasure!

Saim was very helpful and friendly, he was on the phone with the taxi driver who didn't speak english to describe the way to the appartment. However the first nigth we stayed not in the appartment, but in his mini hotel (i'm not sure actually it was HIS hotel but still he made all the arrangements

Saim is an amazing host! He went out of his way to be helpful in many ways, like providing a space for my bicycle, helping with baggage, helping me find the place. The place was a bit hard to find at first because it didn't show up on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, but once you find it, it's actually pretty easy to get around, and the location is great! The location is mildly touristic, but you get more of a taste of the local lifestyle than even just a couple of blocks away. There's also great food nearby with good prices. My family and i really enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back!
Great location, adequate accommodations. Saim was helpful whenever we had issues.

At Istanbul , and in this appartment was ok, clean and nice. The stairs is a bit small (in width).....for the young people without any problem. Saim was there and he provide us a map and info. Nice guy....:)
Nice, friendly and helpful stuff. Extremely convenient location!!!!!

The Apartment is well situated, comfortable and clean. 
The owner Saim, is kind, friendly and helpful. I warmly recommends.

Perfect cozy stay with a very helpful host who's is always available. It's a 10 min walk uphill to the tram. Many cute restaurants and bars around just when you get down. I would definitely recommend this space.

Saim was great host. We got lost on our way to apartment, but Saim was helpful and picked us on place we were at. Apartment is big enough, but bed in kitchen is suitable for only one person because it's broken. It folds when you push on wrong spot. Bed in another room is excellent. It was rainy weather when we were in Istanbul and water drops from ceiling on the floor. Also, in apartment was quite wet. Close to apartment is abandoned building, which is occupied by some weirdos - squatters I think. Overall, our stay was good for the price. Around the apartment is couple of groceries, fast foods, bakeries. Bathroom is OK, we got new towels every day.
