reviews.comments:
Great service. Would recommend this place to anyone in a heart beat. 
A++++ host. 
Quick to reply to messages
Joseph’s place is perfect for a visit to Homebush. Don’t stay in a hotel!!!
The property is great with a spectacular location.

Joseph had an appointment, however, his mom came for check in and she did the follow ups. She is so friendly and welcoming. The unit is modern and comfortable. Spectacular view and great location. Close to ANZ stadium and public transportation. I totally recommend Joseph’ Place.
Would definitely stay here again it was lovely and clean and close to everything we needed. The beds are comfortable and the view is amazing. Joseph was very accommodating and friendly. Great place!
Amazing place and host!
We had a fabulous stay in Homebush, thanks to the location and convenience of this fantastic property, which was an easy walk to ANZ Stadium, restaurants and other amenities:)
Wonderful location for anything going on near Homebush. Clean, polite host
Joseph was a great host and was very accommodating. Thankyou for letting us stay in your lovely apartment!  Was exactly what we were needing

Overall the place is amazing value for money. Location is excellent for (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with the hosts is easy.  
If you do decide to stay here make sure you print out the instructions given by the hosts to get into the car park and up to the unit as it is a bit tricky.
I would definitely stay here again.

Thank you for being an accomodating host. The apartment is lovely and stylish with perfect location to sporting locations and awesome eatery’s 
Great value
Everything was great. Clean, convenient, good communication. Everything you could need and all for a great price.

Joseph and Judy’s place is just what we needed for our stay at Olympic Park. It is so clean and comfortable and everything we needed was there . Even after a mix up with the keys , they were so understanding but please make sure you listen carefully to their instructions and don’t make the same mistake we did  We hope to be back soon
Great location. Walking distance to the stadiums. Just what we need for our overnight stay.

Joseph is an excellent host. The accommodation is excellent, easy access to public transport and good parking for vehicle. There is ample space for all luggage. The kitchen is well equipped and above standard. The space is ideal for relaxing or traveling into the city. Air-conditioning and fresh air easily accessed while traffic noise is at a minimum. A great place to stay when visiting Sydney!
Over all good.
Good value, great location at Olympic Park, good view and very good coffee down the road. Will use again.

My little girl and I stayed at Joseph's place for 3 nights. I've stayed at few air bnbs and this has been the best by far and great value for money. it was very spacious  and the view was amazing , especially by night. Joseph was always quick to reply to any messages and was very welcoming. Thank you Joseph for a great stay. will definitely be back.
Great place in great location. Very helpful. Thank you
P
Place was easy to get to, walking distance from everything in the Olympic park area. Was bigger than expected. Perfect place to stay! Will stay again.
The place was immaculate & Joseph and Judy were amazing . Would definitely stay again !

I was given the check in info one day before my stay though Airbnb officially said I would be given all the info three days before my stay. Host did not provide WIFI access though it was mentioned in the AD. Have been provided most of the kitchen ware. Location is very convenient if you got yourself a car. Secure parking space is a plus point. Close to DFO if you like shopping. All in all the whole apartment is fine and worth the money( nearly 300 for 3night).
Great place to stay - clean and comfortable. Would recommend

Es un departamento bonito y muy espacioso. Nos encontramos con algunos detalles desprolijos en los dormitorios, con sábanas arrugadas, algunos pelos en las almohadas, y polvo en los muebles. ´Puede que se haya descuidado esto por nuestra solicitud de ingreso unas horas antes del horario acordado, pedido que nos fue amablemente concedido.
It was located on perfect and easy to find the place with nice views!^^

Judy was lovely and very welcoming and the communication was great! 

Fab, clean, well-presented apartment with a great view in a handy location. 

Good value for money.
Great apartment! And great hosts
Great place, Amazing location, very helpful, we would stay again
We had a great stay at the this apartment. It was bigger than expected and everything we needed was there. Nice view included. We would stay here again. Thanks again for hosting us! ;)
Great service, beautiful place, fantastic value and close too olympic park. Extremely happy an will be back again.

Very well managed by Joseph and Judy. Great communication throughout our booking and arrival greeting was lovely. We enjoyed the whole apartment and it was nice to stay in comfy beds! We will definitely be back to stay here again. Awesome location to the stadiums and secure parking... ideal place to stay in Olympic park!

The place was great, spacious and roomy. We were attending ANZ for a conference and whilst it was only me who stayed there, you could easily accomodate 5-6 adults comfortably. Two bathrooms is also great when trying to get ready. Great views from the balcony and air con and blinds made more a comfortable stay.
The kitchen space was great but you will need to take your own milk, tea/coffee and breakfast items if wanting to use them. There is a convenience store downstairs and just outside but beware it is quite expensive too so only purchase limited items there. A few restaurants etc also down there with variety of cuisine too.
Great value. Everything was really good! No complaints.  Highly recommend to others.
Perfect location for X Games at Sydney Olympic Park. Only a 10 minute walk  great location and host
Great location with great views. Joseph was quick to respond to any questions.
Great location & view Very convenient for events & activities at Olympic Park & surrounding district.

Joseph's apartment is great for a short stay especially if you need to be in the Sydney Olympic Park precinct. It is walking distance to the main stadiums. Plenty of food options walking distance. Joseph and Judy were very easy to communicate with, promptly replying to any messages and  accommodating with requests. The car park was great, instructions for check-in easy to follow. My only feedback to Joseph would be to spend more time on ensuring the apartment was cleaned properly. Overall the stay was good and it was value for money.
Great apartment, had everything we needed and more ! Can’t wait to go back ❤️
Lovely, modern and comfortable apartment. Close to the train station. Joseph was a great host
Place was very convenient to Olympic Park with great cafes and restaurants on the street. Great hosts with quick response times
Fantastic location for any event at Olympic Park. Very tidy apartment and host very responsive. Would definitely stay there again for any Homebush events.
Great place, perfect location.
Conveniently located, clean and tidy property.
Great apartment to stay in when attending events at Olympic Park. Plenty of places to eat in the area and quick responses from the host when needed.

I’d really recommend this place if you’re seeing a show or sporting event at Olympic Park. It’s very handy and a just short walk from the stadium/arena, along brightly lit streets. 
Very comfortable and with two bedrooms and bathrooms would suit either families, friends or colleagues who need a place to stay.
That was a great place to stay. Highly recommended!!!
Lovely apartment with great service from Joseph and Judy - already looking forward to my next stay.
Joseph's place was fantastic, definitely the nicest airbnb apartment in the building. Joseph was super helpful. highly recomend
The unit was in a fantastic location to Olympic Park. It was very clean, tidy and well presented. I would highly recommend this host to anyone. 10/10

Great location especially if you are headed to a concert etc.  Fantastic cafe downstairs for breakfast and convenient store close by.  Amazing view from the balcony.  Would stay here again. Joseph was a great host and was quick to respond to my queries.
服务周到,干净卫生,非常好!

Joseph’s apartment is amazing! Very clean and tidy. Joseph has been great help, very quick respond. The apartment is very new, it has everything you need. There are grocery stores and restaurants available downstairs. 5mins walking distance to the station. About 20 mins drive to CBD. Secured parking. I had a wonderful stay in his apartment, I would definitely book this apartment again if I visit Sydney.

L'appartement est très bien. Le transport en commun est près mais pour aller en ville, il faut planifier environ 1 heure. Le Wifi n'est pas régulier et donc le signal est souvent faible.

The apartment was really fine. The commune transport took us an hour to go to the city and the wifi was not regular, but it’s quite usual in Australia.

In the end, it’s a REALLY good value and the host were easy to contact.
Thanks a lot!

This is a very modern apartment in an incredible location. I wish I had more time to explore the surrounding area than I did. The host was very accommodating to travel plans, and very responsive to my communications. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Sydney.
Won't be disappointed
This place was great! Wonderful location - parking included which was awesome. Perfect walking distance to restaurants and both stadiums. Quick responses and communication. Recommended!
Great value for money! Easy communication and great location
Joseph"s apartment was amazing. Everything you need is there

Fantastic location, close to events, Bicentennial Park, cafes and transport.  Easy to follow instructions from owners on parking and apartment access.  Very comfortable and appointed apartment.  Would definitely recommend.
Great location for Olympic Park events
Relative close to Qudos arena, neat and tidy apartment.
Thanks kindly for hosting us, we had a nice stay. Very convenient location for events/concerts at Olympic Park
A beautiful property. In a great location. Very stylish, great views, and a perfect place for a getaway! Quick responses from host, and very helpful. We will definitely come again :)

Great location :) and the apartment was very well set up and stylish with a homely touch. The host were very understanding and rapid in reply as I requested to check our late due to unforeseen circumstances. Will definitely stay again.
Great location if you are attending anything in the Olympic Park area. Easy access, and plenty of food options nearby.
Great location in Sydney Olympic Park, nice space with parking spot and washer in the unit.
Perfect!!
a beautiful place to stay,  comfortable and tidy. nice hosts.  we will stay here again.

Great location in Sydney Olympic Park. The apartment is a neat and tidy place with everything you could want. The view was very nice, looking out to ANZ stadium. We were very happy with our stay and Joseph is great at communicating about checking in.
Well appointed apartment in a great location for any events in Olympic Park.
Highly recommend. Great location for events at Sydney Olympic Park. Modern, clean apartment.
Great location
had a good stay

The apartment is beautifully apportioned, spacious and has beautiful views. It is clean and comfortable, with all amenities as advertised. Joseph was very helpful with storage of luggage, as we arrived very early before check in time, and wanted to explore the town. The area felt safe and the train and bus were nearby and easy to use for guests without cars. (The bus stop was right outside the building, and the bus and train were exceptionally clean and also felt safe). I recommend researching the process for where to buy passes for the bus and train.
A nice homely unit. Close to everything you need in Olympic park.
We only stayed for a night at Joseph's place but we found the apartment spacious and comfortable. It was also nice to be within walking distances to the major stadiums.
Great location, very clean, good check in. Thx b much

name: Premium Ipanema & Copacabana.
summary: Live like a local @ this comfortable Studio located between Ipanema and Copacabana. It's 1 block, 5 minutes walking to the beach. Location in my pictures. It's a private oasis away from Home. Its safe, ideal for single travelers, couples & business.
space: Very nice studio with bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.  Double bed with quality linen where sleeps two comfortably.  One may sleep on a mattress next to the bed if the two guests do no want to sleep together.  Rio can be Romantic, can be an adventure!! This studio is perfect for couples or friends. Very comfortable and well located. The Kitchen is equipped with cupboard , refrigerator, microwave, toaster and convection cook top and utensils to prepare and have meals. Bedroom with cable TV, Apple TV, Netflix, Chromecast TV, Nespresso coffee machine, table and chairs for your meals. Bed with large pillows and a back rest.  Standard clean bathroom with towel warmer, waterproof radio and color changing led lighting. Cabinet is very spacious with 10 doors and enough space for luggage and clothing.   A large window that lets light in throughout the apartment!  Air conditioned and ceiling fan! Stay fresh! Clothes steamer and iron. Security:  Electronic lock on the door with numeric digit code.
description: Live like a local @ this comfortable Studio located between Ipanema and Copacabana. It's 1 block, 5 minutes walking to the beach. Location in my pictures. It's a private oasis away from Home. Its safe, ideal for single travelers, couples & business. Very nice studio with bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.  Double bed with quality linen where sleeps two comfortably.  One may sleep on a mattress next to the bed if the two guests do no want to sleep together.  Rio can be Romantic, can be an adventure!! This studio is perfect for couples or friends. Very comfortable and well located. The Kitchen is equipped with cupboard , refrigerator, microwave, toaster and convection cook top and utensils to prepare and have meals. Bedroom with cable TV, Apple TV, Netflix, Chromecast TV, Nespresso coffee machine, table and chairs for your meals. Bed with large pillows and a back rest.  Standard clean bathroom with towel warmer, waterproof radio and color changing led lighting. Cabinet is very spacious with
notes: Be aware that you're going to be in Paradise and will want to return always. :-)
access: Guest will use common areas like the entrance and elevators. And the apartment itself
interaction: I'm available for any needs by phone, email ou telephone. We'll change contacts after reservation
house_rules: Please treat this home as it is yours. Keep it organized, acceptable clean, discard the garbage, wash your dishes, care about the utensils.  Cleaning fees doesn't include discarding the trash you produced during the stay or washing your dishes. Extra fees may be applied when you are leaving it unclean.  Keep feet clear from sand every time you get back from the beach. At the feet washer area, next to the building gate. Let me know if anything is broken, always. The refrigerator will have some snacks and beverages. Feel free to use it and feel free to contribute with new ones. It's only allowed to sleep in the apartment the quantity of persons agreed by the reservation. Respect the neighbors. Please read my email with instructions. If you have any doubt about operating anything I'll be on line.  This will be your home.  You will feel the city as a local.  Enjoy.

host.host_about:
Nice guy, airline crew member. I have been traveling as an airline crew member for a while. I can say I started to feel the needs of a traveler and with  my job I can also put everything I learn about being a good host in practice. 
I do my best to give my guests the best 'from home to home' experience. 
And when I'm traveling, I can be a good guest. :-) 
I live in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro  and have two places available in these cities. 
Graduated from Anhembi University - São Paulo.
Open minded and a nice person.
All communities are welcome :-)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
This place is really nice! I needed a relaxing weekend and that`s really what I got.
The apartment is comfy and clean.
Kitchen and shower worked great.
I felt safe. Every time I entered the building I could see a screen with images of all the floors and the door man was there all the time. 
The place is really well located and close to the Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. It was just a matter of deciding wether turning left or right after leaving the building to get very quickly to one or another beach.
I had not problems finding food, market, a restaurant or getting a taxi (there`s a lot of them passing in front the building all the time).
Rodrigo was very helpful with some information I needed.
I would recommend and I would come back to stay at the place.

Very nice and comfortable studio, very good furniture, very clean, very well situated in Rio, close to the beach, Rodrigo is very nice, open mind, always answered very quick. This stay was a pleasure. Thanks for having us. We warmly recommend his accommodation...

Nice place to be in Rio close to Ipanema and Copacabana (300 meters).Clean appartment and secured place. Rodrigo provided us good advice on local usages, where to go, restaurants....
I strongly recommend

Rodrigo is a very nice guy and gave us any information, we needed to enjoy the stay! The appartment is perfect located between Copacabana and Ipanema, the next metro station is a 5 minutes walk away.
You find everything you need in this appartment and its very clean!
We absolutely enjoyed our stay.

Great location between Ipanema and Copacabana beaches. The building is nice and quiet, and Rodrigo's apartment very clean and comfortable.
Highly recommended.

That was the best place, that I had during my travelling in Rio. 

Perfect located, well decorated, with a charming of home and personality. 
I enjoy my stay there so much, that it was pity to leave it. 
It was clean as well and it was absolutely nothing missing there. 

Roddy was a great host and very friendly too.

I couldn't have a better stay. 

Thanks a lot.

Ótimo apartamento, muito bem equipado e arejado. Cama confortável, chuveiro bom e eletrodomésticos funcionando perfeitamente. Bem localizado, perto da praia, da estação de metrô, ponto de ônibus, mercados, restaurantes...  O anfitrião sempre muito atencioso, esclareceu todas nossas dúvidas. Tudo exatamente como a descrição do site. Recomendamos à todos. A cidade é maravilhosa, sem dúvidas voltaremos.

Location is excellent between two beaches, close to bars, market and stores. Public transport is just across the building (if you are brave enough to use it :), just kidding it is safe. 
Kitchen is small but very well maintained and everything is there for you to cook. Shower is also very well maintained.
The only thing that did not work well for me was AC. Maybe because it was +38 that day and I did not set it to full power... so if there is no other complains about AC than I guess it is just me who wrongly operated it :)
The best of all is communication with host. Rodrigo is highly responsive and helpful. I have forgot USB cable in apartment and he organized pick up time for me. Thanks Rody for nice stay.
This is not the fist time that I'm staying at Rodrigo's place. The apartament is at great location and is super well equipped and clean. First option always. Thank you again Rodrigo.

What I like about this place were the details. All these little things that make a place feel like home. A bowl of peanut M&Ms and an Alfajor (cookie) was waiting when I arrived. A coffee machine with a stock of capsules. A fridge with some water and beers. Rodrigo said I could use anything that's in the apartment! (OK, I replenished the water, but it was great to have it there to begin with). 

He even left his longboard and said I could use it whenever I want for rides along the beaches (which are a very short walk by the way). 

Other cool things:
- TV has cable as well as an Apple TV box with a Netflix. House of cards season 3 was just released when I was here and was able to see it all in a weekend binge. 
- A portable speaker to play music
- etc etc

It just seems like Rodrigo is the rare AirBnb host that not only wants to make money off of his property but actually cares for people to have a good time. I had a great experience here and love this place. In fact, I'm writing this review from within the apartment - I extended my booking by another week (and then have to leave).

Highly recommended.
I had a blast in Rodrigo's place and actually extended my last reservation... Which is why you'll find another review from me below.
todo muy lindo tal cual se ve en las fotos rodrigo muy buen anfitrion y saco todas mis dudas y guio para que la estadia sea un exito. Lo recomiendo y volvere. Gracias Rodrigo

The apartment was small but the appliances are all top notch. (Coffee is king and I'm glad Rodrigo feels the same way:). We're sorry we weren't met by Rodrigo but after a bit of reading and a few questions we were well acquainted with the working of everything. The location of the apartment is GREAT. Safe and ideal for a good time spent in Rio. Rodrigo is a lovely host, attentive and very responsive. He has a lovely and polite manner and always willing to help. Thanks Rodrigo we really appreciate everything.

O apartamento é bem aconchegante, decorado, confortável, servido de bons aparelhos, limpo, organizado.
Fomos bem recepcionados com alguns pequenos mimos e ainda por cima havia a disposição alguns produtos de consumo para nosso conforto.
Não houve nenhum problema durante nossa estada de 7 dias, e o proprietário é prestativo, nos deixou dicas da região e do RJ e sempre respondeu dúvidas que tivemos durante o período.
Voltando ao rio certamente nos hospedaríamos novamente no local, e recomendamos sem dúvidas aos demais viajantes!

I enjoyed every minute of the month spent at Rodrigo's place,and even though we never met, I felt he was my guardian angel throughout the time spent there.Very responsive and kind via numerous text messages and emails, he left a well-stocked fridge and every household item one might need on a holiday. Despite being located in a huge building,the studio is very quiet and cosy, and the location perfect half-way between Ipanema and Copacabana. The internet and Apple TV worked perfectly,so did the shower and the air-conditioning. Only one thing I would change is the big double-bed,which takes a lot of space in the middle of the room. I would replace it with a foldable sofa bed. But that is just a detail, everything else was perfect. Thank you Rodrigo for contributing to make my holiday in beautiful Rio a memorable one! :-)

We went to Rio for our honeymoon!We had a really nice time in Rodrigo's apartment, everything was perfect... He helped as with everything, from making our programm with the tours we wanted, even where to eat best! I have to say he was really helpfull!!! The only thing i have to mention, we didn't like, that the air conditioning is more like a fan but off course i have to say that the apartment was fully equipped as a house, he had everything we needed or not!!! Thanks for everything Rodrigo!!!

Our stay was perfect! Rodrigo thought of everything! The apartment had everything we needed, the location was great, and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend this apartment to any of my friends who might visit Rio! Rodrigo helped us feel right at home. :)

I absolutely loved staying here! It was home for about 8 days to my mom and myself and we both were very comfortable and happy here. Rodrigo is an amazing host. He is always attentive to your needs and has in place so many amenities that you will not find elsewhere. From the decor to the snacks he leaves to welcome guests, Rodrigo really works hard to provide the most welcoming and cozy experience for his guests. The bed is very comfortable and easily sleeps two. If you feel like watching TV while you rest, Rodrigo also has tons of options for you to watch what you want (cable, AppleTV, Chromecast - all of which we used at one point or another lol). We were there in July, so it was even cool enough not to need the A/C. We kept the window open and the fan on at night and during the day and we still felt very cool. The location of the studio is also ideal. We walked every day less than 10 minutes each way to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches and the walks were always very pleasant. Getting transportation around town was also a breeze! There are so many taxis and buses that pass by even just across the street and the metro station is very close-by as well. On top of that there are tons of little shops, restaurants and farmers' markets, all again within walking distance. I HIGHLY recommend this place if you want to be in a nice, quiet neighborhood, close to the beach. I already know I will be back here the next time I go to Rio :)

Seriously this appartment is perfect. The host is perfect as well. Rodrigo made us feel at home in his cozy flat. He send us PLENTY of informations regardings nearby tours and functionning of the appartment. The check in was smooth. Rodrigo has accomodated us when my flight was cancelled and offered to stay and extra night for us not to loose our money. The appartment itself was very located. Two steps aways from the metro and with a bunch of buses passing right in front. The neighborhood is very safe and 2 steps away from the beach. The flat was super clean and had everything you needed inside. Upon our arrival the fridge was full of snack, drinks and water bottles, which is a major perk after a 20 hours trip from Canada! :) I've travelled a lot with airbnb and this experience is without a doubt one of the best. Don't hesitate! BOOK NOW! Thank you again Roddy for everything! You truly are a SUPERHOST!

Das Quartier zwischen Ipanema und Copacabana ist ideal gelegen und bietet alle Möglichkeiten, Rio zu erkunden. Rodrigo ist ein aufmerksamer und immer sofort antwortender Gastgeber, der mit persönlichen Gruß und vielen Tipps für alles sorgt. Das Apartment ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. Besser hätten wir es nicht treffen können.
Wir waren eine knappe Woche hier und haben uns von "unserem" Apartment und dieser wunderbaren Stadt nur schwer getrennt. 
Eine Empfehlung für alle Besucher, uneingeschränkt!
Fam. Richter, Berlin, Deutschland

The neighborhood between Ipanema and Copacabana is ideally located and offers all the opportunities to explore Rio. Rodrigo is an attentive and always immediately responding host who makes personal greeting and has many tips for everything. The apartment is equipped with everything you need. Better we could not have it.
We were almost a week here and now it's hard to leave "our" apartment and this wonderful city.
A real recommendation for all visitors!
Fam. Richter, Berlin, Germany

Everything was done perfectly, all infos given by Rodrigo were very helpfull. The studio was exactly like pictures and as situated on back of building, the nights were very calm.
Situated close to both Ipanema and Copacabana beaches we could enjoy quickly the ocean.
We highly recommand this place.
Little remark about very little kitchen, difficult to cook dinners but doable with some imaginations, eh eh.
Thanks to Rodrigo, wonderfull host.

Great stay in Rio, the apartment is in a perfect location Copacabana beach and buses to Corcovado and Pao de Acucar. High standard security in the bulding and comfortable place.
Roddy is a wonderful host providing us everything we could need during our stay.
When I come back to Rio that's the place where I'd like to be.

Roddy is an amazing host. Before to arrive, he had already answered to many questions about what to do, where to go, always very fast !
The apartment is exactly like described, in a very secured building (1 or 2 doormen always there).
You can't have a better location to enjoy Rio :  5 minutes from Copacabana and 10 minutes from Ipanema. Then we took a lot the buses to go everywhere.
I would for sure come back to Roddys apartment if possible !

Nous avons été très bien accueillis...... même si nous n'avons jamais rencontré Rodriguo, en raison de ses activités professionnelles.
Il a toujours été disponible très rapidement via le site Airbnb, mail ou sms.
Le logement était conforme à la description donnée dans le site. 
Clair, idéalement situé pour nous, à 2 pas ( pas plus ) d'Ipanéma et Copacabana. Appartement très propre, idéal pour 2 , rempli de commodités.
Un grand merci à Rodrigo . Nous ne manquerons pas de le recontacter quand nous reviendrons à RIO.
Nous recommandons cette location !

Rodrigo's apartment was a private oasis away from home! He truly went out of his way to ensure I had the most comfortable and enjoyable stay possible. Perfect for one person or a couple, Roddy's space has everything you need (and more!) and is located in one of my favourite neighbourhoods in Rio, with easy access to both Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. I'd highly recommend it and will definitely be back.

I highly recommend Roddy as a host. 
We really enjoyed Rio in this apartment. It was better than we expect. We felt like in home since we arrived and find a great welcome made by him.
I've never seen a studio so CLEAN and well organised . You can find whatever you want and need in the apartment because Roddy thought in everything. A plus  is the big tv to watch a movie, it is like a cinema in bed.
Also it is well located and has a lot of security in the building. And you have a lots of options to move in public transportation ( to get to Corcovado, sugar loaf, Sao Corado, Barra da Tijuca, downtown)

 Thanks for all Roddy!!

Recomendo fortemente este apartamento. Muito limpo e aconchegante, este apto muito bem equipado tem de tudo pra vc não sentir saudades da sua casa. A localização é ótima, próximo da praia e do comércio. 
O Rodrigo é um ótimo host, muito atencioso e sempre disposto a ajudar.

Put this apartment in your wish list, no doubt!
The apartment is simply perfect, the location is amazing, 5 minutes to Copacabana, 5 minutes to Ipanema, 5 minutes to the subway. It is full of details, the bed is really comfortable, strong wifi and Rodrigo is always available for everything. For sure every time I will come back in Rio I will stay in this perfect, cozy, beautiful apartment!
A fantastically located apartment where the host thought of everything and stayed in touch throughout our stay.  A real pleasure to stay here!

Roddy is the best host ever! This is my first time using Airbnb and I loved it! Roddy left tips and maps for me to use which was so helpful in making my stay comfortable. It was very nice of him to check up on me to see how I was doing. The restaurants he recommended was really good.  I, myself would definitely recommend anybody to stay at Roddy's place. His apartment is so comfortable!

This apartment was absolutely perfect for our purposes. Its proximity to major landmarks and beaches  meant that we rarely had to use public transport or taxis. Rodrigo provided skateboards which were a perfect mode of transportation for visiting Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon. The kitchen meant that we didn't have to eat out every night and saved us a lot of money as well. Also, since the apartment is right next to the South America hotel and various banks, we had easy access to tours and all the amenities of a resort with the authentic feel of living in the city as a real Carioca. Rodrigo was always very quick to respond to any and all messages and had the apartment waiting for us in beautiful condition, being greeted with sweets and various helpful guides to a perfect vacation in Rio. Book this BnB asap if you are coming to this beautiful city, it is by far the nicest and most convenient listing we have been able to find.

Superbe expérience. Hôte très disponible et serviable. Des petites attentions à l'arrivée, un contacte continu tout au long  du séjour, des indications sur les alentours et les activités. 
L'appartement est parfaitement situé, très bien organisé, il est tres tres agréable !! Nous avons passé un excellent séjour, merci Rodrigo 
Si nous revenons à Rio nous louerons à nouveau cet appartement les yeux fermés !
Au plaisir

We had a perfect stay at Roddy´s studio.  He is a very nice guy thinking about everything what his guests might need and even we didn´t met in person, he was asking regularly if we have a good time and whether we don´t need anything.  The best thing was that all instructions given by him and found in the apartment were very clear and accurate so his guests (especially after the long travel) can feel  comfortable and safe from the first minutes.  Also the recommendations (what to see, where to eat) given by Roddy were great. Even though this beautifully decorated studio is small, it has everything a solo traveler or a couple might need, is very clean and in good condition and is furnished with all necessary appliances.  We really didn´t miss anything and felt like at home. The location is the best you can imagine, very near both to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. Thank you for a great stay !!!

El departamento es tal cual la descripción y mucho mas. Supero altamente mis expectativas. Rodrigo fue un anfitrión excelente siempre atento y dispuesto a evacuar mis preguntas. A mi llegada estaba todo muy limpio y super ordenado con todo lo necesario para una estadía optima.
Realmente es un lugar para recomendar.  El barrio es muy seguro y cerca de las playas tanto de Copacabana como de Ipanema, también se podía acceder al transporte público rápidamente sin complicaciones.
EL wifi funcionó excelentemente así como la tv  smart.
Seguramente volveré y recomendare a mis amigos.
Saludos.

Rodrigo's apartment was really perfect for my last trip to Rio for the following reasons
- perfect location right between Copacabana and Ipanema
- code front door lock makes life really easy, no need to bring keys to the beach etc.
- safe in the room is a great added benefit
- apartment is clean, renovated, cheerful, and comfy
- nice big window opens onto an urban view from 6th floor, gives apartment an airy, breezy feel
- BEST OF ALL, the place is so quiet and peaceful, especially at night
- building does not allow dogs, so you  don't feel like your staying in a kennel
- Rodrigo is a nice guy, very helpful
- all in all, a great stay, the most relaxing time I've had in Rio, highly recomended!!!

La verdad que todo lo que diga nonse compara con lo bien que la pasamos. Roddy estuvo en todos los detalles y el departamento es tal cual como se ve en la fotos y mas! 

Siempre presente! Pero sin ser molesto, roddy fue siempre hospitalario y muy buen anfitrion. Altamente recomendable.

What a great apartment!  Clean, modern, and spacious.  All the comforts of home.  We were there for the Olympics.  The location was great.  3 minute walk to Metro terminal then on to all venues.  A short walk to Copacabana or Ipanema beaches.  We enjoyed both.  Rodrigo was a wonderful host.  I booked almost a year early and he kept in touch the whole time.  He made us feel welcome as soon as we arrived and made sure all was going well throughout.  He offered advice and help.  I would recommend Rodrigo and his apartment to all.

My wife and I had an outstanding stay at Rodrigo's apartment. It was just how the pictures showed it and best of all was Rodrigo's support and guidance. You can tell he really cares about his customers and takes care of every detail so that his guests feel at home. The apartment is cozy. It's small, but the location is excellent and convenient. It is well designed and equipped to take advantage of the space. Lastly, he is an excellent communicator responding immediately. 

I recommend staying at Rodrigo's apartment over a hotel any day.

Rodrigo's apartment is awesome. I had great time in Rio and found everything exact same thing as in the pictures. It's very well localized, and it has everything you need. Rodrigo show himself very prestative and available. I recommend to everyone that want to have great experience in Rio.

O apartamento é ótimo em praticamente todos os sentidos, super bem localizado, fica a 3 quarteirões da belíssima praia de Copacabana, e próximo de uma estação de metrô. Muito bem equipado, tinha tudo que eu e minha noiva precisávamos,cozinha completa, secador, tábua de engomar, etc, só nos enrolamos na hora de fazer café =P. A localização, os porteiros 24h, câmeras e fechadura eletrônica passaram segurança. Pelas fotos deu a impressão de ser maior, pelo fato de eu ser grande, muitas vezes não cabíamos os dois num mesmo cômodo (cozinha, banheiro)  mas nada que tirasse o conforto e diversão (adorei utilizar os longboards, que o Rodrigo proporcionou, no domingo na avenida de Copacabana)

The apartment is great in almost every way, very well located, is 3 blocks from the beautiful Copacabana beach, and close to a subway station. Very well equipped, it had everything me and my fiancee wanted, full kitchen, hairdryer, ironing board, etc, we just mess up in how to make coffee =P. The location, 24h doormen, cameras and electronic door locks passed security. From the pictures seemed to be bigger, because I am tall, we often didn't fit the two in the same room (kitchen, bathroom) but nothing that takes away the comfort and fun of the trip (I loved using longboards, that Rodrigo offered, on Sunday in Copacabana Avenue).

This studio has a great location, you can find everything you'll need just 2-4 blocks away. Cozy, well equipped, clean and easy acces. Rodrigo was very helpful, giving us instructions and recommendations to make our stay even better. We truly recommend his place!

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, bien equipado, funcional, funciona todo perfecto, es silencioso, tiene mucha luz y tambien oscuridad total si se quiere, Rodrigo estuvo muy presente, muy recomendable.

Rodrigo was a perfect host. Everything was super easy and the studio is exactly what I needed. It's the right size, bright and convenient. The toilet blocked and the shower ran cold on occasion but Rodrigo was quick to help out. I highly recommend his studio.

Un lugar perfecto para disfrutar la playa y la vida nocturna. Muy bien ubicado, muy lindo el estudio. Me sentí como en casa. Una excelente opción y yo que estuve una semana, siempre quería volver al Depa

El departamento es tal cual las fotos, completo, agradable, accesesible, limpio y cómodo. Pero lo mejor es que Rodrigo está atento a cada pregunta y necesidad, eso hace que la estadía sea increíble! Gracias por hacernos sentir acompañadas durante la estadía!

Me and my husband stayed in Rio for a week and Rodrigo’s place was everything that we’re looking for and more. The studio was clean, organized and it seemed like Rod had literally thought of everything that one might need. The kitchen was stocked and ready for the arrival of thirsty travelers, there were M&Ms in a jar to snack on, the bathroom had cute soaps and nice-smelling shampoo. He had written clear instructions on how to use the AC and safe, and we were very happy with the electronic lock on the front door (no need to worry about keys!). He even had longboards and kangas waiting for us in case we wanted to head straight to the beach! The attention to detail in his studio was impressive and everything was done in a way that would make our life easy. He also gave us great tips about local restaurants and bars, many of which we visited. The neighborhood was probably one of the best places to stay in Rio, with bars, restos and two beaches within walking distance. Rodrigo was very responsive the whole time, just a great host altogether! Thanks for having us, we would love to stay with you again when we are in Rio, Rod! You are an exemplary host and and we will recommend your studio to everyone we know :)

Después de haber pasado 14 días en el departamento queremos destacar que el lugar es muy acogedor y nos mejoró aún más unas vacaciones increíblemente hermosas. 
Nos parece importante resaltar varios puntos: *La ubicación es muy buena porque permite un acceso súper directo y seguro hacia las playas de Copacabana, Ipanema y Arpoador. Al estar a algo menos de dos cuadras de la avenida Nuestra Señora de Copacabana es muy silencioso y no se escucha el tránsito de estas grandes avenidas. Por otra parte, el barrio es muy seguro por la noche y hay lugares fantásticos muy cerca para comer casi a cualquier hora. *El edificio es silencioso, los vecinos son muy respetuosos y dentro del departamento no se sienten olores de la cocina de otros habitantes ni que provengan del exterior. *El interior es muy acogedor, está súper equipado, tiene aire acondicionado, ventilador, calentador de toallas, heladera, un anafe eléctrico para cocinar, microondas, cafetera, minipimer, pava eléctrica y una batería de cocina súper completa. La única crítica que se le puede hacer a la cocina es que es un poco chiquita y a veces resulta complejo moverse ahí dentro. *Tiene una cama muy cómoda que está bien ubicada frente a un TV alucinante donde se puede reposar después de un día de playa. *Dispusimos siempre de juegos de sábanas y toallas nuevos y limpios. *El baño tiene mampara, espejos y bidet. *Pudimos salir sin llaves y totalmente tranquilos gracias al sistema de seguridad de la puerta. *Recargamos la tarjeta del metro que nos dejaste y nos desplazamos sin problemas. *Todo funciona correctamente, no tuvimos ningún contratiempo. *Por último, Rodrigo nos respondió con toda amabilidad antes de contratar, luego de la reserva y estuvo disponible también durante nuestra estadía, lo que nos dio mucha tranquilidad.
Desde el primer minuto hasta el último disfrutamos de dos semanas de placer en este departamento impecable y bien decorado, como se ve en las fotos, lo que nos hizo sentir como en casa. Y una vez allá descubrimos que podríamos haber ido solo con malla, ojotas y algo de ropa, porque encontramos todo lo demás: secador de pelo, paraguas, pareos, sombreros, plancha e incluso algunos artículos de perfumería.
Para quienes vayan a Río, les contamos que hay wifi gratis en el aeropuerto Galeao y se pueden pedir un Uber que cuesta unos 45 reales hasta el departamento o bien pueden tomarse el bus 2018 (también llamado Frescao) por 15 reales por persona, en la puerta misma del aeropuerto, que los deja a media cuadra del departamento.
Por todo esto, la próxima vez que vayamos a Río ya tenemos elegido el lugar de nuestra estadía. ¡Esperamos que sea pronto!
Great host.

Staying at Rodrigo's place was amazing !!! First off, it's in between two of the cities most major beaches (Copacabana - 5 min walk) and (Ipanema - 10 min walk). The living space is great. There is nice sized bed with comfy sheets and pillows. A great air conditioner that can have the whole apartment cool in a  few minutes. A smart TV with easy access to Netflix and Youtube. An ironing board and iron are on hand. Also a convenient tea and coffee maker. The refrigerator has a filtered water pitcher you can use. The bathroom is also good with a nice shower that can have hot water in the switch of a button. I am an adventurer and I went to many of the cities museums, surfing, mountain climbing and exploring in general. I suggest uber as the best way to get around. Rodrigo's central location makes this perfect. The most expensive uber I paid for was from the airport. This came up to 45 reals which is equivalent to about $15 dollars (Not bad). The place in itself, its popular surroundings and central location was great, but so was Rodrigo. He was so helpful with the pdf emails he sent out about the apartment and the popular destinations nearby. He also has a handy map in the apartment that shows you these destinations if you want  a more hands on approach. Also, although Rodrigo was at work he always responded to my messages fast, like when I could not find the iron, or spare towels in the apartment. Not to mention my flight arrived at 10 in the morning and Rodrigo let me check in early so I did not have to wait until 3pm. Overall Rodrigo was a great host and I truly enjoyed my stay at his home. I would recommend anyone to Rodrigo's place if they want to have a great stay in Rio.

Nos hospedamos 9 días y nuestra estadía fue realmente inmejorable. La descripción del departamento es tal cual es. Es cómodo y muy agradable, está decorado de una manera muy linda y está muy bien equipado. La ubicación es perfecta para aquellos que no se deciden entre copacabana e ipanema ya que ambas playas están cerca (recomiendo ipanema). Rodrigo fue muy amable y atento en todo momento y nos brindó información local muy util. Fue un placer. Lo super recomendamos!

Quiero contarles que el studio de Roddy es GENIAL, cada rincón  y cada detalle  del mismo  hacen una estadia maravillosa. Cuenta con todo lo necesario y más,  para pasar unos hermosos días .En mi caso estuvimos en el depto 8 días  y realmente fueron inolvidables,  cuesta dejar  ese lugar en donde nos sentimos como en nuestra casa ...Además  tiene muy buena ubicación ,cerca de la playa y el metro.En relacion a Roddy es un excelente anfitrión  siempre atento y predispuesto.Nos encanto el presente que nos dejo arriba de la cama (galea  de banana) Riquísima!!!!Obviamente lo recomiendoo y les asegurooo que no se arrepentiran de elegirlo.Espero volver pronto!!!!!!!

This was the fourth time I’ve stayed at Ridrigo’s place. It’s a great, cheerful, clean place in a super-quiet building in the best location in Rio. The apartment is located midway between Copacabana and Ipanema; close to both beaches, tons of restaurants and shopping, in a beautiful neighborhood of tree-lined streets. You can’t beat Rodrigo’s place for location, ambiance, and convenience. He’s a very friendly, completely reliable guy. The apartment is very safe with a doorman, combination door lock (no keys to keep up with) and a safe. It’s also got everything you need as far as cooking is concerned. More things I like about the place; high ceilings, great urban view, Netflix, close grocery store.

Great location—close to the beach, and the breakfast at the grocery store nearby was easy and affordable. I didn’t get to use the longboards but a cool bonus! The bed was comfortable, the building was quiet, plenty of light, and everything was very clean. Rodrigo was quick to reply when I had a question. The only thing I would’ve liked is a better water filter...otherwise was above and beyond my expectations. Thank you Rodrigo!

This was the fifth time I’ve stayed at Rodrigo’s place. As usual, everything was perfect. Rodrigo was always super helpful, available, and eager to please. The location is perfect, in between Copacabana and Ipanema, close to beaches, restaurants, groceries, and bars. The apartment has a cheerful, airy vibe with an expansive urban view. It’s quiet and peaceful day and night, so sleeping in or napping is never a problem. I highly recommend Rodrigo’s apartment. I stay here every time I come to Rio.
El departamento muy bien ubicado. Igual que en las fotos. Tenía todos los utensilios y más! , seguridad 24hs, cama muy cómoda! Sin dudas volvería!  :)

The location really is perfect!! There was a great food place just a block up that we ate at almost everyday and grocery store nearby! Even a place right across the street to load data on to our phones when ever we needed

name: Good Living - Central Plateau

host.host_about: Hello there! I'm a young professional and a lover of the world :) I speak french, english, vietnamese and get around quite comfortably in spanish. I enjoy outdoor sports, the sea, the sun and all of life's creation! Always looking forward to meet new people and make friends from all around! Hopefully, I will meet you soon ;)

reviews.comments: Lovely spot! Super clean and bed sheets were very comfy.

Expect a clean, modern, wonderfully decorated & fully stocked condominium. But also expect to pay double + of what is listed. 
Great communication for anything you need. 
All in all highly recommended!

The place was exactly as advertised - Beautiful, stylish, and comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay in a great location! Also great, quick communication with the host. Definitely recommend for anyone visiting Montreal.
Expérience mémorable, tout était absolument parfait! Vous n'aurez plus envie de rentrer à la maison !

Hidden one block over from the famous Mont Royal Avenue in Laurier Est, a close walking distance to Mont Royal and other trendy areas. Hides this beautiful gem. 

For a one bedroom apartment this place has a luxurious airy feel with large rooms and a superb outdoor areas for lounging or eating. 

Thanh has thoughtfully considered all aspects of what someone may want or need in an Airbnb and this place also has that homey tweak thrown in. 

I will definitely be recommending Thanh’s apartment/s in Montreal to any friends that may visit.

The apartment is located in a lovely quiet residential area. It's about 10-15 minutes from the Metro, but there are many great restaurants nearby, as well as cafes, shops, grocery stores, and parks. It is the perfect place to enjoy the hip and charming Plateau neighborhood. The spacious first floor apartment is beautifully decorated in a minimal contemporary style. Everything seems to be newly renovated, and it was very clean. The modern kitchen is stylish, yet functional with new appliances and nice touches like a bonsai tree on the counter, and a Berkey water filter. There is a large deck off the kitchen that was the perfect spot for breakfast or a glass of wine in the evening. We checked in and out very easily, and the host was responsive if we had questions. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to anyone looking for an authentic Montreal experience.

Wow now i know for sure how i want to live one day. The appartement looked even better in real life and i just had an amazing time here. Every little detail is on point and the neighborhood as you surely know is amazing.

The communication is unbeatable and I was just happy to have booked here, if it's free I will book this room again. Thank you Thanh for the communication and Elizabeth for checking in and showing me the apartment :-)

My stay at Good Living’s was an absolute delight! The space was clean and comfortable (especially the bed and soft sheets) the outdoor space was cozy as well & would definitely stay here again! Thank you for your hospitality.
Déco simplement parfaite. Petites attentions. Propreté impeccable. Simple, minimaliste, et pratique.
Just as excellent the 2nd time. Would definitely go back.

I booked this for the location, the reasonable rate and the on site parking that was offered in the posting. Location is great and apt is v. nice but the posting was inaccurate. The host contacted me the night before (!?) we were to arrive with the wrong dates stating I should book more time, that I was also to pay extra ie over $100 more than the stated price because my husband was coming and yes, there's on site parking, but for yet another fee of $25 a day. 
To sum it up, stay true to your original post, roll your costs into the overall rate and if your going to have your contact who meets us on site give us a map for street parking make sure it tells guests you have to move your car at 8am (!) on a weekday or get towed and that street parking is impossible. Also, if your going to take a picture of our drivers licenses there better be a good reason for it other than 'that's what we do". I've stayed at many Airbnbs and this was the only one that went a bit sideways.

Really nice location with local coffee shops and restaurants. Very clean and spacious apartment, much better and more beautifully renovated than the expected. This was my second experience with Good Living's apartments, and her service is always top notch. Will be back soon!

I absolutely loved this home! It was even better than I imagined it to be and was a real refuge. I ended up spending more time there than I anticipated because I enjoyed how nice and cozy it was. Very clean and nice touches throughout, even interesting books and magazines to read. The design and lighting really make it special. Le Plateau is a wonderful neighborhood, and the location is fantastic. To be so close to excellent restaurants, parks, and boutique shops, and just about a 15 minute walk to the metro... it felt like getting to live a charmed quality of life. I'm looking forward to visiting again!

My boyfriend and I stayed here for New Years Eve and it made our night unforgettable! We loved every inch of the space; beautiful decor, clean, spacious and fully furnished. It truly felt like a home.
Absolutely stunning apartment, everything was super clean and just an easy experience

name: 4 Modern private ensuite Lofts in Ipanema Hills
summary: Introducing IPA LOFTS, a brand new addition to the Rio's most thrilling and inventive neighborhood, Ipanema Hills. In a recently completely remodeled Art Deco building, totaling 3 unique carefully decorated studio Lofts, Ipanema Hills offer the best possible affordable accommodation in Rio. Located in Ipanema Hills, a few minutes away from both the beach and bars and restaurants
description: Introducing IPA LOFTS, a brand new addition to the Rio's most thrilling and inventive neighborhood, Ipanema Hills. In a recently completely remodeled Art Deco building, totaling 3 unique carefully decorated studio Lofts, Ipanema Hills offer the best possible affordable accommodation in Rio. Located in Ipanema Hills, a few minutes away from both the beach and bars and restaurants We will personally welcome you and explain everything you need. The neighborhood Rua Saint Roman enjoys an enviable position in Rio. The cobbled street rises up behind Rua Sá Ferreira in Copacabana before snaking back in the direction of Cantagalo and descending down towards Praça General Osório in Ipanema, and houses boutique hotels, apartment complex, hostels and traditional family owned houses. A little-known Rio street with a rich history. neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood Rua Saint Roman enjoys an enviable position in Rio. The cobbled street rises up behind Rua Sá Ferreira in Copacabana before snaking back in the direction of Cantagalo and descending down towards Praça General Osório in Ipanema, and houses boutique hotels, apartment complex, hostels and traditional family owned houses. A little-known Rio street with a rich history. The property IPANEMA HILLS LOFTS is between the two most traditional and trendy neighborhoods, making the stay full of attractions, such as bars, restaurants, shops, nightlife and the beautiful beaches. Located in the middle of Saint Roman Street, a paved hilled street that connects Ipanema to Copacabana bordered with large mid century villas, it is a 5 minutes walk up from General Osorio to arrive in the property. Note to our travelers, the street also border the CANTAGALO COMMUNITY, now permanently patrolled by the military police as part of the Rio Favela Pacification Plan, also known as UPP (Police Pacifi
transit: We offer free transfer from the airport to our property. Please send a message to request this service. Located 5 minutes away from Ipanema Metro Station Less then 10 minutes walking form Ipanema beach, Posto 8 Uber is our preferred transportation option!
interaction: We will personally welcome you and explain everything you need.

host.host_about:
Hi!

We are the lucky owners of these beautiful properties and penthouses in Ipanema and a luxury Mansion in Gavea.
We had the chance to host 300+ guests on Airbnb!

We  love to travel and try to do so as much as possible and we're excited to be a part of the airbnb community!

Please feel free to contact us should any questions arise. 

We are very open to your inquiries and will do our very best to make your stay in Rio fun, easy and comfortable! 

Best wishes and safe travels!

name: Kozyatağı Single Room in 3br Spacious Flat
summary: I've taken time to make my 150sq meter place a home. It is cosy, comfortable and colourful. The rooms get a lot of sunlight and the flat has high ceilings. Besides being a cactus collector, I also have a lot of houseplants in the living room. The rooms are spacious and well ventilated. Needless to say, my flat is clean and tidy all the time.
description: I've taken time to make my 150sq meter place a home. It is cosy, comfortable and colourful. The rooms get a lot of sunlight and the flat has high ceilings. Besides being a cactus collector, I also have a lot of houseplants in the living room. The rooms are spacious and well ventilated. Needless to say, my flat is clean and tidy all the time. Guests have access to all parts of the flat except other bedrooms. This depends on the gust(s). I am flexible and can get along with most people. The neighbourhood is residential, not touristic at all. There's an open market nearby on Fridays. There are restaurants, cafes and corner shops all around. The house is located 10 minutes away by walk from two metro stations and even less from the bus stop. Absolutely no smoking at home and I ask that you keep your noise levels down.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is residential, not touristic at all. There's an open market nearby on Fridays. There are restaurants, cafes and corner shops all around.
notes: Absolutely no smoking at home and I ask that you keep your noise levels down.

interaction: This depends on the gust(s). I am flexible and can get along with most people.
house_rules: - Please do not walk around the house with your shoes.

host.host_about:
I'm an easy going person looking to meet new people and broaden my perspective. I see Airbnb as a good opportunity for this.

I live alone in a three bedroom flat and I've decided to open up to guests. Feel free to ask any questions you might have.
I look forward to hosting you at my home.

As a guest, I'm cheerful and always willing to try new things. As a solo traveller, I am adventurous and like to spend most of my time exploring the city.

I love coffee...

reviews.comments: Great place, great host.
Good place to stay, plenty of good restaurants in surrounding area & supermarkets
I love organisation. I loved leo's place! expectations exceeded!

name: Gaia Garden Houses 427
summary: Bem-vindo às Gaia Garden Houses! Aqui poderá encontrar um refúgio onde impera a tranquilidade, bem no centro de Vila Nova de Gaia e a 5 minutos de metro do Centro Histórico do Porto.
space: Uma casa antiga totalmente reabilitada, onde impera a madeira e a pedra. Aqui poderá encontrar a tranquilidade e conforto que necessita para a sua viagem. Disfrute do seu jardim, equipado para poder fazer as suas refeições. Aprecie a nossas inspiradoras fotos sobre o Porto que encontrará na nossa galeria privada.
description: Bem-vindo às Gaia Garden Houses! Aqui poderá encontrar um refúgio onde impera a tranquilidade, bem no centro de Vila Nova de Gaia e a 5 minutos de metro do Centro Histórico do Porto. Uma casa antiga totalmente reabilitada, onde impera a madeira e a pedra. Aqui poderá encontrar a tranquilidade e conforto que necessita para a sua viagem. Disfrute do seu jardim, equipado para poder fazer as suas refeições. Aprecie a nossas inspiradoras fotos sobre o Porto que encontrará na nossa galeria privada. Todo o espaço de Casa e Jardim para seu uso exclusivo. Aproveite para fazer um percurso pedonal em direção à Ponte Luíz I sobre o rio Douro, passando pelo jardim do Morro e subindo à Serra de Pilar, onde encontrará uma das melhores vistas sobre o Porto. Ainda poderá apanhar o teleférico, que o levará ao animado Cais de Gaia, repleto de restaurantes e onde se encontram as emblemáticas Caves do Vinho do Porto. neighborhood_overview: Aproveite para fazer um percurso pedonal em direção à Ponte Luíz I sobre o rio Douro, passando pelo jardim do Morro e subindo à Serra de Pilar, onde encontrará uma das melhores vistas sobre o Porto. Ainda poderá apanhar o teleférico, que o levará ao animado Cais de Gaia, repleto de restaurantes e onde se encontram as emblemáticas Caves do Vinho do Porto. Poderá encontrar todas as comodidades perto da Gaia Garden House 387, tais como mercado, farmácia, restaurantes, confeitarias e o centro comercial El Corte Inglés.
notes: As Gaia Garden Houses têm um segredo que queremos partilhar: as casas (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) têm comunicação entre si pelo jardim, o que permite o alojamento de membros da mesma família ou grupo de amigos, que poderão estar juntos e independentes ao mesmo tempo. Para conseguir disfrutar desta comodidade que queremos proporcionar aos nossos hóspedes, basta procurar os anúncios "Gaia Garden Houses 417" e "Gaia Garden Houses 423" no AIRBNB (cada uma com capacidade para um máximo de 4 hóspedes) e reservar suas datas comuns.
transit: Estando localizados junto à estação de metro " Câmara de Gaia", sugerimos o metro como a melhor forma de conhecer o centro histórico do Porto. Também poderá encontrar autocarros, comboios e táxis nas proximidades. Após um agradável passeio pedonal até à Ponte Luiz I, passando pelo jardim do Morro, recomendamos que apanhe o teleférico em direção à beira-rio. Parques de estacionamento estão disponíveis na área. Possibilidade de estacionamento de rua gratuito nos dias úteis das 20h às 9h e aos fins-de-semana.
access: Todo o espaço de Casa e Jardim para seu uso exclusivo.

host.host_about:
Gosto de viver em Alta Performance, ser Feliz e ver os outros Felizes.
Adoro viajar, mas quanto mais viajo, mais gosto das minhas cidades de coração: Porto e Vila Nova de Gaia.
Sou apaixonada por música, pintura, fotografia, cinema, literatura e dança.

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Foi tudo mais que especial, a anfitriã e extremamente cordial, sempre nos dando dicas de passeios e outras utilidades, a casa um charme, pensada cada detalhe, localização excelente, próximo a todo tipo de comércio e meios de transporte. Adoramos e super recomendamos...

Não tenho palavras para expressar toda gratidão que sentimos pelo carinho com que a querida Tereza nos recebeu!!! 
Cada detalhe de sua casa é  cuidadosamente pensado para bem receber seus hóspedes. Desde a limpeza, até os mimos deixados após a faxina semanal. 
Tudo perfeito!!! 
A casa fica ao lado da principal avenida de Gaia, onde há a estação de metrô, shopping maravilhoso,  supermercado, cafés,  lavanderia, enfim....diria que a localização é  privilegiada. 
A casa é muito bem equipada, tudo novo e com toda comodidade: secador de cabelo, persianas elétricas,  excelente wifi, toalhas macias e cheirosas,  cozinha totalmente equipada,  decoração sofisticada, tudo isso com direito a vista mais linda do por-do-sol de Porto.  
Amamos a experiência.  Queríamos mais rsrsrs certamente minha casa no Porto!!!
Obrigada, Tereza! 
obs: passei vergonha com a Tereza rsrsrs por duas vezes ficamos trancadas pro lado de fora, ela, porém, atendeu-nos prontamente com sorriso meigo a e amável!!! Muito linda ❤
Excelente hospitalidade, casa muito acolhedora e excelentes condições
Très bon séjour avec un accueil sympathique. L appartement est très propre et décoré avec beaucoup de goût.
El apartamento está muy limpio, es muy bonito y Teresa es una anfitriona estupenda. La ubicación es muy buena para visitar Oporto.

Beautiful property withexcellent amenities, walking distance from old town, very clean and very helpful and thoughtful host. What else you can you wish for?! Thank you very much for making the stay in Porto so enjoyable!!!

Estadia excelente! 
Recomendo!

Logement très sympa 
Bien situé 
Accueil chaleureux 
On recommande
Muito bom, recomendo vivamente.
A senhora teresa e muito simpatica e atenciosia. A casa e muito bonita acolhedora limpa e bem situada . Adorei e pretendo regressar.

This is a super cozy, functional and charming apartment. Very precise, super clean and brand new :-) The location is quiet and safe, with very good access and with easy street parking. Teresa is so nice, communicative and always available :-) Thank you so much for the experience!

Très bon acceuil, Teresa est très prevenante et tout est bien organisé pour le check in et check out. Le logement est neuf, propre, fonctionnel et bien aménagé et équipé. Il Est également bien situé dans Porto, proche des transports et du centre mais dans un environnement calme.
Good location, friendly and communicable host, cozy apartment. Thanks for everything.

O apartamento superou nossa expectativa! 
Estava tudo muito limpo e organizado, Havia toalhas e equipamentos na cozinha suficientes para nossa estadia. 
As fotos condizem com a realidade!! A localização é excelente, fica a 100 metros da estação de metrô. 
Havia água, chás e cafés disponíveis. 
A proprietária, Tereza, é uma pessoa MARAVILHOSA! 
Foi muito simpática e nos recepcionou muito bem! Ela nos ajudou bastante com dicas da cidade e esteve disponível sempre que precisamos. 
Sem duvidas, voltaremos a nos hospedar em breve!!
Muy recomendable, cerca a la estación de metro muy fácil de llegar y el lugar muy acogedor
La casa muy bien ubicada. Teresa una anfitriona muy buena nos informó de todo. Unicamente revisar los radiadores antes de la noche para quitar los programas predeterminados.

name: Super bright apartment in quiet area facing park
summary: Cosy, quiet and convenient 2 bedroom apartment in front of a park. 5 mins walk to metro station, bus stop in front of the door connecting to downtown and trendy areas within 20 mins. Free parking at the back. 20 mins away from Montreal international airport.
space: Apartment located in a quiet residential neighborhood cover with a lot of green. Very convenient public transport system such as 5 mins walk to green line metro station and bixi bike station, within 20 mins you are in Montreal downtown and tourist attractions. Bus stop just in front of the door connected to trendy areas. Supermarket, restaurants and parks are nearby. Apartment is very bright with good  air circulation.We don't have air conditioner yet. But the apartment feels cool in summer and warm in winter. Through out the big living room window you can see a big football field with mature trees  giving you nice green views and relaxing feeling. Free parking in the back.
description: Cosy, quiet and convenient 2 bedroom apartment in front of a park. 5 mins walk to metro station, bus stop in front of the door connecting to downtown and trendy areas within 20 mins. Free parking at the back. 20 mins away from Montreal international airport. Apartment located in a quiet residential neighborhood cover with a lot of green. Very convenient public transport system such as 5 mins walk to green line metro station and bixi bike station, within 20 mins you are in Montreal downtown and tourist attractions. Bus stop just in front of the door connected to trendy areas. Supermarket, restaurants and parks are nearby. Apartment is very bright with good  air circulation.We don't have air conditioner yet. But the apartment feels cool in summer and warm in winter. Through out the big living room window you can see a big football field with mature trees  giving you nice green views and relaxing feeling. Free parking in the back. You can use every thing in the apartment. Sorry about the
neighborhood_overview: You can switch from quiet neighborhood to vibrant city life within 20 mins.
notes: Party and drugs are strictly prohibited. Please keep our apartment as it is your own.
transit: 20 mins(14 kilometers) away from Montreal Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport. Public transport: green line metro (same line to downtown) direction Angrignon, get off at station Monk, then 2 mins walk.  Bixi bike station 5 mins away.  Bus line 78 or 36 stop in front of the apartment.
access: You can use every thing in the apartment. Sorry about the  front and back yard as we are still waiting for grass  following excavation work. It should be finished by September.
interaction: Please contact me with email (Email hidden by Airbnb) or telephone and SMS vis (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Please feel free as it is your own place and take care of our apatment as yours.  Smoking and taking drugs are strictly prohibited. We like pets, but not in our apartment.  We are located in a quiet residential neighborhood, please respect the neighbours and no parties and making loud noise late. Respectful friendly gatherings are ok, but  more than 6 people total is considered an event and must be authorized by owner. Our rate for the appartment rental are based on up to 4 occupancy. Extra fee for a 15CAD/person/night will be charged. Extra Guests not mentioned in the booking are not tolerated. Please advise us if you want to enjoy late checkout. In the event where it's possible, there is no charge. Otherwise, please respect the 11:00 a.m. checkout since cleaning crew must prep the place for next guests. If you do a late checkout without notice, a penalty fee may be applied.  Please take off your shoes when enterung our apartment.  Thank you and enjoy your stay!

reviews.comments: Winnita and her husband Daniel were very attentive. Apartment was about 20 minutes to downtown Montreal. Super clean and stylish! Would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

Everything looks exactly like the pictures. My check in  time was at 4 but when I got there early she was happy to give me the key early. The only problem that I had with the place was the AC. There isn't any AC but it was indicated in the listing so I guess that's fine. WiFi speed was good.
amazingly clean and cute place in a quiet area. the host was very reachable and thoughtful. would go back there.
Good place and nice hospitality
Our family enjoyed your place. It was a very clean and cozy house. The location was good. The host was nice and considerate.
we had a comfortable stay. house is warm and well located. Dan and Winnita are good very prompt and good communicators..Go for it guys... Recommended.. .

One of the best AirBNB’s I’ve ever booked.

Winnita and Dan were proactive in making me feel welcome and the place itself had the perfect combination of value, location, charm, and more than enough space. It also had a semi-constant breeze that permeates the place because of its location. 

The place itself felt “lived in” and had the touches of someone who had an eye for furniture and design that gives off comfort. I felt at ease in the place immediately.

The only thing missing were in-house laundry and a/c, but it was easy to get around it as there is a laundry place closeby and there is a constant breeze. Otherwise, great place 10/10.
Spacious and clean. Would stay here again!

Everything was awesome and much better than what I expected
Our host was very kind and responsible
I'll definitely choose this place for next time
Winnita and Dan were super organized and responsive. The apartment was bright and clean, as advertised.  We were very pleased and would definitely stay there again!

Winnita’s and Dan’s place was amazing! They were super kind and left notes with suggestions of places to eat and other useful information about the city. My grandma really liked that the place was super clean. The parking spot was really useful, but the garden gets in the way of carrying heavy suitcases such as mine (that would be like the only downside, but other than that the place was amazing!).

Appartement très agréable bien situé à 5 mins du métro. Nous avons pu rencontrer Dan le propriétaire, quelqu'un de très sympathique et tjrs prêt à aider.  Il a prévu d'installer un lave-linge ce qui est une excellente idée !
A good place to stay

This place was great and clean as expected. Nice design touches and comfortable to stay in. With a good parking space at the back of the apartment. The hosts left helpful notes with suggestions about the area. Will definitely stay there again.

Un séjour parfait! Propre et très bien aménagé, on se sent très facilement chez soi. Les hôtes sont très réactifs au moindre besoin et les adresses locales supers sympas. Un deal exceptionnel pour un prix vraiment intéressant juste à 15 min du centrent en transport) de montreal. J’y retournerai avec plaisir et je recommenderai sans hésiter
Beautifully decorated house, with all the basic amenities available. Winnita & Dan were excellent hosts
Great spot!
Loved Winnita's place. The place was very clean and at a convenient location away from traffic. Would stay at it again!

Our stay at Winnita & Dan’s place was amazing! The apartment is super cozy and clean and everything you could need is easy to find and make yourself at home. Winnita was super accommodating with check in and check out and gave the clearest directions for checking in and enjoying our stay. Be sure to check out their recommendations for places to go in the kitchen they are all great! She’s a great communicator and quickly answered any questions or requests we had. Thank you so much for an easy and comfortable weekend!❤️

My children and I (25/17) had a really great time at Winnitas place. The flat is clean and decorated with a special touch of the 60s, the beds are cozy. We felt very comfortable there. 
Winnita was very caring during our stay. She sent us tons of insider recommendations which we enjoyed a lot (especially the beaver tails and the bagels :-))
The flat is very close to the metro station and you can reach the center very fast. I can recommend the flat a lot.

Very nice apartment with stylish characteristics in a quiet area. 
Highly recommended.

Winnita’s place has a vintage charm. The decor is thoughtfully and tastefully planned. 

It is easily able to hold a party of 5. 

We enjoyed our stay and appreciated the free parking and food suggestions given by the host.

Appartement spacieux avec déco vintage.
Éloigné du centre ville mais à  5 mn de la station de métro et proche d’un parc sympa.
La place de parking derrière l’appartement est bien pratique sachant qu’il est très difficile et coûteux de se garer à Montréal.
good, affordable, quiet, lot of space fot three people, good parking in the back of the property
The place is very clean and tidy. You have everything you need and it is closed to town. Winnita is very helpful
房间整洁,有格调,设备齐全｡
干净整洁,地段尚可,若再提供提供些厨房用品如调料咖啡等就更方便了｡另外,退房时间之前最好不提醒,勿让住客有被催促离开之感｡

This is a great place to stay, very close to the metro, supermarket and food places. Winnita's recommendations were excellent but we did not have enough time to try them all. The house was super clean and comfortable with great beds and plenty of room. Winnita was in touch to make sure all is ok and really deserves the title of superhost. She is one of the best I have encountered. Highly recommended!
너무 좋았어요!! 하루만 머물다 갔는데 너무 좋아서 아쉬웠어요근처에 마트도 있어서 추천해드립니다!
This is a very nice place to stay if you want to visit Montreal. It’s easy to get anywhere you want to visit. It is easy check in.  Highly recommended.
Nous avons adoré le logement de Winnita. Très propre et que dire de la décoration parfaite! Nous reviendrons assurément.

perfect!! super comfortable
kind host!!
Very accommodating and quick to respond . Clean and lovely hosts . Thank you
Clean,good location, good parking, but needs more comfortable mattress, pillows and add a tv.
Logement agréable et bien situé. Idéal pour bien visiter Montréal.
Très bel appartement, agréable et calme, situé à quelques stations de métro du centre de Montréal. Nous recommandons chaudement!
This place is very stylish and comfortable. The neighbour seems very nice and it’s easy to get to other parts of the city.
Winnita and Dan's apt was perfect!! Location, cleanliness, parking, comfortable beds and great vintage decor was great! We definitely recommend this place and would come back!!!
We had a great stay at Winnita’s. Great space, quiet location and very clean!

Winnita and Dan’s apartment went above and beyond our expectations! Not only was the place spotless, but it also had all kinds of unique little touches and personalized recommendations based on the neighbourhood. The apartment was beautiful and spacious, and the beds were very comfortable. Check-in was extremely easy  and Winnita was quick to respond to all of my messages. We will definitely be staying again at our next visit in town!

I like the stylish apartment with fully stocked cupboards, closets and even a couple board games. Everything was clean and organized. Especially enjoyed the view of the park.

Out of the hosts control but... we all had terrible sleep because the people upstairs were so noisy. They were stomping around the creaky floors and constantly dropping things on the floor until very late at night. Also, they are early risers and made more noise leaving the house.
The apartment was quite large and very clean. We loved exploring a new part of Montreal. We had dinner on Wellington and went down to Rapids Park on the river.

We were totally satisfied with our stay.  The communication with Winnita was fantastic.  Parking was a breeze (not always the case in Montréal these days!)  The home is stylishly decorated and comfortable.  We would definitely return.
Clean, quiet, comfortable, great value.
Très belle appartement, bien équipé et proche de tout ( épicerie, dépanneur et station métro).
The place is bigger than the pictures. Rooms are big, beds are super comfy, the kitchen gives us a vintage feeling. In other words: Just wow!
Appartement top  très propre tenue par des hôtes supers ,prévenants et disponibles en cas de besoin  .quartier très calme bien desservi  ..
Nice place, easy convenient booking.
Nice place!
Appartement proche du métro, lumineux, bien équipé et propre.
Très bien situé (station de métro, commerces, bus, et toutes les commodités disponibles dans l'hébergement. Très propre et confortable.
Great place!
Très bien. Placé à proximité de l'arrêt de métro Monk. Idéal pour découvrir Montréal

name: Stylish Studio Apartment Near Causeway Bay [2]
summary: 1) Affordable stylish studio apartment located at Tin Hau (Very close to Causeway Bay); 2) 5 mins walking distance to Tin Hau MTR station; 3) Free cleaning service provided; 3) Numerous restaurants and shops located nearby; 4) Branded appliances/utilities provided in the apartment; 5) Monthly Rental Only *** Minimum Stay: 60 nights ***
space: Welcome to LauLi15, it locates just a few steps away from Tin Hau MTR station and within easy walking distance to Causeway Bay’s luxury shopping destinations and restaurants. Just minutes by car or MTR from Quarry Bay and Central business district, it is also a short stroll across the street from Hong Kong’s iconic’s public park, Victoria Park. There are also choices of international restaurants and shops around LauLi15 and you will definitely find it convenient to everything and enjoy the local experiences for both business and leisure stay.
