address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The apartment was excellent, brand new, it's in a new annex of an older building, very well equipped.  It's located in Tin Hau, just 100 meters from the MTR station, and within walking distance to Causeway Bay.  There are plenty of nice restaurants within close proximity.  Grace was an excellent host.  I would highly recommend the apartment.

Excellent experience overall. The location is great-3min to subway station and all kinds of local restaurants. The room was clean, stylish, and great value for long-term stay. The owner was very friendly and helpful. He responded to our need very quickly every time.

name: A spacious and bright maisonette w/ideal location!
summary: The apartment is a spacious and bright maisonette, furnished with all you might need. Two bedrooms, a kitchen, bathroom and a living room with a fireplace. The location is ideal!  Walking distance to the ferry which takes you the European side and to Princes Islands. Also very close to underground, bus, tram. 10 minutes to shops, restaurants, bars and the fish market of Kadikoy. The neighborhood is an old pleasant neighborhood. Even though it is very lively, it's not at all hectic and noisy.
space: The apartment is a spacious and bright maisonette, furnished with all the basics you might need. It has two bedrooms, one up and one in the back with a balcony, a brand new equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a cosy living room with a fireplace.  It is on the 4th floor with a little city and sea view.
description: The apartment is a spacious and bright maisonette, furnished with all you might need. Two bedrooms, a kitchen, bathroom and a living room with a fireplace. The location is ideal!  Walking distance to the ferry which takes you the European side and to Princes Islands. Also very close to underground, bus, tram. 10 minutes to shops, restaurants, bars and the fish market of Kadikoy. The neighborhood is an old pleasant neighborhood. Even though it is very lively, it's not at all hectic and noisy. The apartment is a spacious and bright maisonette, furnished with all the basics you might need. It has two bedrooms, one up and one in the back with a balcony, a brand new equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a cosy living room with a fireplace.  It is on the 4th floor with a little city and sea view. Our guests have access to everything.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, stove, tea and coffee makers, a microwave and an electric oven. The neighborhood itself is an old pleasant neighborhood
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood itself is an old pleasant neighborhood. Lots of tiny shops, lovely cafes, home style cooking and vegan- vegetarian restaurants, small workshops and art galleries. Even though it is a very lively neighborhood, it is not at all hectic and noisy.
transit: The location of the apartment is ideal!  It is 5-6 minutes to the ferry which takes you the European side in 20 minutes and 30 minutes to the Princes Islands while you enjoy the sea on the deck of the ferry. It is also walking distance to all other public transportations - underground, bus, metrobus, nostalgic trolley. In a 10 minute walk you are also in the center of Kadikoy, charming neighborhood with streets of shops, restaurants, bars and the fish market.
access: Our guests have access to everything.  The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, stove, tea and coffee makers, a microwave and an electric oven.
house_rules: Please only smoke in the balcony

host.host_about: We are a couple who partly lives in berlin and partly in istanbul. We sublet our places when we travel.

reviews.comments: Nice place in a very nice neigborhood! Good price and very nice host.
The apartment is very lovely in a lovely neighborhood. And very close to the ferries! The host was very helpful and everything went smooth.
Die Wohnung ist super geschmackvoll eingerichtet und die Lage hat uns sehr gut gefallen.  Tolle Cafés sind gleich in die Ecke. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
Evin konumu ve enerjisi cok iyi,evde ihtiyacınız olabılecek hersey mevcut...

Serenad is a great guest, very communicative and helpful. Her apartment is in a great and quiet location for families :  coffee and restaurants, shops, playgrounds nearby but also bars and nightlife. I would definitely recommend her.

wonderful place, i could really feel at home there;) 
perfekt location

Serenad is an amazing host. Communication was a breeze. We loved the location, atmosphere, and eclectic style the location offers. I highly recommend anyone to stay at this location if you’re in the Kadikoy región. Hope to return one day! ❤️❤️
Ease of location and all the amenities you would require for a comfortable stay. Lovely area to explore.
very good host, everything was perfect! happy to come again.

The apartment was very nice. The hosts were very nice. I love the neighborhood. I would suggest that people with more touristic plans for their stay in Istanbul stay on the European side, both to spare themselves a lot of time on public transportation and to spare the good people of kadiköy the selfie-sticks and other nonsense.

Perfect place, stylish interior, in a neighbourhood that combines a relaxed local vibe with great places for breakfast and coffee and other restaurants. Close to the Kadiköy market, ferries to the downtown area and to the Princess Islands. Serenad is a great and communicative host. Highly recommended!
it's stylish, it's comfortable and it's at a perfect location. hosts are lovely and the place is sparkling clean. I highly recommend it.

A lovely home, very clean and fresh, with everything you need. Clean fresh towels and bedsheets, and a nice bathroom and kitchen. Also, fantastic location within walking distance of restaurants, shops and bars. When I return to Kadikoy, Serenad’s is where I want to stay.

This is a lovely, comfortable apartment in a wonderful, hip neighborhood that's very convenient whether you're taking the ferry to Karaköy & Eminönü; taking the Marmaray train to Europe or hanging out in Kadıköy. We will definitely come back the next time we're in town!
Super easy check in and an extraordinary location in Kadikoy.

Great location in Kadıköy: walking distance to the store and the cozy region crowded with shops, cafés, bars and restaurants.  Everything you need is provided in the apartment. Even filtercoffee facilities are provided :) 70s interior design which is very tasteful. Easy and self check in. Ms. Banu was very helpful as local host. I would definitely recommend.
We recommend this accommodation for your next trip to Istanbul ! Stylish interiors clean and near by all what is needed in Istanbul

Serenad’ın evi fiyat kalite olarak kesinlikle çok iyi. Eve girer girmez temizlik kokusu etkileyici. Yatak rahat ve nevresimler tertemiz. Kapıdaki şifreli kutu sayesinde giriş ve çıkış çok rahat oldu. Lokasyon olarak oldukça merkezi bir yerde. Kadıköy Rıhtım ile Yeldeğirmeni arasında. Yalnız asansörsüz dört beş kat çıkmak biraz zorlayıcı oldu. Evi rahatlıkla tavsiye ederim.

Host - Seranad and co host Banu were very helpful and prompt in their contact via (Hidden by Airbnb) before and during our stay.
Flat - pictures of the flat are accurate. the flat is stylish and a nice space. unfortunately some occassional noise from neighbours and street noise.
Location - the flat is located up 5 flights of narrow stairs, no lift. make sure you press the button in the hallways to turn the light on. the building is also up a hill. the flat is approximately 10 minutes from the bus station, 2 minute walk to coffee shops, takeaways and other amenities. we felt this was a nice area of kadikoy to stay away from the more busy areas, though still very close to local amenities.

name: Home Sharing - Individual Room in Plaza España
summary: Hola! Bienvenidos a mi casa. Les ofrezco una habitación individualen el centro de Barcelona, ubicado en plaza España. Vivo con mi familia aquí y he recibido a muchísima gente de todo el mundo. La clave de compartir es el respeto y el orden, estos garantizará a ambos una agradable airbnb experience. Les abro las puertas de mi casa y les recuerdo que no es un hotel, el horario de llegada lo coordinamos Siempre con anticipación e intentamos adecuarnos. tratégicos de barcelona.
space: El alojamiento es una habitación individual muy cómoda que cuenta con una cama individual, cómoda , silla y mesa de luz. La ventana es interna y da a la escalera . Te brindo sábanas y toallas para tu estancia El piso se encuentra ubicado a pocos pasos de Plaza España, por lo que tienes a tu disposición varías líneas de metro, tren, Airbus (aeropuerto) y bus. Y a 5 cuadras de Estscion de trenes y metro de Sants (AVE, tren de larga y corta distancia, etc). Hay un gran parque en la zona y muchos bares y restaurants para elegir a su antojo. Hay otra habitación pero doble que ocasionalmente está también alquilada por lo que capaz compartáis con quien esté el baño y cocina aparte de mi.

Y a 5 cuadras de Estscion de trenes y metro de Sants (AVE, tren de larga y corta distancia, etc). Hay un gran parque en la zona y muchos bares y restaurants par
neighborhood_overview: El Barrio es uno de los mejores de Barcelona y cuenta con todo tipo de servicios y también atracciones ya que a pocos metros nos encontramos con el Shopping Arenas, Plaza España, el museo de arte nacional de Catalunya, la fuente mágica de montjuic, la estación de tren de Sants, Montjuic y muchos bares y restaurants.
access: Los espacios compartidos son el baño y  la cocina (aunque en la cocina es solamente para guardar cosas en la nevera y preparar refrigerios rápidos y sin cocinar)  - Don’t smoke, drugs or alcohol - FORBIDDEN to bring nobody who is not in the reservation  - Keep the noise down in the hall of the building and stairs - Leave the bath cap DOWN if you are a men. - Check the bathroom after you use it - Don’t pee in the shower or another things... - DONT use my a conditioner or shampoo, it’s not included and you have to buy your own - DONT use my food - DONT take dishes and glasses to your room and leave it there, always return it after you use it because I may want to use it or need it. - USE THE BATHROOM with responsibility and think that other may need to use it
interaction: A mis huéspedes prefiero darles su propio espacio pero estoy muy a gusto y feliz si desean que les de recomendaciones o ayudarlos de cualquier manera. Capaz que mi trabajo no me permite estar personalmente pero resolveré todas tus dudas al instante vía airbnb chat.
house_rules: Lavar lo que cada uno ensucia No hacer ruido en el edificio o en la puerta del edificio No dejar bolsas de basura en la habitación  No dejar el piso del baño mojado

host.host_about: Hola! Vivo con mi familia y compartimos nuestra casa. Hemos recibido gente de todas partes del mundo. Cada uno tiene costumbres y maneras diferentes de ser. Intento que se pueda generar un clima de convivencia siempre respetando al otro. Te abro las puertas de mi casa, no es un hotel. Y espero que siempre el respeto sea mutuo y después de un largo día tengas un espacio cómodo donde puedas descansar y relajarte.

name: Janelas do Douro Flat
summary: What you should know about our space: - The condominium is located between the Atlantic coast and the historic center. - Just 200 meters walk from the Douro river, where you can enjoy a wide variety of restaurants, bars, walkways and gardens. - Great accessibility, with public transportation just crossing the street and 200 meters from the streetcar. - Supermarket only 50 meters away. - Private parking. - Private terrace. - 15 minutes by public transport from the historic center.
space: - Apartment fully equipped and comfortable. - In the living room there is a sofa that can be converted into a single bed and in the laundry room there is a single pull-out bed that can be placed in the living room next to the sofa bed.

reviews.comments:
Esperienza nel complesso positiva, la casa si presenta in ottimo stato, completa di tutto (asciuga capelli a parte) anche di un parcheggio privato al interno del cortile dello stabile. 
Rapporto qualità prezzo ottimo.

La estancia en el apartamento de Jessica en general ha sido muy buena.  El apartamento es bonito y muy cómodo con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días de vacaciones en la ciudad, además de decoración con un toque personal y dibujos muy originales. Jessica estuvo atenta en todo momento a cualquier duda que me surgiera. Lo único mejorable es la ubicación ya que se encuentra próximo a un barrio que no tenía muy buena pinta. Sin embargo si viajas en uber, en diez minutos estás en el centro de la ciudad. Eso sí, que por la noche recomendaría ese transporte más que volver andando.

El apartamento de Jessica es muy bonito. La acogida fue muy buena. Nos arriesgamos un poco porque era un apartamento nuevo sin referencias pero después de la experiencia, lo recomendamos 100%. Todo corrio muito bem! Obrigada Jessica :)
Personne super sympa qui répond rapidement par email.appartement de bonne qualité ainsi que les équipements.logement à recommandé

Jessica hat uns tolle Tage in Porto ermöglicht. Die Wohnung liegt ruhig und nicht zu weit vom Zentrum Portos entfernt und ist gut zu erreichen. Wir haben nichts vermisst und uns wie zuhause gefühlt. Wir sagen: DANKE!
Great place to stay

Super appartement très propre.
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable je reviendrai
Appartement jolie et très propre  . Jessica très réactif dès qu’on lui écrit ou lui pose une question .
Endroit propre et accueillant. Belle réactivité de Jessica à nos interrogations. A recommander

Nous avons passé 3 nuits dans l'appartement de Jessica, l'appartement était très propre et super bien équipé. Seul petit bémol : le manque de volet sur la fenêtre du salon qui a posé problème pour dormir.
Great experience, came late, but found the key easily in the locker and Jessica was so supportive!
El departamento de Jessica es hermoso! Tal cual las fotos! Volvería sin dudas. Gracias Jessica!

This apartment was very nice and very clean. Jessicas responses were quick and extremely helpful. About a 15 minute drive from the airport and a 45 minute walk from tourist attractions. We are very happy with our stay at this apartment

El apartamento de Jessica es muy bonito y acogedor. Lo mantienen muy limpio y no falta de nada para pasar unos días en él. Además, la decoración es obra suya y le da una esencia especial. Durante nuestra estancia, solo tuvimos un pequeño problema con la lavadora y en seguida acudieron a resolverlo, estuvieron muy pendientes y atentas! Respecto a la zona, está un poco alejado del centro, pero se puede ir en coche, y luego también hay una linea de autobús cerca o directamente taxi o uber, que salen muy bien de precio. El apartamento está muy cerca del Duero, y tiene un super y un bar al lado, a más zonas del barrio mejor ya no ir. ¡Muchas gracias Jessica por tu hospitalidad!
Todo genial, muchísimas gracias.
Correcto
apartamento bonito, diáfano e impecable. la anfitriona contesta super rápido y es atenta y amable.

El apartamento de Jessica es ideal si buscan un lugar tranquilo para pasar unos días en Porto. Bien situado (a 3km del centro de la ciudad, hacia el cual se puede ir a pie (40min) disfrutando de la maravillosa vista del Duoro - o en Tranvía), muy limpio, con una decoración de dibujos "fait maison" bastante interesantes, una cocina funcional y buena calidad del material a disposición de los visitantes. Situado en un edificio residencial, con un estacionamiento privado.  Además de todo esto, lo mejor es Jessica !!! Un hôtesse muy reactiva y comprensiva, con una paciencia infinita para explicar cada cosa, siempre mostró interés por cada detalle de nuestra estadía con respecto al apartamento. La comunicación fue muy agradable y efectiva; a cada pregunta, ella tuvo una respuesta. 
De esta manera, no dudadamos en recomendar este apartamento.

I really enjoyed my stay in Jessica's apartment. It's a very beautiful and calm place next to the sea in an authentic neighborhood. You can also take a small boat nearby to reach the other side of the Douro. Jessica is very reactive and it was very easy to communicate was her. She is also a great artist and the apartment is decorated with her amazing work! Thanks a lot Jessica!

We absolutely loved the stay at Jessicas apartment. The neighborhood     was very good,with a supermarket nearby and also very nice restaurants. The apartment itself was very clean and one can clearly understand that Jessica paid attention to small details. The check in was very easy as well. In the house flyers for Porto were provided, one also including tips for  vegetarian restaurants, which I totally appreciated. Thank you a lot!

un piso muy mono, Jessica super amable y atenta. el piso tenía todo lo básico para recibir huéspedes, limpio, bonito, detallista. gracias a Jessica y a su hermana que nos ha salvado de un  apuro jaja muy recomendable!!!
A forma de entrega das chaves é no mínimo  estranha.

Ich kann Jessicas Wohnung nur empfehlen! Ihr habt alle, was ihr braucht, könnt morgens auf einem kleinen Balkon frühstücken, oder abends nochmal eine Runde am Duoro spazieren. Zur Altstadt müsst ihr ca 45 Minuten laufen, was aber nur halb so schlimm ist, da auch diese Strecke komplett am wunderschönen Fluss entlang führt! Wir haben es immer genossen. Wer das nicht möchte, kann entweder den Linienbus nehmen oder sich gleich eine Karte für den Hop on Hop off Bus kaufen, der quasi direkt vor der Tür hält.  
Immer wieder gerne!
Cute Apartment!
Really great house and location. Very clean and tidy. Perfect if you have or not a car :)
FOI ótimo!!! Voltaria com certeza!

La forma de entregar el apartamento es un poco extraña, hay que colocar unas coordenadas en (Hidden by Airbnb) maps para buscar el punto de recohida de las llaves, con un código enciado por mensaje, luego seguir.el mapa para encontrar la casa. en otras circunstancias habría sido divertido pero en un país con lengua distinta, una ciudad que no se conoce, es estresante pensar en no llegar con luz del dia.
Para una pareja es ideal (para 4 personas muy justo y necesita un cambio de sofacama), cerca a la parada del tranvía, autobuses turisticos (comprando el ticket por Internet) y linea de autobuses.
El apartamento está muy bien cuidado y la decoración está muy bien, es bastante cómodo
Very clean and stylish cozy place for two. Confy bed! Would def go back ;)
Cute Apartment!
espaço muito bom.
Óptima estadia e fácil comunicação com a Jessica. Recomendo
Ótimo apartamento, fomos muito bem recebidos!!
a good experience.

This was a very nice place to stay! It’s within walking distance of the city center (about 40 minutes) but you can also find cheap and fast transportation to the center. The bedroom is very comfortable, although the cot and couch pull-out bed are not the most comfortable. Nevertheless, it’s a great place to stay for the value.

Ótimo espaço em localização tranquila no Porto.  As fotos condizem exatamente com a realidade: o apartamento é charmoso, decorado com capricho pela proprietária e muito limpo. Possui todos os itens necessários para uma estadia confortável, como fogão, micro-ondas, talheres e mimos como sabonete e itens no refrigerador. O quarto é relativamente espaçoso, com armários e cama grande, e na sala é possível acomodar mais duas pessoas sem problemas. A varanda é perfeita para o café da manhã. Apesar de ser distante das principais atrações da cidade, é possível atingir o rio Douro em 10 minutos de caminhada e, com o ônibus, chegar em 15 minutos ao centro.
Tudo 5  estrelas
Excelente lugar, súper limpio y muy buena comunicación, 100% recomendable
Apartamento muito bom para um casal. Um pouco afastado da centro histórico. Como estávamos de carro não foi um problema.
Excelente acomodação, bem localizada, com todo conforto que precisamos! Super recomendamos!
Great location - halfway between the city centre and the beach. All the essentials to give you flexibility during your stay. Comfy bed and a quiet location. A perfect getaway!
Todo correcto
Jessica's place was perfect for our night in Porto. It had everything we needed including a parking spot which was very helpful. Wish we could've stayed longer!
일단 집이 깔끔하고 필요한 물품들이 다 있어서 편하다. 위치는 중심지에서 약간 거리가 있었지만 버스정류장도 가까웠고 버스로 10분정도면 시내까지 나갈 수 있어서 별로 상관없었다. 집 바로 근처에 마트도 있고 식당도 있어서 되게 편리했고 무엇보다 한적하고 조용해서 최고!!
Ótimo apartamento, limpo, próximo a cafés e mercado.

A localização é excelente, tem mercado nas proximidades, ponto de autocarro, alguns restaurantes e cafés. Fizemos tudo de transporte público e uber (principalmente uber, pois o valor ficou mais barato para nós, que estávamos em 3). O apartamento possui tudo que é necessário para a estadia, não sentimos falta de nada. Toalhas e lençóis limpos, água quentinha e cobertores suficientes para um dia frio.
Appartement propre,bien situé,  par contre il manque un store ou rideau occultant dans le salon, difficile de dormir sans.
Apartamento excelente  e bem localizado. Acordamos com sons de gaivotas e sinos de igreja, experiência  inesquecível!!!

Espero que melhore e que fique como nas fotos pois a minha realidade foi bem diferente, basicamente reclamo da sujeira, e da falta de cuidado quando se vai com muitos hospedes, poderia ter tido mais atencao!
Mandei as fotos da sujeira e espero retorno

Le logement de Jessica est spacieux et bien aménagé. L'ascenseur est rapide. L'immeuble est bien situé pour se rendre à Porto avec les transports en commun car on n'est pas très loin du centre de la ville.

name: Urban Shadow Rm6 (2-4 people人)Centre of TST
summary: Urban Shadow It couldn’t be better located. Walk out of the flat and you will find yourself in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, which is full of high end boutique shops, shopping malls, massage spas and artistic galleries. Loads of highly recommended restaurants and super cool bars are just next to the building. Feel the vibe and lively city life in Hong Kong  Urban Shadow 佔據著最好的地理位置,當你走出公寓,你会发现自己位于尖沙咀的中心地带,那里有许多高端精品店,购物商场,按摩水疗馆和艺术画廊｡ 强烈推荐的餐厅和超酷酒吧旁边就是大楼｡ 感受香港的氛围和生动的城市生活
space: In the traditional Chinese building, the simplicity and modernized design of Urban Shadow allows you to sit back and relax in the hustle and bustle yet lively city. The studio is freshly furnished. Couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers, who are tired of plain hotels, would find Urban Shadow fascinating! 在中国传统建筑中,Urban Shadow的简约和现代化设计让您在熙熙攘攘的热闹城市中放松身心｡ 这间一室公寓新鲜陈设｡ 厌倦普通酒店的夫妇,独自的冒险家和商务旅客会发现Urban Shadow迷人!

neighborhood_overview: Location: Metro station Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) less than 2 minutes Supermarket and 7/11 less than 1 minute open 24 hours Big shopping mall (K11 and The One and Miramall) less than 3 minutes Super famous bars street "Knutsford Terrace" less than 3 minutes Space Museum and Science Museum less than 5 minutes Habour City less than 10 minutes Hong Kong Pulse 3D Light Show & Avenue of Stars (Waterfront Promenade) less than 10 minutes 1 MTR stop from Temple Street.  3 MTR stops away from Central. 3 MTR stops away from Mongkok  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 位置: 尖沙咀地铁站(尖沙咀)不到2分钟 超市和7/11不到1分钟24小时开放 大型购物商场(K11和The One和Miramall)不到3分钟 超级着名的酒吧街“诺士佛台”不到3分钟 太空博物馆和科学馆不到5分钟路程 海港城不到10分钟 香港脉搏3D灯光秀和星光大道(海滨长廊)不到10分钟 距庙街有1站地铁车程｡ 地铁3号离开中环｡ 港铁3号线停靠旺角
notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple. *All starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  *If you would like some maps or local travel guides to read, there is a Visitor Centre at the airport, or simply text us in the Airbnb app. *If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section of the main arrival hall (PCCW brand suggested). *Please message me if you have any questions regarding the apartment/location. I look forward to hosting you very soon! 一旦抵达香港,一切都很简单｡ *所有通过行李海关后,立即通过位于大厅内的机场的免费电话致电｡ *如果您想要一些地图或当地旅游指南来阅读,那么在机场有一个游客中心,或者只需在Airbnb应用程序中给我们发短信即可｡ *如果您需要本地SIM卡,主入站大厅的中间部分有7-11(建议使用PCCW品牌)｡ *如果您对公寓/位置有任何疑问,请给我留言｡ 我期待着能够尽快見到你!
transit: Transportation: 5-minute walk to East Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit K). - Near Sheration Hotel. 2-minutes walk to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit B2). - Near K11 art mall. 45 minutes by A21 direct express bus from HK airport. 30 minutes by Airport Express train from HK airport. 交通: 步行5分钟至尖东站(K出口)｡ - Sheration酒店附近｡ 步行2分钟至尖沙咀地铁站(B2出口)｡ - 靠近K11艺术商场｡ 从香港机场乘坐A21直达快线巴士45分钟｡ 从香港机场乘机场快线30分钟｡

reviews.comments:
第一次作为住户用airbnb,对这家各方面都是非常满意的｡
第一,入住前本人花了很多时间寻找才最终确定了这家｡这家住宿在一个很安全的7层楼里,有电梯,一梯两户｡不像在airbnb上一些周边的其他住宿,房间照片拍的很好,但是实地去看了以后,大楼真的是各种脏乱差｡
第二,这家地理位置很棒,离地铁站走路两分钟｡楼下很多饭店,即使一天吃一家,一个月不带重的｡便利店,超市也都在走路距离｡
第三,房子是新装潢的,装修清新雅致,房东还是花了挺多心思的｡房间内浴巾,毛巾,洗漱用品,吹风机,热水壶等一应俱全｡进出门都是密码锁,比较安全方便｡
第四,也是最重要的一点,对于内地来的诸位朋友,香港这种寸土寸金的地方,房子小的程度是你没法想象的,简直夸张｡而这家房间面积就还算比较大的,住起来不会有那种压抑感｡
反正,就是强烈推荐!!!哈哈
地點很方便,房間很乾淨,所有都很滿意 只是可能房間在最角落不能用WiFi ,其他都很好
Knight Hub place was above my expectation. The room was spacious and clean. The bed was also comfy and very convenient to the nearest shops and restaurants.
非常好!本来以为会很小 但其实也还好 毕竟香港是寸金寸土的地方 因为是来看got7演唱会 所以整个旅程都很开心!各种设施都很齐全 地理位置方便 一出门直走两分钟就到了地铁站 房东非常好 有问必答 这里是一个不错的选择 下一次来香港我还会选择住这里!也很谢谢房东的照顾!
位置绝佳,一切都好,房间比想象中大,唯有洗手间确实小一些,房间的排气扇开关太隐秘了找了一个晚上都没找到,结果是哄哄哄吵了一个晚上没睡好,如果关了周边还是很安静的,建议房东可以来个明显的提醒,另外开水壶也可以换个小号一些的,虽然很有格调,但确实不实用,接水不方便,一点点小建议,希望更好｡下次还会选择这里
在金马伦道靠近加拿分道,位置很好,离地铁很近,k11和the one也很近,附近吃的很多,马路对面的小食店不知道是不是24小时的,反正很晚和很早都开着｡房间比较小,在寸土寸金的香港,在这个价格下,性价比算是高的,2个人住没有问题,三个人就挤了,我们5个人借了三间,还是比较宽敞的,电梯出来就一边是民宿一边美容院,没有什么闲杂人,如果人多,把里面六个房间都租下还是很不错的

My husband and I stayed in Knight’s place for 24 nights, and are so glad we chose this room - it would be painful if the room is not comfortable for such a long stay. Knight is a most friendly and courteous host, he is always quick to respond to any inquiries both before booking and during our stay. This room is a good size for the two of us in Hong Kong standards, with space to move around and to put our suitcases. It is cute and looks just like the pictures. The bed is comfortable, and even though the Hong Kong standard bed length is a little short for us (we are both tall), there is room at the end of the bed to stretch our legs. This is a major criterion when I was searching for a room. 

We were also surprised at how quiet the room is - because the windows face the back side of the building and away from the main street, there is barely any street noise at all day or night. As this is the last room at the end of the corridor, there is neighbor on only one side - this is nice as the walls are thin and sound from the next room (shower) can be heard. The location is also superb, being in the heart of the city, with all kinds of eateries, shops, MTR (subway), buses, taxi and Star Ferry. Laundry service is available just a short walk away, and there is currency exchange right next to the building entrance with the best rate in the block. We also feel very safe going in and out of the apartment and building at all hours. 

This a great room in terms of location, space, comfort and value. We would love to stay here again in the future.
The location is great and very close to the MTR station. The room was comfortable and clean. Big thanks to Qiran for all her help.

地點非常便利,離地鐵站很近
房間非常狹窄,大行李箱打開就沒位置了
廁所非常小,進出門都要閃個位置｡
很好,不像别人说的连箱子都开不了,很宽敞,我们4个人住都没问题,而且位置很好,我们都是2-3点出来买宵夜,反正很满意
地方很好找,房间干净整洁,空间够用不小,周围购物吃饭都很便利,到地铁站两分钟,性价比高｡
Excellent location.
地理位置还不错,离龙城大药房金英大药房超级近,也很好找,就是房间太小

房子的位置是真的很方便,几乎所有网红餐厅都可以走路到达,狗仔粉几十米就到后街有肥仔小食店,还有网红甜品店｡妈咪鸡蛋仔,池记,华嫂,澳洲牛奶公司,顺义牛奶公司,兰芳园,稻香,买小熊饼干,逛街,去太空馆,去维港海港城,坐天星小轮,离地铁很近去迪士尼中环东涌都方便｡逛街吃宵夜超方便｡比较遗憾的是靠垫长枕头很不干净有味道有点不舒服,洗手间没有独立干湿分离卫浴(maybe香港都这样)但是真的很不习惯,然后隔街窗户冲着KTV,每晚十二点以后准时开唱｡圣诞节有点贵,但总体性价比还是不错的,位置五颗星,要求不是很多的话推荐入住｡
房间真的不小!!!比之前住过的民宿都大,这就够了吧!

Very small but magical squeezed in bedroom living room and bathroom...the worst part is the shower, you gotta make sure you don't make the water overflow into the room...Very good location though, convenient for tourists
房源离尖沙咀很近,地理优越,性价比超高,房间很整洁､设备完善,房东人也超好,特别温柔负责｡总得来说这次入住体验特别好,除了厕所地漏漏水有点慢以外,没有任何缺点~
麻雀虽小,五脏俱全,地理位置很好,离尖沙咀地铁站几百米,很方便
位置也好找,周围也很方便,房东也细心
房子在香港到中心地带,香港寸土寸金所以别想有多大的房间,但是这个真的对于香港不小了,性价比很高,房东回复很及时人很好,唯一一点美中不足的是隔音有点不太好,隔壁用水的时候我们也有点影响,不过问题不大｡

地理位置超级棒!从机场坐a21下车走五分钟就到,按照地图也很好找,离龙城金英狗仔粉妈咪鸡蛋仔一澜华嫂等等都很近｡大厦比较旧但是有电梯,房子的锁都是先进的密码锁,按照房东提前发的邮件可以顺利进入｡
房间装修很有生活,我和男朋友都很喜欢,而且对于香港同等价位的房间来说已经很大了!可以摊开两个行李箱(28寸的在吧台和床之间,20寸的在小沙发前)还有地方走路!小隔间里有小桌子小矮椅小沙发,可以坐在那里吃夜宵!而且房间里居然还有冰箱和电视,惊呆了!
缺点是洗手间比较小,被子比较小,房间隔音不好｡
总体来讲,我非常满意,下次再来我还会订这里,也会推荐给朋友的
Great location, stylish apartment, thin walls but still ok. Would come back
位置不错 离地铁站非常近
地段很好,尖沙咀核心位置,交通出行很方便｡房间虽不大,但空间布置很巧妙,装修也蛮有风格
好
房间隔音较差,隔壁说话用水听得很清楚｡不过很多民宿都这样,瑕不掩瑜｡空间比一般民宿大,适合一到两人居住,一个人住很舒适｡装修很有风格,位置非常好,去龙城大药房,海港城,买小熊曲奇都腿着就到了很方便｡机场大巴下来很快就到｡性价比非常高,小楼没有乱七八糟的人,感觉挺安全,自助入住也方便,推荐,下次来还会住｡只是入住需要记得自己带拖鞋,厕所纸巾盒盖子非常锋利,换纸要小心｡

Very well communicated and easy access to bus/metro/bicing.. etc. Bruc & bruc is located in the Eixample Dreta neighborhood, great for sightseeing and contemplate Gaudi´s work as well as other famous local architects. This is also the downtown of Barcelona near "Sagrada Familia" and "La Pedrera" (Gaudi's house) with all facilities of public transportation to get to any place in the city day and night. By metro it takes about 20 minutes to get to the closest beach (Barceloneta). Subway Station Diagonal (L3 green) is two block.
notes: - Free gym nearby - Included services: . Transportation from the airport (€ 35 to 4 pers) . Free WIFI . Parking, about € 12 per day . TV . Internal management . Air conditioner . Heating . Water in bottle
transit: To get from the Barcelona Airport to BRUC & BRUC GUESTHOUSE BARCELONA, Mallorca (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , you have different options: 1. With the Train. If you are in T1 you can take a free bus which goes to T2 and take the train there. Then you have to stop in Passeig de Gràcia and from there you walk 5-10 minutes to the hostel. Price: 2,15€ 2. With the standart bus. You can take the bus L46 and stop in Plaça d'espanya, there you have to take the metro L3 and stop in Diagonal or Passeig de gràcia, walking distance to the hotel 5-10 min. Price: 2,15€ 3. With the metro. You can take the metro L9 and stop in Collblanc, there you take the line 5 and stop in Verdaguer, then you walk 5 minutes to the hotel. Price: 4,50€ 4. With the Aerobus. You can take the Airbus and stop in Plaça Catalunya. Price: 5,90. There you can take the metro L3 and stop in Diagonal or Passeig de Gràcia. Price: 2,15. Total price: 7,05€. 5. host.host_about:
Hello everyone! I'm Adriana Mateos and I'm part of BRUC 6 BRUC GUESTHOUSE  team with Wildelys, Daiane, Luciano, Vanessa, Josefina.

We have been working in the sector for 5 years with a clear objective: to offer our passengers rooms with all the comfort and cutting-edge technology at competitive prices. We guarantee quality and the friendliest treatment to make the stay unforgettable. 
We currently have 3 hotels in the heart of Barcelona and we are in a continuous search for better offers and amenities.

Bruc & Bruc  Guesthouse team is young and dynamic and will welcome people who speak Spanish, English and Italian. We always offer personalized attention to all our clients from 09:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

Of course, we are experts in tourism so whatever you doubt, let us know we will be happy to help you prepare your stay! We will offer you all kinds of tips and suggestions, the best places to eat, essential visits, ... all the information that may be useful! We want your stay with us to be really fantastic, our house is your home! We will wait for you! 

¡Hola a todos! Soy Adriana Mateos y soy parte del equipo de BRUC & BRUC GUESTHOUSE con Wildelys, Daiane y Luciano, Vanessa, Josefina.

Llevamos 5 años trabajando en el sector con un objetivo claro: ofrecer a nuestros pasajeros habitaciones con todas las comodidades y tecnología de vanguardia a precios competitivos. Garantizamos la calidad y el trato más amigable para que la estancia sea inolvidable.
Actualmente tenemos 3 hoteles en el corazón de Barcelona y estamos en una búsqueda continua de mejores ofertas y comodidades.

El equipo de habitaciones de Bruc & Bruc Guesthouse es joven y dinámico y dará la bienvenida a personas que hablan español, inglés e italiano. Siempre ofrecemos atención personalizada a todos nuestros clientes de 09:00 a.m. a 10:00 p.m.

Por supuesto, somos expertos en turismo, por lo que no dude en comentarnos, estaremos encantados de ayudarlo a preparar su estancia. Le ofreceremos todo tipo de consejos y sugerencias, los mejores lugares para comer, visitas esenciales, ... ¡toda la información que pueda ser útil! Queremos que su estancia con nosotros sea realmente fantástica, nuestra casa es su hogar. ¡Esperaremos por ti!

reviews.comments:
Ahmet is a really nice host. 
If you’re into staying with someone that is always there for you and cares about you then his room is a perfect decision. 
He always helps and is down for experiencing things together.
We enjoyed our time a lot!

Host loves to share information about Istanbul, including good places to eat, and good touristic locations. The room was very warm with no fans, but the window has a nice breeze from time to time. Other than that (and no elevator), everything was nearly perfect!

Really disappointed about the accommodation. The location was great, but the common areas were really really dirty and almost unhealthy. The room was smaller than expected, impossible to sleep on the "sofa", so we had to sleep the 2 of us in a small bed. However, Ahmet is a good person and involve with his guests, all the time wants to share information and good places, which can be sometimes a bit too much.
The location is very convenient, near from Taksim Square. The building is easy to find. The hospitality of the host is great.

reviews.comments: Super nice host with lovely room

This place is amazing. It’s in the heart of a very culturaly preserved area of Hong Kong. It’s like a 1 min walk to one of Hong Kong’s many state of the art subway stations. 
The view is spectacular and Laurent was a great host.
I enjoyed my stay at Laurent's place, the room is small but suited my needs perfectly, the location was very convenient and close to everything I needed to do. I would stay again.
Thank you Laurent! I've enjoyed my stay so much that now I want to stay longer. I definitely recommend his place - great location and nice home with lovely people :)
I liked staying at Laurent's place so much that went back right away! Thank you for hosting me again :)
sono stata benissimo in una casa che ho sentito subito come un luogo "mio". Gli host sono molto accoglienti e divertenti !!

I needed friends here 'cos I was new and I had almost a new family in a wonderful place!
Everything was really good!
Excellent accueil de la part de Laurent et sa copine, avec quelques recommandations pour ne pas se sentir perdue dans la jungle hongkongaise je recommande vivement :)
Laurent is very nice host and the flat is well located. I would come back again every time!

Good place to stay in hong kong island. You are in walking distance to Hollywood road and Queens Road. Otherwise you just have a metro station around the corner. The view from the room is as displayed in the picture. Laurent and his girlfriend are very welcoming and communication was very good throughout. I only can recommended this place!
Great location. Right on the MTR station.

非常棒的入住体验｡再次感谢Laurent & Ivan｡
我想说一下位置,方便后面的伙伴更快入住｡
从西营盘A1口出来,往左边走,看到U购超市的路口,
是威利麻街,就是这里条街啦｡
房子在左侧,入口两旁的门店是卖鱼干的商店,从这里进去上电梯就是啦｡
住在这里很安全,一楼门口有人24小时值守｡
同时高楼层不临街,也很安静｡
房间有单人床和一个大衣柜,旅行入住刚好｡
厨房､客厅和卫生间公用,都很方便｡
非常好,期待下次有机会再来｡

Location is really nice, 15min-walk from ferry, 25-min-walk from ifc, 25min-walk from hongkong univ., even though room is a little bit small, its sufficient to experience a general hong kong residence
Good experience, I stayed in the Single Bed Room for two weeks, good amount of light and open view, easy to communicate with, clean and tidy Apartment,

The location is very good and we can have lots of accesses to good restaurants near the apartment. The room has only space that I can open my carry case but it was enough for me. The living host Ivan is very friendly and kind to support me!

name: Summer Perfect, 2 Bed, Pool & A/C in Elizabeth Bay
summary: A rare find in Sydney to find a 2 bedroom apartment that is fully air conditioned with a pool - perfect for summer. The apartment is situated just a short stroll to Sydney's best attractions, Macleay St dining and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Relax on the balcony with a leafy outlook and harbour views. Wi-Fi, new kitchen appliances , washer & dryer. The unit works for solo adventurers, couples, business travelers or a family of 4 with 2 new comfortable queen sized beds.
space: The apartment is situated in one of Elizabeth Bays most prestigious avenues located in a well maintained  secure building with lift access.
description: A rare find in Sydney to find a 2 bedroom apartment that is fully air conditioned with a pool - perfect for summer. The apartment is situated just a short stroll to Sydney's best attractions, Macleay St dining and an easy 8 min walk to Kings Cross Train Station. Relax on the balcony with a leafy outlook and harbour views. Wi-Fi, new kitchen appliances , washer & dryer. The unit works for solo adventurers, couples, business travelers or a family of 4 with 2 new comfortable queen sized beds. neighborhood_overview: Elizabeth Bay is an inner-city locality of Sydney that is rich in diversity. It is approximately two kilometres east of Sydney’s CBD and is bordered by the fashionable suburbs of Potts Point, Rushcutters Bay, and Darlinghurst.
transit: The location is a 15 minute drive from Sydney Airport (without traffic). 2km to the Sydney CBD and Opera House which can be accessed by Train via the nearby Kings Cross Train Station or by car within 10 minutes.
access: Guest have access to the entire apartment which includes 2 well appointed air conditioned bedrooms and a relaxing balcony. The guests have access to  a swimming pool.  Offstreet secure parking is available at an extra $20 per night.
interaction: Interaction with the host is optional for the guest after initial check in. The host will be available on check-in.

reviews.comments: We had a great stay at George's place. He was very prompt in his responses. Loved his tips for good restaurants and bars in the neighbourhood. The apt is very cosy, clean and comfortable. It's perfectly located in the central with easy access to the metro. Total value for money.
Great cosy equipped  apartment in excellent location. Excellent value for money.

This apartment was just perfect for my wife and I. Perfectly sized and located, very comfortable, professionally fitted out, unbelievably quiet and private even though it's just a stone's throw from Sydney's famous nightlife and a short stroll to the harbour foreshore.  Reasonably priced, we will definitely make this our No. 1 place to stay in Sydney.
Great spot. Very clean and cozy. Great location to local cafes and in a cool and safe neighborhood.
Great apartment. Fantastic location. George could not have been more helpful.
Nice place. Great host. Terrific location. Near what remains of Sydney nightlife as well as great places to dine out and breakfast.
Great stay!!!
Loved staying at George’s apartment. Amazing location, parking was excellent and the unit itself spacious, clean and stylish.

This is a great find in the Elizabeth Bay area. George took our reservation on short notice, and was very responsive. The apartment exceeded our expectations- it's very well kept and has all the amenities we were hoping for including a washer and dryer in unit and full kitchen. Check in was simple and straightforward, and George was easy to reach when we had a question. I highly recommend this rental.

The apartment is in a great location - on a quiet street within an easy walk through the Botanic gardens to the centre of town. Buses and trains can be caught just a few minutes walk away, and there are all the shops you would need to stock up also within walking distance.
The accommodation was very clean, well equipped, stylish, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen had everything you might need - including a coffee machine and pods and dish washer! The key collection/drop off  process  was easy, and the building secure. It was one of the few places we found with two separate double bedrooms.
We didn't see the pool because the weather wasn't really great, but we did spend some time sitting on the balcony enjoying the trees and the birds. 
All in all it was a lovely few days and for a very reasonable cost, thoroughly recommended!

Perfect location!  Close to the train station so it was very easy to get anywhere.  The neighborhood was full of great restaurants or if you want to stay “home” there are grocery stores close by.  The kitchen had everything you needed to cook.  We loved hanging out on the balcony to unwind and relax after full days of exploring.  Beautiful place!!!
Perfect host and location - thoroughly recommend!

Absolutely perfectly located for Sydney, and great access to transport links, lots of local amenities, comfy and well presented place with lots of space and loads of added extras. George is good to communicate with and couldn’t fault our stay.

George’s apartment is an example of what Airbnb should be . 
 George made sure everything is clean and new as well as stylish. 
We found his apartment very comfortable and it was so nice and quiet .

We stayed in this apartment for one week during December. Exceptional location - only a short walk to the train station. 

Apartment clean and host responds very quickly to all messages!

A stylish wee unit in a handy location.  George the host was very easy to contact and very friendly. Appreciated the air conditioning, nice linens, amenities in the bathroom and furnishings. Thank you for your hospitality.

Excellent property and host. Check-in straightforward, property delightful - very clean, well-appointed and with extra touches to make it feel like home. Host not present on arrival but responded promptly to queries and ensured a totally smooth stay. Property ideal for us, including a delightful balcony; aircon in bedrooms & livingroom all individually controlled; plenty of space and amenities, and utensils. Area perfect: gorgeous, quiet, transport links all v convenient and close. Would stay at George's place again and would recommend without hesitation. Lovely.

George’s place is in an excellent location to the train and some really nice cafes right outside. The area can be a bit dodgey at night time but it definitely means you get to see a more authentic side to Sydney. Beautifully styled and comfortable. Will definitely keep this in mind when I visit Sydney again.
Thank you George for hosting us!  We enjoyed staying at your apartment. Great location, close to good restaurants and coffee,  transport, historic places and parking was relatively easy too.
George is an amazing host, the location is great And very quiet.
Well placed apartment for the area, clean and tidy. Had everything we needed.

George is a great host.  He is very communicative.  He left very good detailed check in instructions and checked in with us the next day to make sure everything went well with check in and everything with the apartment was ok.  His apartment is very nice and very comfortable.  We would definitely stay here again.

This is a great property in a lovely area of Sydney. The beds were really comfortable with nice touches in the apartment. There are plenty of restaurants near by and the historical Elizabeth House just down the road. It's a comfortable walk to Woolloomooloo but there are hills and steps.
George’s apartment is centrally located close to mcleay st and the harbour. It is a gorgeous, relaxing sanctuary with everything you need to enjoy The beautiful harbour city

George’s apartment is great everything and more that you need for up to 4 people.  The check in was smooth and although we didn’t see George he let us know he was at the end of a text. Lots of amenities provided, kitchen ware, toiletries everything you would need. The apartment was very spacious and immaculately clean. The best bit for us was location- 30 minute walk to the Sydney harbour great! Overall this was a great place to stay thanks George
Great apartment.  George is very responsive and instructions are very clear.

name: Privacidad, silencio, buena comunicación...
summary: Pequeño estudio, con luz natural des del patio de luces.  Se encuentra en una primera planta real a la que se accede por escalera o ascensor.  El espacio de desayuno cuenta con cocina y sus utensilios, servicio de mesa y mininevera.  Es un baño de tres piezas y lavadora. Un armario independiente como espacio de almacenaje de ropa. Para estancias largas, a partir del segundo mes, los gastos de agua, luz y limpieza corren a cargo del usuario.
space: La privacidad, el silencio y la buena ubicación.

Dispone de diversos espacios verdes, centros deportivos, zonas de compra, ocio y gastronomía. Tiene fácil acceso al aeropuerto y a cualquiera otro punto de la ciudad, debido su proximidad a la avenida donde confluyen distintos medios de transportes como metro, tranvía, taxis y bicicletas. No fumadores.

host.host_about:
Estar con las personas que me importan, música popular brasileña, buena comida, ir en bici y hablar pt-portuguese son las cinco cosas que me mueven!
La playa es mi Norte, aunque me gusta la montaña en otoño.
Mis libros favoritos son los de cocina, si pueden leer y pasarlo bien además de ayudar a prepara buenas recetas; pero también me gustan las novelas históricas!
Me interesan los viajes culturales y gastronómicos, entornos intimistas y auténticos, preferentemente descubrir la belleza local mas que el puramente turístico.

name: Homa 2 - 1 BR sleep 4 parking - AC
summary: The apartment is completely renovated in the modern condo style. Open concept for the kitchen with dining area that overlooks the living room. The closed bedroom has its own private balcony. Lots of storage throughout the apartment (wardrobes and closets). You will find a large bathtub in the bright bathroom. Parking is available behind, and you will be a few minutes walk from the subway. There are many shops, cafes and restaurants at the end of the street.
space: This is our 4th project. We also brought great care in the finishing and decorated it as if we were going to live it. You will appreciate the mix of a modern touch with some elements of rustic and industrial decoration. In addition, Montreal artists and artisan created the decorative elements  to give you a 100% Montreal environment and to enjoy a unique stay in our beautiful city.
description: The apartment is completely renovated in the modern condo style. Open concept for the kitchen with dining area that overlooks the living room. The closed bedroom has its own private balcony. Lots of storage throughout the apartment (wardrobes and closets). You will find a large bathtub in the bright bathroom. Parking is available behind, and you will be a few minutes walk from the subway. There are many shops, cafes and restaurants at the end of the street. This is our 4th project. In addition, Montreal artists and artisan created the decorative elements  to give you a 100% Montreal environment and to enjoy a unique stay in our beautiful city. neighborhood_overview: Hochelaga is a popular and mixed district which has been in full development for about ten years. There is a traditional neighborhood life, small shopkeepers, trendy café and trendy boutiques.
notes: We are comited to offer a 5 stairs experience to our guest. If you find anything that does not meet your expectation, please contact us before rating a less than 5 stars review. rental for 31 days or more. Contact us for any request
transit: The Préfontaine metro station (green line) is only a few minutes walk away and allows you to move around the city easily. The green line connects the east to the west of the city, including a passage on the Olympic site and especially the city center and its entertainment district.

house_rules: - - Pas de bruit après 22h. - Respect des autres résidents de l'immeuble - Pas de fête dans l'appartement - Respecter le nombre de voyageurs maximum - Respecter les espaces communs.

host.host_about:
J'habite Montréal depuis 2010 et j'adore ma ville d'adoption. On y retrouve l'ambiance chaleureuse des capitales européennes sur le plateaux et l'intensité des grandes villes américaines au centre-ville. J'aime le multiculturalisme qui brasse les personnes du monde entier. On peut goûter la cuisine de tous les pays du monde en une seule place.
Lorsque je voyage, j'aime pouvoir découvrir la place ou je vais et vivre à la manière des locaux. C'est ce que je veux offrir aux voyageurs que j'accueil : un endroit agréable, confortable propre et ou on peut passer un bon moment après une intense journée en visite.

reviews.comments: Clean, modern, parking and close to the metro. Arnaud's place is a good value.
This is a very clean apartment.  The place has a full kitchen and some games for kids to play.  Its close to old Montreal and having a parking space its a plus.
Arnaud’s place was fantastic-extremely clean and perfect for our stay. Added bonus: the bed is more comfortable than any other air bnb I have stayed in. Thank you Arnaud for being such a great host!

Appartement très propre, déco moderne, bien équipé, bon échange avec l’hôte entente cordiale pour un changement de dernière minute
Conforme aux attentes

I loved staying here. The apartment is beautiful; it was super clean, and the off-street parking space was lovely. The apartment is close to many restaurants and a subway station. It was easy to find, and check in was straightforward and convenient. Consider staying here if you're visiting Montreal; I would definitely return!
Upon arrival, the parking was easy to locate. Arnaud makes use of the space very well to create an inviting atmosphere. It was a pleasure to stay here for the few days in Montreal!

We were impressed with the style of this apartment, really cool. The host put a lot of thought into the amenities provided as well. There are high chairs, play pens, games, dishes, etc to make things feel like home.
Space was wonderful and very convenient. I'll be checking to see if its available if I'm traveling to the are again!
i love the platform
Clean and stylish. Communication was timely. A quality place to stay
Easy check-in and check-out. Very clean. Close to public transit. Off the street parking is a huge plus. A great place to stay in Montreal!

name: Matosinhos Royal Park
summary: Matosinhos é famosa pela sua praia, bom clima e seus maravilhosos restaurantes de peixe e mariscos. O apartamento está todo reformado com camas aconchegantes, lençóis novos,  muita luz, boa atmosfera e com vista que traz muita paz. Fica a 6 minutos de metro, da estação Parque de Real, linha azul A, direção Senhor dos Matosinhos. A praia de Matosinhos fica a 20 minutos a pé ou a duas estações de metro (Matosinhos Sul). Mesmo preço para 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 e 6 pessoas! Aproveitem! Terei muito gosto em vos receber no Matosinho Parque Real apartamento.  Sejam bem-vindos E até breve!
space: A cozinha está  equipada, com placa, forno, exaustor,  microondas, panelas, pratos, copos, taças, talheres,... A casa de banho também está completa, além de ter champu e gel de banho.  Forneço toda a roupa de cama e toalhas.   1 quarto com cama de casal e os outros 2 com bicamas. Wi fi e TV a cabo disponíveis. O apartamento fica no 3 andar sem elevador, mas possui um pequeno terraço com uma vista que traz tranquilidade e é um apartamento com boa vizinhança e  atmosfera. The place was totally renovated. There is a living room with cable TV and the apartment has also wi fi, that works very well.     The kitchen is fully equipped with frigorifico, plate, oven, exhaust fan, dishes, pans, ... There are 3 (three) bedrooms, one with double bed and another two bedrooms with twin bed each room.    The apartment is on 3rd floor without elevator, but  there is also a delightful small terrace and a good energy and  neighbourhood.   I'll provide clean towels and bed sheets.
description: Matosinhos é famosa pela sua praia, bom clima e seus maravilhosos restaurantes de peixe e mariscos. O apartamento está todo reformado com camas aconchegantes, lençóis novos,  muita luz, boa atmosfera e com vista que traz muita paz. Fica a 6 minutos de metro, da estação Parque de Real, linha azul A, direção Senhor dos Matosinhos. A praia de Matosinhos fica a 20 minutos a pé ou a duas estações de metro (Matosinhos Sul). O apartamento fica no 3 andar sem elevador, mas possui um pequeno terraço com uma vista que traz tranquilida
neighborhood_overview: Matosinhos é um lugar muito agradável com pessoas simpáticas e boa vizinhança.
transit: O metro fica a 10 minutos do apartamento, estação Parque de Real. Linha A - Azul, para direção Senhor dos Matosinhos.  Para praia são só 2 estações de metro, estação Matosinhos Sul. Para direção Estádio do Dragão irá conhecer todos os pontos turísticos da Baixa do Porto, como estação Bolhão ou Trindade. Para o aeroporto Francisco Sá Carneiro há a  linha E - Violeta, saindo da estação Senhora da Hora.
access: Tem acesso a todo apartamento.
interaction: Estou disponível para ajudar os hóspedes, através de mensagens,  telefone ou email.

host.host_about:
Olá, meu nome é Cecilia, sou do Rio de Janeiro, mas atualmente moro no Porto, em Matosinhos. Outra cidade maravilhosa para conhecer!
Sou casada e tenho uma filha. E gosto muito de viajar com a minha família e utilizo o Airbnb também.
Será um prazer receber os hóspedes. Sejam bem- vindos!

reviews.comments: Excelente relação preço/qualidade. Proprietários muito disponiveis antes e durante a estadia. Apartamento renovado. Uma excelente escolha.

The place was great. Everything was more then we expected. We came to Porto with our car and there was a plenty of place to park right in front of the building. Cecilia even prepared a baby bed and a playing table with the book for our two years daughter. That was a surprise and unexpected. We really could enjoy our stay after enjoyable visits to the amazing city of Porto and  boat rides on Douro. We had great weather and could enjoy a glass of wine on the terrace with our friends. Highly recommended. We didn't try public transport, but if you have a car, it is much better to escape from overcrowded city ceneter and in 15min you are back in the centre of all the attractions.
10/10 Surgió un pequeño problema y Cecilia lo resolvió de manera muy eficaz. Muy contentos de haber estado hospedados en su vivienda. 100% recomendada.
Je recommande ce logement. Très bon accueil. Cécilia est très  réactive au message. Pleins de petites attentions sympathiques. Encore merci pour tout.

The apartment is very clean, nicely decorated and had all the amenities you need.  Cecilia was a great host,  she was very flexible, accommodating and responsive. The apartment is still a bit of distance to the beach,  but we had a rental car and never had trouble finding free parking by the beach,  nor by the apartment.  Lots of groceries stores, restaurants and shops close by and Porto was a quick and scenic drive away. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would return. Thank you Cecilia for your hospitality.

Passamos uma semana muito agradável no apartamento da Cecília. Fomos muito bem recebidos. O apartamento estava limpo e funcional, com comércios pertinho e a proximidade do metro e autocarro (2 estações da praia ou 25 minutos andando, 5 estações do centro comercial Norte Shopping, uma dúzia do centro do Porto). Cecília foi flexível com o horário de chegada e partida, reactiva na resposta das mensagens e é uma pessoa muito acolhedora. Recomendamos.

Cecilia is a great hostess! The house is great and perfect for a family or friends vacations. It has everything you need brand new! The location is fine, near to the metro station (easy connection to Porto City center) and an walkable distance to Matosinhos City center (and the beach!). An amazing experience that worth every €!
Great place for your money, ideal for a large family plenty of beds, quite and safe place, not far from the sea and amazing communication to Porto (bus, metro). Very accessible host and helpful.
Très bon accueil et hôte très réactive. Logement convenable pour séjourner en famille. Très bien équipé.
A Cecília recebeu-nos muito bem. A casa, apesar de ser um 3. Andar sem elevador, está numa zona muito sossegada e é muito limpa e confortável. Recomendo !
Appartement propre , bien localiser , une accueil chaleureuse ! pas loin la ligne de train , quartier calme.
super apart très bien place pas loin de porto centre

L'appartamento è carino, spazioso e ben curato. Cecilia ci ha accolti con cortesia e disponibilità.
Vicinissima la stazione della metropolitana che in 15' porta in centro città. Inoltre è vicino all'oceano!!!

My family and I stayed at Cecelia's for three nights, 12 to 15 September 2018. It was great! We had more than enough towels for our pleasure. More than enough shower gel and shampoo. And plenty space for sleeping, and for relaxing and eating a special meal in the kitchen/dining/lounge area.
We thoroughly enjoyed being able to use the kitchen and prepare our freshly purchased sardines, potatoes and vegetables. This was something we always wanted to do in Portugal.
Cecelia was always on hand to communicate with and provide quick assistance, eg. when we needed an adapter, directions and a taxi to the bus terminal.
Cecelia's home is just a 15 minute walk away from the beach and seafood restaurants. Also Lidls supermarket is located between the beach and Cecelia's home. We enjoyed popping there on our way home each evening.
I would recommend her home to anyone!

Cecilia was really nice, she even picked us up at the metro station. The house doesn’t seem so inviting from the outside, but from the inside it’s really ok. It was clean and there was enough room for 5 people. 
Its 35 min from the city center with the metro, you can reach the station within 5 minutes.
Very hospitable hosts. Everything is at home and cosy.I recommend!

Apartamento bem localizado, limpo, confortável e muito agradável.
O acolhimento pela anfitriã D. Cecília foi 5 estrelas, muito prestativa e simpática.
Recomendamos.

Cecilia is a nice and friendly host. Her warm welcome made us feel like home in theses days! Her apartment was clean and there is enough room for six people! There was already water and some other drinks  in the fridge and little cakes, tea etc. I would recommend a stay in her apartment.

Cecília e seu marido Eduardo são extremamente profissionais e competentes. O local é exatamente como descrito e está nas fotos. Foi uma estadia ótima, bem agradável.  Além  de recomendar aviso que sempre poderá haver uma boa surpresa.

O apartamento é perfeito, bem localizado, muito agradável e confortável.
A D. Cecilia foi a nossa anfitriã, é uma senhora muito simpática, atenciosa e prestativa.
Recomendamos.
We had a very nice time. Thanks for hosting us, Cecilia.
Un lugar cómodo, ideal para playear y visitar al ciudad, al lado del metro en un barrio tranquilo
Apartamento em ótimas condições. Limpeza, hospitalidade e conforto exemplares. A nossa anfitriã D. Cecília  teve em atenção todos os detalhes e é uma pessoa muito simpática e prestativa.
Bien

La verdad,que al leer los comentarios,más o menos a sabia  lo que voy a encontrar,pero no voy a exagerar cuando digo que al final nos hsn sorprendido los detalles de este alojamiento!!! Parecía más un hotel que un simple apartamento,con una botella de vino en la mesa,infusiónes ,café.... galletitas!! Dentro del frigorífico había agua,zumos ..... vamos ,un detalle no -detallazo!!!!!!De lo demas solo decir que todo perfecto,limpio ,ordenado,con jabón,shampoo ... creo que no se puede pedir más !! Súper simpática la gente,encima nos han dejado salir más tarde de lo habitual,ya que no tenían nuevos huéspedes ese día !!! Mil gracias Cecilia por todo,lo recomiendo sin la menor duda a todos!!! Quedamos con ganas de repetir , ya que lugar merece la pena!!!!!!
Segítőkész házigazda! Gyors, korrekt válaszadás!

Apartamento em otimas condicoes, bem localizado numa zona calma. Num terceiro piso sem elevador mas vale a pena. Limpo, organizado com tudo à disposição. À  chegada haviam disponíveis bolachaa, chá e café. A cecilia é super acessivel e atenciosa, consegui à ultima da hora disponibilizar  um berço e dar um toque familiar/infantil à sala com alguns livros, cadeiras de crianca e tapetes para brincar.
Iremos voltar.

name: Modern Room in a Charming Apartment (next to UdeM)
summary: Clean and cozy room in a modern four bedrooms appartment. The flat is located at a 5-minutes walking distance to Cote-des-Neiges metro station and UdeM university. It is right beside the wonderful St-Joseph Oratory. Nearby are a grocery store, lots of restaurants, shops and convenience stores. It is a charm.
description: Clean and cozy room in a modern four bedrooms appartment. The flat is located at a 5-minutes walking distance to Cote-des-Neiges metro station and UdeM university. It is right beside the wonderful St-Joseph Oratory. Nearby are a grocery store, lots of restaurants, shops and convenience stores. It is a charm. You will have access to a modern kitchen with a refrigerator to store and cook your food. A laundry room is available in the building.
access: You will have access to a modern kitchen with a refrigerator to store and cook your food. A laundry room is available in the building.

host.host_about: Passionné de voyages, de films, de musique, de livres, de sports. Je travaille et étudie en réalisation cinématographique.

reviews.comments: Great place, excezsiyg
Une chambre agréable dans un grand appartement juste à côté de l'oratoire St-Joseph, avec un accueil sympathique de Raphaël. Recommandé !
We had a great time! Raphael is a very nice host!

excellente expérience.
à recommander
Amazing location
You get what you pay for and the location is amazing! A really pretty neighbourhood, right by the subway :)
Raphael est chaleureux et son espace est super.
Raphael is an awesome host, made my stay in Montreal a lot easier! The place is close to UdeM and HEC and also to a wide options of food, supermarkets and touristic attractions
Amazing location and stylish place Raphael quickly response for everything he is really very nice guy
Great location and amazing at the price.  Could be a bit cleaner, though, and the internet was somewhat intermittent.
Nice place, close to the subway  and Université du Montréal  (UDeM)
An apartment close to everything (bank, pharmacy, restaurants, grocery store, University of Montreal)
comfortable room as well as the owner’s hospitality. Good place to stay!
Everything was perfect!

Excellent accueil de Raphaël qui était très attentionné. J'ai passé un agréable moment dans cette sympathique colocation, et j'y ai trouvé tout ce dont j'avais besoin. Seul petit bémol, la cuisine pas toujours très propre...
great guy really easy going would recommend easily

Raphael charges $25 cleaning fee. So at least I expected a clean apartment. Bathroom, kitchen was very dirty. I didn’t use either. I did wanted to boil some water for tea but there wasn’t any kettle or pot. The bedroom has no lock & is right by the main door. So, you can hear people coming & going. The bedroom was hot like a sauna, even with the window open. Didn’t end up sleeping, didn’t even shower. 
I arrived about 9pm, left 8am the next morning. He justified by saying it’s only $17/night but with the cleaning, service etc, it ended up costing $48.02 for 1 night. Didn’t use any of the amenities due to uncleanliness. 
I didn’t meet him only spoke on the phone. He seemed nice & was communicating throughout the night & asked me take pictures of the whatever wasn’t clean because he needed evidence for the cleaning company, which I did & sent it to him. He said he would meet me in the morning, check out the place and refund me the cleaning fee but didn’t show up or responded to my messages. Location is good & check-in was easy.

Chambre dans un appartement en collocation très bien située car proche du métro, de nombreux commerces, restaurants, de l'université et de l'oratoire St-Joseph. Raphaël est un hôte très à l'écoute et avec qui la communication est fluide. Encore merci pour son accueil parfait et ses efforts pour rendre mon séjour agréable, je n'ai absolument manqué de rien. Je recommande sans hésitation!

Raphael's room was superb; absolutely a great deal considering the area. Room was very well-kept, and check-in was a breeze. Perfect for any traveller or couple looking for a good place to rest while exploring Montréal.  The metro and St. Joseph's Oratory are steps away, and CDN is a lovely neighbourhood to roam. Raphael was quick to respond and check in on us, and was a great host. Highly recommend.

Awesome location, this room was in a very convenient spot to allow you to explore Montreal. Room itself is alright, place is not too clean, we actually had to go buy our own toilet paper because there was none and if you're ok with other people stay in same place with you, then you'll be fine here. Really good host, communicative. Only downfall of this place was the cleanliness and how it was unclear about other people also living there. Even so, it was quiet and everyone was respectful of each others space. If you are looking for a place to sleep and semi shower, this place works great!
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: A room in Kadıköy for single or couple travellers
summary: Most beautiful and friendly area of Kadıköy. Also very close to every possibility of public transportations.
description: Most beautiful and friendly area of Kadıköy. Also very close to every possibility of public transportations. Yeldeğirmeni is the area of the openminded and creative people of Kadıköy. You will find really nice coffee shops and vegan places. Also its close to the bazaar, harbour and subway.
neighborhood_overview: Yeldeğirmeni is the area of the openminded and creative people of Kadıköy. You will find really nice coffee shops and vegan places. Also its close to the bazaar, harbour and subway.

name: Cozy bedroom with private washroom
summary: Appartement récent avec beaucoup de charme exposé au Sud Ouest dans le quartier St Henri proche du Canal Lachine. Endroit très reposant pour couple ou personne seule de passage à Montréal. Nombreux restaurants, épicerie en bas de l’appartement, parking gratuit dans la rue. Salle d’eau privée (toilette). Beautiful brand new apartment exposed south west. Very quiet neighborhood for couple or single person. Lot of restaurant, grocery store and free parking in the street. Private washroom (toilet).
description: Appartement récent avec beaucoup de charme exposé au Sud Ouest dans le quartier St Henri proche du Canal Lachine. Endroit très reposant pour couple ou personne seule de passage à Montréal. Nombreux restaurants, épicerie en bas de l’appartement, parking gratuit dans la rue. Salle d’eau privée (toilette). Beautiful brand new apartment exposed south west. Very quiet neighborhood for couple or single person. Lot of restaurant, grocery store and free parking in the street. Private washroom (toilet). Les voyageurs ont accès au logement entier à part notre chambre qui est privée. C’est à dire le salon, la cuisine, la terrasse, leur chambre privée, leur salle d’eau privée avec toilette ainsi que la salle de bain commune. Travelers have access to the entire apartment except our private bedroom. That mean living room and kitchen, desk, their private bedroom and washroom with toilet and the common bathroom. Nous pouvons conseiller les voyageurs sur les activités à faire et les choses à voir à Mon

name: New & Airy Apartment Next To Green Square Station
summary: Enjoy big city convenience without the hustle and bustle. Green Square is a new area that is safe and convenient for travelers. 1  train stop from Central, 2 stops from the airport, with no train or airplane noise. The room comes with 2 single beds that are plush yet supportive, and can be combined to form a king sized bed.  We have also installed the best light blocking blinds and additional sheer curtains to suit individual preferences.
space: Brand new 2 bedroom apartment with new stylish furniture, shared only with us, with your own private lockable room, private bathroom with shower and toilet (no bathtub). Instagram worthy cafes at your doorstep.  1 min walk to Green Square Station, Woolworths supermarket and the newly built Green Square Library. 5 min train ride to Sydney CBD and the Airport, convenient for the savvy traveler. 10 min bus ride to The Grounds of Alexandria, UNSW, Sydney University, UTS. 20 min car ride to Bondi Beach. Plenty of shopping and factory outlets around. Chef's hat restaurants nearby.

notes: Please contact us regarding your planned check-in and check-out times, to make sure we are available to check you in. There is video surveillance in the living dinning and kitchen area. There is a building being build across the road, so occasionally there might be some construction noise. Any breach of our house rules may incur a fee of up to $500.
transit: 1 minute walk from Green Square Train Station and Bus Stop.
access: The kitchen, living and dining area is shared with us but feel free to use it. There is a 65 inch LED TV with Chromecast that you can use, as well as a digital piano but please respect the neighbours by limiting noise after 10pm.
interaction: I am quite responsive to emails, text and phone calls.  We've been living in Sydney for more than 15 years, and we are happy to chat, answer questions or provide assistance during your stay.
house_rules: - Guests other than the prearranged and confirmed are not allowed on property ($200 penalty per person per day, excluding damages). - Lost key will incur a $300 replacement fee. - Late checkout will incur a $30 per hour fee, unless arranged before booking. - Strictly no smoking in all areas of the premises (including balcony). A breach of this will incur a fee of $500. - Tempering with the security monitoring device will incur a $500 fee. - Failure to keep the shared area (kitchen, living and dinning room) clean and tidy throughout your stay will incur a $50 fee per day. - No shoes on the carpet area, a breach of this will incur a $50 cleaning fee.

They truly put themselves in their guests’ shoes and do their best to accomodate to your preferences (within limit, of course). I had a delightful time staying at their residence, which was very close to the Green Square train station, and I would highly recommend their place to anyone looking for a comfortable, affordable and convenient place to stay!
We had a wonderful stay with Tim and Mel. Their place was clean, comfy, spacious and super close to the station. They were great hosts.

Perfectly located less than 100 meters from Green Square Train Station (one stop away from Central) this place is just as beautiful as the photos. Very, very clean and Tim and Mel are so kind and easy to chat with. They also give you your own space if that’s what you like. I had a lovely gift basket of muesli bars and crisps on the bed when I arrived. The whole area is brand new, and buildings are still going up, so there’s a bit of construction going on around the place (Sept 2018), however, it didn’t ruin my stay. The apartment building Tim and Mel’s place is in is very beautiful - quiet too!

Local tips: I’d recommend popping into Textbook Boulangerie which is about 200m away - amazing French Pastries. Grounds of Alexandria isn’t far either - hip cafe/coffee options. The new library is worth popping into as well - it’s quite a spectacle at night.

Woolworths is virtually on your doorstep too.

Thanks for a great stay!

We stayed at Tim & Mel’s for 4 nights. The place was spotless and well located near  Green Square station. 

Check in was very easy and the hosts were quick to respond when contacted. 

We initially had a slight issue with the camera in the living area and where it was placed. After discussing this with Tim & Mel they agreed to move it to a more agreeable place within the room. We’d like to add that we were happy with the host’s response. 

All in all, a very good stay in a well located apartment.

Tim & Mel are very friendly host. The place they have is so clean and new and stylish, and the best part is the location which is just few mins walk away to an underground train station which connects directly to CBD in just a few stops. 

They also provided us with snacks in the room which was a very thoughtful gesture and they also allow us to use the dryer and washer which was handy for us after we have traveled outside for a few days. Just a little drawback to the apartment is the construction on going at the opposite building which stop late at night and starts around 7 am in the morning, which Tim provided us ear plugs for. Not an issue for us, as we are quite an early riser. 

Overall, is a very good stay at Tim and Mel's place! If i were to come back to Sydney, I will definitely be back to stay with them!
Great location. Stylish apartment with thoughtful touches and good value. Can't fault it

neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Hong Kong, the flat is blessed with a quite environment although being close to all the main attractions. Central is the most exclusive area in Hong Kong, you will have access to the best restaurants in town, art centres & museums, parks & natural hikes. Buses, taxis and metro in walking distance from the flat for your convenience.
transit: Almost everything is within a short walk: - 1 min from Tai Kwun (modern area with museum, exhibitions and dining court) - 3 min to HK Zoo and Botanical Garden (to enjoy relaxing time) - 3 min to Soho (you will find the most famous restaurants and fancy bars) - 3 min to LKF area (if you fancy parties) - 5 min to Central MTR - 10 min to Central Ferry & Harbour (gateway to most of HK islands) - 10 min to funicular (you should go to the peak for the sunset, amazing lights! There are also hiking trails for the sportive folks) - 40 min to airport via the Airport Express train (which is super convenient!)

name: Comfortable room in a house in the heart of Gràcia
summary: Live during your vacations in the center of the most cosmopolitan neighborhood of the city of Barcelona. The comfortable room is ideal for short stays in the city. Having a sofa bed, allows you to have a space to be, a desk to work or connect to the Internet and quickly transform the room into a bedroom for two people. Go on public transport and take a walk through the little streets of the neighborhood, with its unique markets, bars and shops.
space: The house where the room is located is a house of the early twentieth century. It has the structure of the characteristic houses of the neighborhood of Gràcia: three stories high, on the ground floor, where the room is located, a family lives and in the upper two there is another family. The house has a spacious living room with modernist ceramics on its walls and a patio that accesses the main room of the house where its owners stay (this area is not accessible to guests, but its owners like to teach it, sometimes). The house is located at street level and is quiet and comfortable.

neighborhood_overview: Gràcia is a charismatic, bustling, cosmopolitan and bohemian district. A place where lifelong residents and exchange students, Gypsies who play music on the streets and bohemian artists looking for inspiration, all live side by side; the young and not so young who greet each other in the squares, while queuing at the independent cinema. It is one big family in Gràcia, a district with room for everyone.
transit: The house is located 8 minutes away from the FONTANA metro stop (L3 - GREEN) and 12 minutes from the JOÀNIC (L4-YELLOW) stop, the two lines connect to the most popular areas of the city. Walking connects quickly with Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial area of the city and after 30 minutes walking you will arrive at Plaça Catalunya. Within 15 minutes you reach the famous PARC GÜELL.
access: From the street you access the apartment and in the hall of the house there is the room. A corridor gives access to the bathroom that is shared by another single room. At the end of the corridor there is the part of the house that the owners use and that is not in common use for the guests of the room.

host.host_about: I'm Enric, my partner is Mireia and we have a very special house in the neighborhood of Gràcia (Barcelona). We are a couple who make our way of life and work from the world of culture. We are the directors of a cultural promoter that is creating the Viles del Llibre de Catalunya network: (Website hidden by Airbnb) We like cinema, music and, of course, books.

name: Cozy Panoramic Apartment near Metro Station
space: Cozy one-bedroom apartment located in Senhora da Hora, a peaceful residential area. The 12th floor closed balcony offers a view like no other, from the city center to the sea. Right next to a Metro Station (5-10 minutes walk), it is located halfway between the busy city center, the beaches and the airport (each within a 15 minutes trip). You can also find the biggest shopping mall in Northern Portugal just within a 20 minutes walk (or 5 minutes metro trip), where you can find everything you need, from groceries to clothing or electronics. If you wish to stay close to where everything happens, but still enjoy a good night's sleep in a quiet neighborhood this is the place for you!
